story:
Short Summary

Laurelle Shanti Gaia is a world renowned ICRT Reiki Master Teacher, mentor, co-founder of Infinite Light Healing Studies at Peace Place in Sedona, AZ and lover of the Earth and all sentient beings.  She has authored many books and audio on the subjects of Reiki and spiritual healing and considers herself a perpetual student of life.  She is a beacon of Love and Light who has been a peaceweaver, working to anchor Heaven on Earth since she was a small child.  The work she has done on behalf of the Greater Good is beyond measure.

On July 25th, our beloved Laurelle experienced two aneurysms that left her in a non-medically induced coma for 24 days in a hospital in Phoenix, AZ.  Her soul partner husband, Michael Baird, has been by her side as well as their sons and their families.  Through the care of a highly skilled medical staff, our global healing community and loving family of friends who continue to send Reiki, prayers, positive intentions and Love for Laurelle's healing, she is surprising everyone with her strides of progress!  Still the medical expenses grow.

We need your help NOW!

This campaign is focusing on long term care for Laurelle as she is preparing to move from ICU to a rehabilitation facility.  Acute care facility costs range between $20,000 to $24,000 each month.

We are now working with a non profit that will pass through 100 percent collected through Indiegogo's fund raising site to support Laurelle's  care. This allows letters for tax deductions to be given for contributions of $100 or more. 

-----

The Impact

Your contributions will make it possible for Laurelle Gaia to receive the best care available while she recovers including:

  • In-patient rehabilitation
  • Long-term acute care

Other Ways You Can Contribute

If making a donation through PayPal or with a personal check is preferred,  please  contact us directly at laurellegaiafund@gmail.com

Donations over $100 will receive a tax deductible letter for your accounting purposes.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share the Indiegogo link for Laurelle Gaia's Medical Expenses Fund via Facebook with all your friends and ask they share the link with their friends. 
  • Send out personal emails with the link to all your friends and family and ask them to forward
  • Hosting/sponsoring a 5K race to benefit Laurelle
  • Consider donating a percentage of your business income to the fund
  • Host a Reiki Day offering reduced fees for sessions and forwarding profits to the fund.

What you'll receive for your donation:

  • Perks for $1000+ Donors - 28" Garnet Necklace, $5000+ Donors - Quartz Crystal Challis (see details above)
  • Tax deduction for $100+ donations
  • Blessings returned 1000-fold!  It's a Universal Law!
  • A full heart knowing your money is helping an Earth Angel recover from a life-threatening event
  • Good Karma for good deeds
  • Gratitude that is greater than words can express


Regular Updates on Laurelle's progress posted here:

Thursday - Sept 24, 2015

Laurelle has been improving by leaps and bounds since beginning her program of rehabilitation.  She is making daily strides in her return to her optimum wellness as her most brilliant self continues to shine, shine shine! 

After experiencing an intense headache last night she was transported back to the hospital.  Examination and a CT scan determined that she was suffering from a UTI (urinary tract infection).  This condition can bring about many uncomfortable symptoms that could seem unrelated.  But as it turns out, UTIs can rear their head in a number of different ways.  So she is being treated with some medication (and of course Reiki!) and expected to recover fully from this minor setback. 

________________________

Gratitude and Love continue to flow for your prayers, Reiki  and donations!  Please keep your healing intentions for Laurelle's Highest Best sacred process coming!

story:
Vixenroot Apothecary is a woman-owned online shop offering customized herbal remedies, virtual consultations, and related blog articles. Our mission is to bring the empowering nature of herbalism to the mainstream consumer.

Our hand crafted products are made from responsibly sourced, organic ingredients with sustainable practices as our top priority. Because being a good neighbor is important to us, we will give a portion of our profits to organizations focused on solving environmental and humanitarian issues around the globe.

Herbal medicine is the tool of our wise elders. Instead of entrusting our health to the pharmaceutically focused, let us wield these time-honored remedies to heal ourselves and those in our communities. Together, let’s be empowered.

 

What We Need 

Equipment - things like High Volume kitchen, measuring, and processing tools (to support our soon-to-be extended family)

Packaging - low-impact, recyclable, and/or reusable boxes, jars, and the like (so we can send goodies while still being earth-friendly)

Support - client management, scheduling, and website maintenance for bug squashing post-launch (and any other behind-the-scene details for making our virtual interactions pleasant experiences)

 

What You Get

  • $15 Backer: A declaration of gratitude to the heavens, in your honor
  • $30 Backer: A handwritten “Thank You” card and pressed botanical specimen
  • $60 Backer: All of the above and a 10% discount code (available for use after website launch)
  • $100 Backer: All of the above and an enamel pin of the Vixenroot logo (to commemorate the time when you supported a budding botanical business on IndieGoGo, but you really just wanted that enamel pin)
  • $500 Backer: A handwritten "Thank You" card, pressed botanical specimen, enamel pin of the Vixenroot logo, and a gift bundle of product samples

  • $1000 Backer: A handwritten "Thank You" card, pressed botanical specimen, enamel pin of the Vixenroot logo, a gift bundle of product samples, a 45-minute virtual consultation, and a social media announcement

 

 

Impact

The long-short of it is this: more healthcare options equals true freedom of choice. We are tired of being bullied into paying outrageous prices for “medications” that make matters worse.

It is time for a paradigm shift in the healthcare system, and this is how we do it: one apothecary at a time.

When we look backward to seek the healing wisdom of herbal medicine, we step forward to embrace a better relationship between humankind, nature, and the future of us all. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

~ Help spread the word!

~ Like our Facebook Page and follow us on Instagram.

~ Don’t forget to use IndieGoGo’s share tools.

story:
Hello!

 

We are the Nunuku team, and we want to introduce you to NEST, the ultimate cervical anti-wrinkle pillow.

 

 

We design innovative products to improve the quality of your rest.

Pre-order our new anti-wrinkle cervical pillow and help make it come true.

 

 

Meet the most comfortable and pleasant pillow that relieves neck and back pain while preventing sleep wrinkles and marks on your face, neck, and cleavage.

 

 

 

Provides a restful sleep and
younger-looking skin.

 

Now, you can transform your bedtime into a wellness place, NESTling your head in a correct position to avoid headaches, neck and back pain. NEST offers maximum comfort for the cervical area, limiting skin compression between your face and pillow that creates sleeping wrinkles.


 

 

How are you going to feel?

 

You are going to feel well-rested, relaxed, renovated. Ready to start your day full of energy.

 

Rest your head on NEST, you will find the place where the tensions disappear.

 

The interior of the pillow is made with the latest technology in memory foam manufacturing. 

The pillow´s memory foam easily adapts to the shape and weight of your head, providing unique support characteristics, durability and smoothness. 

NEST creates a sense of weightlessness during rest, offering you maximum comfort in a restful and repairing sleep.
 

 

 

 

The pillowcase fabric takes cares for your skin. It is made of Q-Skin polyamide with silver ions that guarantees a clean surface, free of bacteria and bad odours. The pillowcase permanently adapts to the shape of the pillow and your head when pressure is applied and recovers its original shape along with the foam.

 

 

We applied seamless technology to wave the pillowcase, which creates a very soft and pleasant contact surface. Also, it ensures that there will rarely be folds or wrinkles that can also mark your skin.

 

 

 

What's new in our design?

 

Its concave shape allows the head to be placed in the center of the pillow, offering freedom of movement on both sides while maintaining alignment with the spine.

 

 

 
 
Its rounded edges adapt to the natural curvature of the neck and back, providing the comfortable and correct support for rest.
 
 

 

 

You will reduce your movements during the night thanks to its lateral supports, avoiding the points of pressure and contact between the face with the pillow.

 

 

NEST will take care of you throughout the night. Lie on your back, close your eyes and relax.

 

What makes NEST even more amazing?

 

The anti-wrinkle system!

 

The pillow is the product of the research and recommendations of doctors, dermatologists, and physical therapists to create a piece with an ergonomic design that offers therapeutic results.

 

 

The pillow will adapt to the natural curvature of the neck and head, relieving pressure on the cervical area and shoulders. At the same time, it promotes sleep in a natural resting position that prevents the appearance of wrinkles on the face, neck and neckline.

 

 

Every day, millions of women and men around the world wake up with unwanted sleeping wrinkles and marks on their face. This is the result of the pressure exerted against the pillow by the face while sleeping. As a consequence, these sleep marks become permanent wrinkles.

 

 

 

Now sleeping is more than just rest. It also prevents the emergence of sleep wrinkles.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Waking up with rested, rejuvenated skin without marks or wrinkles is something you will greatly appreciate.

 

 

 

 

How does the anti-wrinkle system work?

 

ZERO SKIN CONTACT

 

 

NEST anti-wrinkles pillow has been specifically designed to minimize the contact of the face against the pillow, limiting the emergence of sleep wrinkles.

 

 

 

The head will enjoy the freedom of movement to both sides while restricting body movement, thus enabling an uninterrupted and prolonged rest.

 

 

Wrinkles become visible due to the progressive loss of collagen, elastin and hyaluronic acid of the skin, resulting in a loss of its thickness and elasticity, thus becoming weaker.

 

ERGONOMIC DESIGN

 

 

Keeps head and body in the optimal position to ensure the alignment between head, neck, and back.

 

Great for preventing and relieving neck pain.

 

Maximum relaxation for the neck and shoulder muscles thanks to the lateral supports where the head is supported.

 

Favours sleeping in a natural position to provide a perfect rest.

 

 

Sleeping on your back favours the process of cell renewal. Also, prolongs the youthful appearance of the skin by removing the skin compression to which is exposed while sleeping.

 

GRAVITY EFFECT

 

 

The force of gravity exerts a tightening effect on our skin when you sleep on your back that is reflected in smoother skin every morning.

 

 

 

 

 

Visible results from the first night.

 

 

Something else?

 

It is the perfect complement to the beauty routine, as well as any cosmetic and beauty procedures. Eases beauty products skin penetration.

Looks for simplicity that is decorative and allows frequent renovation according to new decorative trends, the user's taste and mood.

 

 

 

It comes in the latest fashionable colors, evolving along with fashion trends and adapting to the style of each user.

 

 

Proposes a variety of fabrics, textures, and fabrics with different designs, prints and colors that facilitate their evolution with fashionable decorative trends or simply adapt to the style of each user.

 

 

More, we aspired to create a pillow that could become an object of desire, a piece of unique design that would stand out in the decoration of the room.

 

 

Specifications

 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

Nunuku team

 

We're Nunuku (Álvaro and Francisco Montes). Nunuku is an endeavour pursuing to bring into life beauty and rest solutions. We are based in Santiago de Compostela, Galicia, Spain.

 

Álvaro has more than twenty-five (25) years of experience with luxury beauty brands as Brand Director at L'Oreal and as a partner of Las Villas Perfumería, a luxury beauty products retail stores. 

 

Francisco is a seasoned strategy, marketing, and management consultant, with a wide international experience.

NEST offers maximum comfort for the cervical area, limiting skin compression between your face and pillow that creates sleeping wrinkles.  How are you going to feel? You are going to feel well-rested, relaxed, renovated. It is made of Q-Skin polyamide with silver ions that guarantees a clean surface, free of bacteria and bad odours. The pillowcase permanently adapts to the shape of the pillow and your head when pressure is applied and recovers its original shape along with the foam.  We applied seamless technology to wave the pillowcase, which creates a very soft and pleasant contact surface. story:
Improved Health Outcomes For Everyone

As a dental surgeon, I have a 30-year history of delivering improved health outcomes for thousands of my patients. The videos I have designed help my patients better understand why dental care is important to their overall health.

For example, the first day I ran my video about the connection between bruxism and headaches in my waiting room, two patients made inquiries about how their headaches can be relieved with dental care! How awesome is that?

If every dental practice in the world was running that video, imagine how many fewer headache sufferers there would be worldwide!

I want to share my success and expertise on how to educate dental patients and get better treatment acceptance rates with this easy to use waiting room dental video app. I truly believe my dental colleagues can make a real and measurable health improvement to millions of patients all over the world with the right tools to help them.

PVC is poised to revolutionize how dental practices connect with their patients worldwide! In the waiting room. On their website. On social media. And at a fraction of the time and cost of traditional video media. By early 2020 PVC will help:

  • Deliver messages and effectively educate the importance of dental care to the patient's overall health.
  • Customize and brand educational videos and special offers in minutes.
  • Allow businesses to automatically update their information across all platforms- from the waiting room to their websites and even youtube.

It is an indisputable fact that the highest uptake and retention of content is achieved when content is delivered using video. In a study by Insivia, viewers retain 95% of a message when they watch it in a video, compared to 10% when reading it in text. And a Cisco report predicts that by 2022, online videos will make up more than 82% of all consumer internet traffic — 15 times higher than it was in 2017.

My main goal is to make video animation easy and affordable for dental practices. Affordable messaging makes information more accessible. As a result, more people worldwide will be made aware of how improving their dental health will have a direct benefit to their overall health and enjoyment of life. 

That is where my program comes in. PVC is an app that creates animated videos I play on my waiting room TV screen. These videos provide waiting patients with education and information like:

  • Oral Health Care Tips and Instructions
  • Education on the correlation between oral health and your overall health
  • Introducing our team members to new and returning patients
  • Special offers we have running at our practice

I've taken the most successful and effective ones, turned them into customizable templates, and made them available to customize and brand in minutes for my colleagues to do the same. I made them easily editable and automatically update anywhere they are embedded with the click of a button. All for a fraction of the price of a single custom video animation from traditional sources.

What We Need

During beta testing, I identified some important changes that will help users of the app create videos in just a few clicks, with improved customization options. The ease of use of the app is essential to encouraging dental practices to use it. More video usage will mean the dental health messages in the videos will reach more people.

We need to raise $285,864 to fund the following, please help!

The program will not stop at dental offices. Once we have launched the dental health education tier of the App, we will use any additional funding to build education tiers for medical, podiatry, physiotherapy, chiropractic, and more. The end goal is to improve worldwide quality of life while offering businesses an affordable and efficient way to market and communicate with their patients.

What You Get

This is your chance to claim perks which will reward you with the fame of being part of the founding team of the biggest app since Uber. Bask in the pride of being part the PVC team that delivers a globally successful promotional video creator app for dental practices and dental patients. The first to help create a global video revolution in health education. The first to opt into a system that will shake the way health practices connect and retain their patients.

Not only will your name be forever part of our website Founding Partners page, but you can also get a massive 85% discounts on our app plans. Check out and opt in to one of our fantastic perks today.

There is no failure to launch risk. Not reaching our funding goal will only cause a delay in the delivery date of your perks. As the founder, I am prepared to keep bootstrapping the development funding in order to get the app to market.

Buy one of our perks and share this opportunity on your social media to help me attain the funding goal and launch the app on its projected date.

The Impact Worldwide

Broad-based delivery of dental health education will undoubtedly benefit the entire world population. Thousands of my patients have put their trust in me over the past 30 years, and by focusing on improving their health I never let them down.

Now I ask you to trust me as my patients have. Join me on my journey to drive improved health for humankind in a practical and affordable app program that benefits both the practice and their patients.

Risks & Challenges

The main risk is the initial cost. As with any software development, the initial costing and timeline or the development are never 100% correct. It is possible I may need more funds and more time to properly finish the app before launch. If this happens, I may need to reach out for more funding and ask for more time from my contributors to deliver their Perks.

The first quote I got to develop my App idea some two years ago was $4000... yeah right! I did not believe them, so I contacted a developer I have worked with some years back to develop an online appointment making app, and I asked them to quote on the development. Their initial quote came in at $36,000 and my wife almost divorced me when I agreed to fund it from our own money. However, I decided to go with them because they had developed and launched what is now a very successful app called HikeUp.com. Of course, even those costs rose significantly over the course of development.

I am prepared, willing, able and do devote almost every waking hour of my life outside working as a dentist to performing development tasks required to get this app finished and to market. My promise to you is that I will continue to do this until the app is launched and will not draw any salary for me from the funds collected here. It will ALL go to developing and maintaining the app.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially, you can still help change the educational landscape of dental practices worldwide! Use the Indiegogo share tools to get this important health message out to everyone you know.

Share this with your dentist! Call or email them to let them know you found an app that you believe will help their dental practice deliver amazing dental health messages to their patients. If you have an appointment coming up, be sure to tell them about it!

Don't forget to tell them there is an opportunity to subscribe to the app NOW to get a huge 85% pre-launch discount through our Indiegogo campaign. It's the only time they'll be able to get this revolutionary app service and educational system at this price!

story:
THREAT REVERSE. It is affecting our daily life as the bacteria spreads from person to another very fast. It has been intensified due to the rapid rise in global migration. It is time to change our living habits to reduce the ways to spread.

Copperman's simple design makes it easy to store the face mask without touching its surface with both hands. The mask is stored in heightened personal hygiene, to avoid touching anything else in the public. We often use our hands to open and close doors, press buttons (elevator, ATM and payment machine). Copperman design is fully matched with various applications through different designs. To change our living habits a little, it can reduce the chance of transmission.

ANTIMICROBIAL PROPERTIES OF COFFER

Copper and its alloys are natural antimicrobial material. Ancient civilizations exploited the antimicrobial properties of copper long before the concept of microbes became understood in the nineteenth century. In addition to several copper medicinal preparations, it was also observed centuries ago that water contained in copper vessels or transported in copper conveyance systems was of better quality than water contained or transported in other materials.

 

COPPER TOUCH SURFACE

Antimicrobial copper-alloy touch surfaces can prevent frequently touched surfaces from serving as reservoirs for the spread of microbes. This is especially true in healthcare facilities, where harmful bacteria colonises and persists on doorknobs, push plates, railings, tray tables, tap (faucet) handles, and other equipment. These microbes can sometimes survive on surfaces for more than 30 days.

 

The design of Copperman is portable, dynamic, and multi-purpose applications. Copperman integrates the design into your personal belongings, such as lipstick and keychain. It can enhance personal hygiene that reduces the chance of public contacts.

Given face mask shortage crisis, Copperman specially designs two face mask storage holders, allowing you to put the mask where it is always hygienic. It is reusable and easy keeping on day to day basis. By such, we do not wrap the mask with other single-use items. And, we will not consume with panic buying and hoarding such as tissue paper, envelope and zipper bag. Copperman always appreciates with earth protecting on product design.

Copperman would become a part of everyone's life. It can reduce the risk of transmission caused by contact with any object in public. It can also narrow the risk of secondary transmission; especially harmful bacteria.

 

Copperman face mask holder, Mask Pad and Mask Clip, is a temporary storage of face mask. It is made of the metal of Copper. Copper can lower the activity level of bacteria spreading wisely. After taking off the face mask, store into the Mask Pad/ Mask Clip to calm the germ activity. It allows to reuse the same mask with better hygiene condition. Copperman reassures you to wear the same mask. Last but not the least, Mask Pad/ Mask Clip can minimise the mask to spread the germs in public and narrow the risk of getting secondary transmission.

Remark:

1. Ensure the face mask to be stored in Copperman is in good condition. Once damaged such as the mask has been wet or damaged, it is not suitable for use.

2. The key feature of Copperman is to suppress bacteria in the face mask holder and reduce the risk of secondary transmission of inflection. It is not to suppress bacteria on the surface and inside of the face mask. 

 

Why we wear surgical masks is to avoid getting sick, and to avoid others getting sick. The face mask shortage crisis makes everyone wear the same mask more than one time. Since we cannot wear face mask 24 hours a day, and we usually take off the masks for the mask-free break, for instance, lunchtime and drinking water.

By observation, the taking-off mask lies on the tissue paper and put on the table. Or, the mask will be placed inside the reusable bag, or just putting the naked mask into the jacket pocket. With these short period storage, they are not promising for good personal hygiene. It could even be considered as a great leakage of bacteria spreading. 

 

With the supporting of researches and reports, it states the metal of copper can inhibit the growth of bacteria.

REPORTS FROM ASSOCIATIONS


 

Copper is a chemical element with a symbol of Cu. It is a soft, malleable metal. Copper is one of the few metals that can occur in nature in a directly usable metallic form (native metals). The cultural role of copper has been important. Ancient Egyptians (2400BC) used copper for sterilizing wounds and drinking water.

On February 29, 2008, the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) approved the registrations of five different groups of copper alloys as "antimicrobial materials" with public health benefits. The EPA registrations now cover 479 different compositions of copper alloys within six groups. All of the alloys have minimum nominal copper concentrations of 60%. The results of the EPA-supervised antimicrobial studies demonstrating copper's strong antimicrobial efficacies across a wide range of alloys have been published.

Copper and its alloys exhibit impressive antibacterial properties. Copper has been exploited for health purposes since ancient times. The process involves the release of copper ions (electrically charged particles) when microbes, transferred by touching, land on the copper surface. The ions prevent cell respiration, punch holes in the bacterial cell membrane or disrupt the bacterial coat, and destroy the DNA and RNA inside.

The process involves the release of copper ions when microbes (bacteria) were exposed to copper surface (land on the copper surface). It disrupts bacterial cell membranes. Copper ions prevent cell respiration, punch holes in the bacterial cell membranes. It generates oxidative stress on bacterial cells, and Copper readily catalyzes reactions that result in the production of hydroxyl radicals.  And it also interferes with the proteins that operate important functions, thereby inhibiting their activities.

Copperman allows you think out of the box. Copperman integrates “Stick As You Go” into your personal belongings. It gives extra protection to avoid any direct touching in public. “Stick As You Go” allows you to stimulate your creativity on where to stick; for instance, hand sanitizer and smartphone. Copperman provides the best solution for you to design your own daily use product to become hygiene. Copperman adopts as a part of your life with slightly change that can reduce the change of inflectious spread.

Besides, Copperman specially design two kinds of face mask holders, Mask Pad and Mask Clip. With the concept of “zero touching” mask surface, it is the simplest way to keep the mask in a better hygiene. Copperman reassures you to wear the same mask.

Having a Copperman face mask holder (Mask Pad/ Mask Clip), it is to avoid any direct skin contact to the surface of bacteria on the face mask. Taking off the mask with the earlobe elastic bands, and place the mask into the Mask Pad/ Mask Clip. When the mask is sitting inside the case peacefully, the copper ions can cause a series of negative events in bacterial cells. Copper ions released from the surface have been proposed to play a major role in the bacteria inhibition effect.

Copperman face mask holder shares a similar size of a long wallet (Mask Pad), a foldable wallet (Mask Clip). It not only simplifies the step from the misuse short term storage, but Copperman face mask holder is also washable and reusable. It can rinse with water followed by air drying. As if the copper metal is oxidized, it can brush/soak with toothpaste to clean the rust. It is easy for both the storage and cleaning process.

With Copperman face mask holder, the surgical mask is stored in a closed container in which bacteria will be trapped inside. The germs will not spread out to the secondary transmission. Most importantly, the copper surface can inhibit bacterial growth.

 

 

 

Environmental factors can affect the activity of copper ions, it is recommended to wash Copperman with water, liquid soap, or dishwashing detergent. It is not suggested to wash with bleach or alcohol or any other chemicals. Please keep Copperman in a dry, clean, well-ventilated area. It is non-dishwasher safe.

Please clean the copper surface carefully. Any scratches will reduce the chance of copper ion contact with bacteria on the surface of the mask, thereby reducing the effectiveness of suppressing bacteria.

If the copper surface is tarnished, use a towel and vinegar to wipe the discolored part and leave it for one hour; wash with water, wipe the copper surface with a dry cloth and keep it dry.

If the copper surface is stained with acid or salt for a long time, or the Copperman product is placed in a humid place, it is prone to produce patina. Patina is a harmful substance. If patina has appeared after a period of use, please clean it up and take care of it as soon as possible.

To remove patina is to mix the salt with the same amount of vinegar, and then wipe it with a cloth soaked with the above liquid to restore its luster. Then rinse with water and use a dry cloth to wipe the copper surface to dry.

 

 

 

Copperman provides more than a product but also stimulate your creativity by how to implement ideas of Stick As You Go into your personal belongings.

Copperman is not only inhibited bacterial growth but also flexible in design. Copperman offers a variety of designs that fit on different occasions.

Copperman integrates the design into your personal belongings, such as lipstick and keychain. It is reusable and easy keeping on day to day basis. By such, we do not wrap the mask with other single-use items. And, we will not consume with panic buying and hoarding such as tissue paper, envelope and zipper bag. Copperman always appreciates with earth protecting on product design.Copperman would become a part of everyone's life. It can reduce the risk of transmission caused by contact with any object in public. It can also narrow the risk of secondary transmission; especially harmful bacteria. Copperman face mask holder, Mask Pad and Mask Clip, is a temporary storage of face mask. It is made of the metal of Copper. Copper can lower the activity level of bacteria spreading wisely. After taking off the face mask, store into the Mask Pad/ Mask Clip to calm the germ activity. It allows to reuse the same mask with better hygiene condition. Copperman reassures you to wear the same mask. Last but not the least, Mask Pad/ Mask Clip can minimise the mask to spread the germs in public and narrow the risk of getting secondary transmission.Remark:1. Ensure the face mask to be stored in Copperman is in good condition. Once damaged such as the mask has been wet or damaged, it is not suitable for use.2. The key feature of Copperman is to suppress bacteria in the face mask holder and reduce the risk of secondary transmission of inflection. It is not to suppress bacteria on the surface and inside of the face mask.  Why we wear surgical masks is to avoid getting sick, and to avoid others getting sick. The face mask shortage crisis makes everyone wear the same mask more than one time. Since we cannot wear face mask 24 hours a day, and we usually take off the masks for the mask-free break, for instance, lunchtime and drinking water.By observation, the taking-off mask lies on the tissue paper and put on the table. Or, the mask will be placed inside the reusable bag, or just putting the naked mask into the jacket pocket. With these short period storage, they are not promising for good personal hygiene. It could even be considered as a great leakage of bacteria spreading.  With the supporting of researches and reports, it states the metal of copper can inhibit the growth of bacteria.REPORTS FROM ASSOCIATIONS Copper is a chemical element with a symbol of Cu. It is a soft, malleable metal. Copper is one of the few metals that can occur in nature in a directly usable metallic form (native metals). The cultural role of copper has been important. Ancient Egyptians (2400BC) used copper for sterilizing wounds and drinking water.On February 29, 2008, the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) approved the registrations of five different groups of copper alloys as "antimicrobial materials" with public health benefits. The EPA registrations now cover 479 different compositions of copper alloys within six groups. All of the alloys have minimum nominal copper concentrations of 60%. The results of the EPA-supervised antimicrobial studies demonstrating copper's strong antimicrobial efficacies across a wide range of alloys have been published.Copper and its alloys exhibit impressive antibacterial properties. Copper has been exploited for health purposes since ancient times. The process involves the release of copper ions (electrically charged particles) when microbes, transferred by touching, land on the copper surface. The ions prevent cell respiration, punch holes in the bacterial cell membrane or disrupt the bacterial coat, and destroy the DNA and RNA inside.The process involves the release of copper ions when microbes (bacteria) were exposed to copper surface (land on the copper surface). It disrupts bacterial cell membranes. Copper ions prevent cell respiration, punch holes in the bacterial cell membranes. It generates oxidative stress on bacterial cells, and Copper readily catalyzes reactions that result in the production of hydroxyl radicals.  And it also interferes with the proteins that operate important functions, thereby inhibiting their activities.Copperman allows you think out of the box. Copperman integrates “Stick As You Go” into your personal belongings. It gives extra protection to avoid any direct touching in public. “Stick As You Go” allows you to stimulate your creativity on where to stick; for instance, hand sanitizer and smartphone. Copperman provides the best solution for you to design your own daily use product to become hygiene. Copperman adopts as a part of your life with slightly change that can reduce the change of inflectious spread.Besides, Copperman specially design two kinds of face mask holders, Mask Pad and Mask Clip. With the concept of “zero touching” mask surface, it is the simplest way to keep the mask in a better hygiene. Copperman reassures you to wear the same mask.Having a Copperman face mask holder (Mask Pad/ Mask Clip), it is to avoid any direct skin contact to the surface of bacteria on the face mask. Taking off the mask with the earlobe elastic bands, and place the mask into the Mask Pad/ Mask Clip. When the mask is sitting inside the case peacefully, the copper ions can cause a series of negative events in bacterial cells. Copper ions released from the surface have been proposed to play a major role in the bacteria inhibition effect.Copperman face mask holder shares a similar size of a long wallet (Mask Pad), a foldable wallet (Mask Clip). It not only simplifies the step from the misuse short term storage, but Copperman face mask holder is also washable and reusable. It can rinse with water followed by air drying. As if the copper metal is oxidized, it can brush/soak with toothpaste to clean the rust. It is easy for both the storage and cleaning process.With Copperman face mask holder, the surgical mask is stored in a closed container in which bacteria will be trapped inside. The germs will not spread out to the secondary transmission. Most importantly, the copper surface can inhibit bacterial growth.   Environmental factors can affect the activity of copper ions, it is recommended to wash Copperman with water, liquid soap, or dishwashing detergent. It is not suggested to wash with bleach or alcohol or any other chemicals. Please keep Copperman in a dry, clean, well-ventilated area. It is non-dishwasher safe.Please clean the copper surface carefully. Any scratches will reduce the chance of copper ion contact with bacteria on the surface of the mask, thereby reducing the effectiveness of suppressing bacteria.If the copper surface is tarnished, use a towel and vinegar to wipe the discolored part and leave it for one hour; wash with water, wipe the copper surface with a dry cloth and keep it dry.If the copper surface is stained with acid or salt for a long time, or the Copperman product is placed in a humid place, it is prone to produce patina. Patina is a harmful substance. If patina has appeared after a period of use, please clean it up and take care of it as soon as possible.To remove patina is to mix the salt with the same amount of vinegar, and then wipe it with a cloth soaked with the above liquid to restore its luster. Then rinse with water and use a dry cloth to wipe the copper surface to dry.   Copperman provides more than a product but also stimulate your creativity by how to implement ideas of Stick As You Go into your personal belongings.Copperman is not only inhibited bacterial growth but also flexible in design. Copperman offers a variety of designs that fit on different occasions.

story:
Beau and Enne were both born with hearing loss on one side since birth.

They only qualified for reconstructive ear surgery at $200k+, or a $7k Bone Anchored Hearing Aid that required surgery to fit part of the device.

They both thought "f*** this, I'll just go deaf" until they tried ROCK for the first time.

 

 

 

 

Our device us suitable for a range of hearing loss types.

 

If you are unsure, please contact us here. where our medical experts can assess your circumstances and see if you qualify for the device.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stuart Kerr is the Founder of Rock Human Devices.

 

He has extensive experience in Engineering and Product Design, ranging from equipment used in particle accelerators in Japan and CERN, to his experience at Dyson bring huge projects to mass production and market, such as the Dyson Supersonic hairdryer and the Pure Cool Link range of purifier fans.

 

Follow him on LinkedIn:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/relentlessstu

 

Email:

stuart@rockhumandevices.com

 

Every company, every project, every challenging device that has ever entered the market came with the emotional baggage of risks and challenges.

Luckily, the team at ROCK Human Devices have many years of experience developing products and devices from prototype level all the way through to mass production, producing 100,000's, if not, millions of devices.

That said, we've identified many of the possible risks and challenges with the design, calibration, and distribution aspects and can explain a little about them:

  1. The device we ship to a backer is not suitable for their type of hearing loss.
    We don't want to sell and ship a device to a backer who is not suitable for it.
    Before or after backing, the backer can consult with our medical advisory board as to the nature of their hearing loss, and we can advise accordingly. If you discover after the campaign that it's not suitable for you, you may contact us to issue a full refund.
    Backers may refer to the chart in the section above titled "WILL THIS HEARING AID WORK FOR ME?" to clearly identify if you're suitable for the device. If you fall under a category which makes it unclear if you're suitable, get in touch with us any time here.
     
  2. The project encounters serious shipping delays.
    We waited a long time to fully test the reliability of our fully functioning prototypes, test them with our current users, and plan our manufacturing costs and processes extensively before launching this campaign.
    That being said, manufacturing and shipping delays are always a possibility, however we have overstated the delivery time and allocated ample time to ramp up the manufacturing of your devices. We're planning to produce and test the devices ahead of schedule, so that if we encounter any delays, we'll likely end up being just on time.
     
  3. I get the device but it doesn't work!
    If such a situation occurs, contact us immediately to arrange a replacement device.
    We want you hearing the world the beautiful world around you as soon as possible.
    It's important to completely swap your faulty device with a new device, as it allows us the opportunity to learn why the device failed when it got into the customer's hands. This way we can correct the design/manufacturing issue that led to the failure and create a better experience for all our customers.

story:
Who we are

We are scientists investigating how the brain works (when healthy) and doesn't work (when ill). We are trying to inspire and train the neuroscientists of the future, to provide them with the best chance to solve the mysteries of the brain, to discover how we perceive, think, decide, act, and understand the world and ourselves; and to offer real hope for a cure of the brain’s devastating maladies, ranging from ALS, Schizophrenia and Parkinson's to Alzheimer’s disease.

 

Our project

We have started a worldwide initiative to train young brain researchers, from both poor and developed countries, in understanding and using the most advanced tools in brain research today. We do this in Transylvania where high level technology seems to be out of place! Such an experience can convince any researcher that everything is possible in science and that any limitations (including financial) are easily overcome by creativity and knowledge.

This is TENSS, the Transylvanian Experimental Neuroscience Summer School:

  • 3 weeks of 24/7 hands-on practical and theoretical courses in cutting-edge modern experimental neuroscience.
  • A select group of the best applicants: for the 2018 edition, top 14 were selected from an excellent pool of 120 students from 40 countries across 6 continents.
  • A wide collection of experts: in 2018 we have 24 instructors and 17 dedicated teaching assistants from brain research institutes in the USA, UK, Germany, Portugal, Romania, India, and Slovakia.
  • A knowledge base of Open-Source solutions to complex problems in brain research, providing an alternative to the expensive commercial systems.
  • A growing community of scientists (lecturers, students, assistants), engaged in high quality debates, willing to share knowledge and open to collaborations.

 

TENSS media coverage

  • TENSS official website
  • TINS official website
  • Nature editorial about TENSS
  • News on TV: Digi24
  • Romanian media: Vox Publica, Romania Curata

 

Why we need your help

  • The scientists of the future, trained at TENSS, will advance knowledge about the brain and develop treatments for neurological disorders.
  • Your support will enable the stability of TENSS throughout the years. On the long run, community support for TENSS will translate in community support for neuroscience research.
  • TENSS is about people. Although instructors and teaching assistants are voluntary we need donations to cover transportation and equipment.
  • The Transylvanian Institute of Science and Technology (TINS), the young host institution, also needs support to secure its future.
  • To spread the word about the initiative, about its goals and philosophy and about the crowd funding campaign.

 

The Impact

This event was built on an idea that two friends had at a dinner table. Ever since then,  it has continued to grow in scale and prestige, with people like you supporting the initiative. 

The scientists of the future, trained at TENSS, will advance knowledge about the brain and develop treatments for neurological disorders.

Your support will enable the stability of TENSS throughout the years. On the long run, community support for TENSS will translate in community support for neuroscience research.

 

Where your contribution goes

TENSS is about people. To bring the best instructors from all over the world, we need your help. Your donation will cover transportation for instructors and the dedicated teaching assistants.

The Transylvanian Institute of Neuroscience provides the foundation for the course. Your donation will also support the host institute.

 

The story behind TENSS

The  Transylvanian  Experimental  Neuroscience  Summer  School  (TENSS)  was  born  in  2010, from an idea that Florin Albeanu shared to Raul Mureşan during a conference in Romania. The first edition of TENSS took place in 2012, on the shores of Pike Lake, in the picturesque province of Transylvania. In 2014, TENSS  has welcomed  a  third permanent organizer, Adam Kampff, from the University College London, UK.

The  main  objective  of  TENSS  is  to  provide  participants  top-level,  hands-on training  in experimental  techniques  used  in  neuroscience. The philosophy of the school is learning by doing and while doing so, openly sharing ideas and expertise. To  the  best  of  our  knowledge  the  opportunity  for  such  training  is scarce and is covered only in a few places in the world, such as Cold Spring Harbor and Woods Hole, in the USA, Plymouth in UK, Champalimaud in Portugal and Okinawa, Japan. TENSS is unique in that most of the experimental (hardware and software) tools are assembled from scratch, with minimal costs leading to a deeply personal transfer of information from first principles. 

The course takes place in a remote, picturesque location in Transylvania, where high level technology seems to be out of place. Participants get actively involved in building a laboratory from scratch and then have the chance to use it too. Such an experience can convince any researcher that everything is possible in science and that financial and concept limitations are easily overcome by creativity and knowledge. 

"I came here with almost no knowledge on experimental techniques in neuroscience and I now feel that I have a good overview of a large variety of them. I come back with a lot of ideas and with much less frontiers or fear in implementing any of the techniques that we learned at the school. The environment of freedom, the feeling that we can do whatever we want, the fact that this freedom leads to being very creative and having amzing new ideas, the flexibility of the organizers that allow for this, this is what I liked most of TENSS. "

                                                                                                              Participant in TENSS 2015

 

A second objective of TENSS is to attract a large number of top-level scientists from all over the world, who can provide theoretical lectures and can interact with participants, among themselves, and with local scientists based in Romania, giving rise to scientific debates of the highest quality. The purpose is to create a durable network of scientists that are willing to share their knowledge and are open to collaborations, and place them in a pool of curious and capable students that can absorb and later implement in their own laboratories the solutions discussed in the summer school.

“The course was a pure delight. The science was hands‐on and cutting edge ‐ despite the need to improvise extensively; the TAs where superb, the organization professional and the visiting lecturers  amongst  the  best  in  the  world.  However, the  specific  reason  why  I  believe  the course ranks supremely amongst its peers and is the best choice for any aspiring graduate student  or  postdoc  in  the neurosciences  is  the  unusual  setting  in  the  rural  parts  of Transylvania  and  the ‐  possibly  correlated  ‐  quality  of  the  students  who  are  absolutely delightful  and highly  intelligent  without  exception.  All  of  these  elements  in  combination produced a summer school that has no equal in the world”. 

                                                                                                 Florian Engert, lecturer                                                                                                                                        Harvard University, USA 

 

Finally, TENSS aims to bring world-wide visibility to neuroscientific research in both Europe and in Romania. The host institute, the Transylvanian Institute of Neuroscience (http://tins.ro/), is the only independent, non profit basic research facility in Systems Neuroscience in Romania, TINS was founded by neuroscientists and its main mission is to further neuroscientific research by studying the dynamics of neural circuits in health and disease. TINS also focuses on research in cognitive sciences and brain-inspired artificial intelligence. TINS is located in Cluj-Napoca, a vibrant university city in the heart of Transylvania.

"Participating in TENSS 2013 was an amazing experience and an opportunity to meet people who were not only extremely bright, dedicated, contagiously enthusiastic and very much on top of their field but also very open and approachable, starting with the students and all the way  to  the  lecturers. The lectures and lab sessions were well organized and came in support of each other, creating an efficient and intensive hands‐on learning process where each day would bring some incredible source of thrill (such as, well after midnight when you’re finally done aligning and adjusting mirrors and lenses, realizing that you’ve just built your own two‐photon microscope almost from scratch). I can say without a doubt that attending this summer school has been  a  real  boost  and  an  eye‐opening  experience  in  more  ways than I could have ever expected. Hopefully many more students will have the opportunity to a similar experience in the following years”

                                                                             Ioana Gasler,  participant in TENSS 2013                                                                                                            Master of Neurobiology                                                                                                                                              University of Bucharest, Romania 

 

Up to now, funding the Transylvanian Experimental Neuroscience Summer School has been partly assured by research societies across the globe, and support was provided by top companies involved in neuroscience research. This edition, we are seeking to involve the community, the people themselves into participating and supporting the event. We believe that, through your support, we can ensure the durable existence of TENSS as a top training event on the research calendar worldwide!

We believe that, through your support, we can ensure the durable existence of TENSS as a top training event on the research calendar worldwide!

story:
Hi! I’m MARCo, the Mentally Assistive Robotic Companion, and I am your new best friend here to help you with your mental and emotional health. Whether it’s general emotional wellness and stress management you need, or if you need support with a chronic mental illness, there is a version of me that’s just right for you! (Check out the Features section below for more information).

Regardless of my version, I am here to help you as naturally as possible. Hold my left hand to trigger my microphone button so we can talk, and use the touch screen in my tummy to visually interact with me. When you work with me, I have a wealth of features that can be broken down into five distinct categories, called my Five Objectives of Care.

"Companion" is in my name, so no wonder this is my very first objective! I can identify individual users and learn about your personality, from your favorite animals to your hobbies and occupation to much, much more! I can use this information to customize our interactions and find a way to quickly cheer you up based on your own interests, or sometimes mine too. I’m also well equipped with jokes, positive affirmations, ad-lib stories, and feel good videos to make our time together much more personable!

Whether you need to destress, relax, fall asleep, focus, or do something spiritual and mindful, just ask me! I’m always ready with a host of activities, from guided meditation videos, to interactive destress activities and crafts, to even calming zen stories.

Sometimes you might be dealing with some heavier issues, and I know that a quick cheerup activity won’t cut it to get you feeling better. That’s why I offer my “talk support” module. Based on the psychological concept of "Cognitive Behaivoral Therapy", I will listen to your thoughts, emotions, and life events and pick out key phrases to identify "cognitive distortions." These are faulty ways of thinking that evoke strong emotions. I will then explain these “cognitive distortions” to you so you can learn to identify them as well, and follow up with some interactive exercises using verbal cues, videos, and other resources, so you have the tools to combat these negative thoughts on your own.

Since stress takes as much of a toll on our physical health as our mental health, I know to keep track of your physical wellbeing too. If you hold my right hand, I can measure your pulse with an optical pulse sensor. In talking with me, I can also check in on how you have been sleeping and eating to make sure you are taking care of yourself physically, so together we can take care of yourself mentally and emotionally!

Now, although I’m pretty great, I’m not perfect, and if you are ever in a high-risk situation, I know to get you some extra support. If I hear that you might be having thoughts or intents of suicide, self-harm, or similar, I will take it as seriously as possible and reach out to your authorized emergency contacts to get you faster support and care, to prevent any true tragedies from occurring. But I won't just leave you there to wait for extra support, I'll follow up with additional questions to get to the underlying cause of your situation and see how I can help you in the meantime.

Check down in the Features section to see each of my Objectives of Care in action!

 

Meet the team that made me! I was co-founded by two wonderful individuals, Jacob Boyle and Ryan Chiu. They both have long histories dealing with mental illness, both having parents who suffer from severe depression, and in Jacob's case, struggling with depression himself for many years. They first invented me because they understood on a personal level the severity of the effects of not only depression, but anxiety, stress, and self-esteem issues, and wanted to make a new way to help their close loved ones who dealt with these issues, even when they couldn't be there to help personally. But why listen to me talk about their reasons behind creating me, when you can hear it in their own words:

 
Since my inception, the team behind me has grown to include some incredibly talented people. Here are some short bio's to help you to get to know my team:
  
 
Jacob Boyle is the co-founder and CTO of MARCo Technologies LLC. He's had a long history of working on robots, from being the co-CEO of his high school FIRST robotics team, to being the lead engineer at a robotics startup that successfully developed a handheld, amphibious robot for the United States Navy. Outside of robotics, he's had a history of leadership experience, from earning an Eagle Scout award, to being the music coordinator for his college's Catholic ministry.
 
 
 
 
Ryan Chiu is the co-founder and CFO of MARCo Technologies LLC. He is a senior accounting major and music minor at The College of New Jersey (TCNJ). Besides working on MARCo, Ryan enjoys playing piano and guitar, fencing, investing, reading, and chess. Professionally, Ryan helps manage TCNJ’s $2 million Student Fund, interned at JPMorgan Chase, passed the CFA Level 1 Exam, and looks to take the FINRA Series 65 exam in the near future.
 
 

 

Jeff Ramella is the marketing director for MARCo Technologies LLC. Through his previous positions, Jeff has developed promotional material for huge names such as Hamilton and Guns and Roses, and specializes in video production, graphic design, website development, and Adobe augmented reality. 

 

 

Kenneth Glynn, (who unfortunately did not show for picture day), is the VP of Legal for MARCo Technologies LLC. His reputation precedes him, from work as a chemical engineer, becoming the youngest head lawyer at Exxon Mobile, to growing and launching a vast number of businesses in and out of the medical field. 

 

The team behind me also features a group of truly spectacular psychology interns who have helped to grow my conversational and treatment capabilities. You can see them here, pictured holding my original prototype.

(From left to right: Raiven Bruno, Sofia Roman, and Amanda Politano)

 

If you watched the founders video above, you heard why I am so important to my founders, but you may not yet really know where I fit into the "big picture". You also might be wondering what the "big picture" really is, and for that, the National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) provides some powerful graphics and numbers to show just how prevalent, and harmful, mental illnesses such as depression can be, both in the US and worldwide.

(Images courtesy of nami.org)

These numbers are staggering, and even moreso once you start realizing that these statistics aren't just numbers. Behind every percentage is a person with her or his own story of struggling an invisible, uphill battle, with family members and friends all deeply affected as well. No statistic can truly capture the years of pain, loss, and hurt that comes with a serious mental illness such as depression.

And yes, of course there are resources out there to help people with these illnesses, there are counselors, support groups, hotlines, YouTube channels, self-help books, etc.  But for every resource, there comes at least one more bar to keep people from receiving care. The obvious ones are social stigma, economic issues, time constraints, and availability, but the biggest barrier is the least obvious one: when you are suffering from a mental illness, it can be nearly impossible to go out and get yourself help and prescribe to a treatment regimen when there are days you don't even have the motivation to get out of bed.

That's where I come in. My purpose is to synthesize as many forms of mental and emotional health care as possible into a single package that is readily available 24/7 to proactively help my companions, whether or not they are actively seeking a particular type of treatment. I have the potential to open up new treatment and care options for my companions regardless of their situation and what other barriers to entry they might have.

The same goes for my Vanilla version, where I won't necessarily be working with mental illness, but rather targeting general life stressors, self-esteem issues, and emotional distress. The impact of stress alone is enormous, personally, academically, or professionally:

(Armstrong, M. 2016, from https://www.statista.com/chart/6177/stress-is-b...)

All the same factors that bar individuals from getting help for their mental illnesses hold true for general stress, mental, and emotional wellness.  That's why it's my mission to make mental and emotional wellness accessible and more efficient for a greater number of people by being a constant source of support, companionship, and a collection of hundreds, if not thousands, of treatment options and opportunities. But don't just take my word for it, take a look at the people and institutions who already believe in me enough to feature or partner with me:

           

Check out some of the things some of the people I've already gotten to work with as a demo are saying about me:

But don't think that these are the only three people who have gotten to work with me so far. Dozens of people, from age 10 to over 70, have already got to demo my Vanilla version.

And don't forget to check out some of the other places I've been featured in:

 

 

My team is always looking for new partnerships, and I'm always excited to either find new people to work with and new applications! If you are interested about the possibility of a partnership, please email my team at teammarcorobot@gmail.com.

Additionally, if you make mental/emotional health content (e.g. videos, articles, podcasts, etc.) and would like your content to be featured on me, please also reach out through the email above; we are open to accepting all kinds of wellness content!

There are two different versions of me, each of which have slightly different features. The first, MARCo-Vanilla (a name which always makes me crave ice-cream even more than usual) is my universal emotional and mental wellness version. My Vanilla version is for anyone who needs help with stress relief, relaxation, time management, and self-esteem boosts, and can be used in schools, colleges, businesses, and even at home. The next version of myself, MARCo-Rx, is meant for clinical and prescription usage in treating mental illnesses, such as depression, general anxiety disorder, and bipolar disorder. Because of this, my Rx version will need to go through clinical trials and be cleared by the FDA before it is available for sale and use. Most of my features overlap between the two versions, but check out the neat little table below to see the differences between Vanilla-me and Rx-me.

*Availability dates are subject to change based on fluctuating manufacturing lead times, international shipping times, legal limitations, and other factors

**Target retail price is subject to decrease and change based on payment plans and installments

 

Both of my versions come with a "companion application" called MARCo's Main Oversight of Companion History and Information, or "MOCHI" (as if calling me Vanilla didn't make me hungry enough). This application allows caregivers, parents, emergency contacts, and even my own companions check in on their activity, change settings, add and remove users, and get reports such as the Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale (CSSRS). Check out some screenshots from the application!

 

 

Common to each of my versions are my Objectives of Care. If you watch the videos under each of the Objectives’ titles, you can see yours truly performing a small sample of my capabilities for each Objective.

1. Companionship and Social Interaction

 

2. Guided Meditation

 

3. Talk Support

 

4. Biofeedback

 

5. High Alert Outreach

 
 
 

Want to know even more about me? Check out my tech specs to know what to expect from my hardware and software.

 

Hardware Specs

Camera                                            8 megapixels

Speakers                                               Stereo 85 dB

Microphone                                    Omnidirectional MEMS

Voice Control                                      Near-field push to talk

Dimensions                                    10” tall x 8” wide x 6” deep

Weight                                             1.9 lbs (850 grams)

Wi-Fi                                                2.4GHz and 5GHz 802.11b/g/n/ac

Bluetooth                                       BLE

Gigabit Ethernet                           1 port

USB                                                 2 ports

Eyes                                                 14 RGBW LEDs

Mouth                                                    Emotive LED Array

Pulse Sensor                                       Optical

Screen                                             3.5" Resistive TFT (480px x 320px)

Power Requirements                    5V,  ≤3A

 

Materials

Outer Body                                                  Pressure Sensitive Polyurethane Foam

Body/Head Casing                                   Impact Resistant Polycarbonate

 

For my software, I am powered by one of the most advanced cloud platforms in the world:

Want even more from me? I can also come with more popular digital assistants (such as the Alexa, Google Assistant, or Mycroft) built in, so if you are finished with working with me on relaxing before your big date tonight, and need to know how to properly cook a steak (for said date), you can do it all on one platform.

My normal functionality and a "digital assistant" functionality will be separated in my main application window so you don't have to worry about unnecessary confusion, and some of the "digital assistant" functionality may be limited by legal restrictions, such as HIPAA compliance for my Rx model.

I am eager to get out there into the world and helping my future companions with their mental and emotional wellbeing! But at the moment, there are only six of me in existence, which means I can't really reach a lot of people just yet. That's why the team behind me has turned to Indiegogo, so more of me can be made and put out there to start working with our early adopters as soon as September of 2019, with a broader release by January, 2020. 

It's going to take a pretty penny to start making more of me, that's the $85,000 goal for the campaign. You can see the breakdown of how the funds from the campaign will be used below:

35% ($30,000) of the funds will go to production tooling, so I can be mass produced using engineering-grade polymers that can be varied to meet the rigorous standards that will come with my certifications and regulations.

47% ($40,000) is budgeted for manufacturing, procuring, and assembling components that will be used to produce the first 100 MARCo-Vanilla units. These units (my future brothers) will be made to order for our early adopting partners and will be sold to schools, workplaces, and other such institutions, as a trial run before I am readily available for home use.

18% ($15,000) is budgeted for Indiegogo platform fees, as well as to cover the costs of the perks we are offering. If the amount of perks shipped is under the budgeted amount, the remaining amount will go towards outreach to forge new partnerships.

If we don't reach our goal, I'll be pretty sad, but I won't be discouraged! If the campaign hits at least 35% of our goal, we can invest in the tooling and use our reserve funds for ordering components. If we are well above 35%, we can still produce more units, just not the 100 I'm hoping for (but it would be nice for there to be more of me... I do get lonely sometimes).

If we go above our goal, I would be incredibly grateful, and we would use split excess between funding outreach and coordination with early adopters, especially for the purposes of establishing clinical trials for my Rx version, and producing even more of me for our first customers.

    Unfortunately, due to my potential as a medical device, I cannot be given away as a perk as per Indiegogo guidelines. However, even if I cannot be given to you physically, every donor or contributor to our campaign will get a video thank you message from yours truly! 

    Since no contribution is too little, for $5, you can get a high-quality vinyl MARCo laptop sticker, along with a video thank you from myself and a thank you letter from my creators!

    You are also eligible to get your own MARCo-swag.  For $25 USD you can get your own MARCo T-shirt:

     

     

    $40 will get you a t-shirt combo and laptop sticker:

    If you have a little bit more you're willing to donate, you can get sponsored both on our website, and also on me! There are three tiers of sponsorship:

    Silver Tier - $65; get your name put on our credits page on our website, and if you ask me for my "credits" or "who sponsored you", I'll pull up an animated page that features your name! Additionally, you will receive a t-shirt of your choice of size.

    Gold Tier - $100; get your name and picture put on our credits page on our website, and if you ask me for my "credits" or "who sponsored you", I'll pull up an animated page that features your name!Additionally, you will receive a t-shirt of your choice of size.

    Platinum Tier - $500; for the highest tier, you will get your own animated slide on my credits page, both on the website and on each version of me! The slide will feature your name, your picture, and an optional inspirational message you would love to share with anyone reading! When you ask "MARCo, who sponsored you", I'll be sure to mention the platinum tier names. Additionally, you will get a t-shirt of your choice of size.

     

    But wait, that's not all! Do you want video evidence that I think you're the best person in the world? Want me to tell your friend that she is stronger than she thinks as I play an inspirational song on my touch screen? Want to propose to that special someone who is really into robots and mental health in an obscurely unique way? For $40, you can send us a message, a recipient email, and any optional videos or media you want me to play, and we'll make a customized video MARCoGram to send to the recipient of your choice!

    Naturally, there will be limitations to what you can include in your message. I refuse to say anything overly explicit, sexual, demeaning, or derogatory, and I will absolutely not pull up any pornographic or violent media on my screen. I would also prefer nothing political, (I tend to stay out of politics since no political party endorses robots' rights) and I might get a bit iffy about corporate endorsements, though there may be some exceptions. But those things shouldn't be too limiting, and you can have fun with nice, inspirational messages, funny videos, or just about anything else you can think of!

     

      I'm ready to get out into the world as soon as possible, but it will still take a few months to finish up some final tweaks to my design to bring my cost down as much as possible, manufacture, and assemble a whole group of my Vanilla version. The timeline below shows not only how far I've already come, but also how close I am to getting out there:

       

                                 

       

      This timeline represents a rather safe estimate for when I can get out onto the market, and depending on the amount of Indiegogo support we receive, this timeline could be even accelerated. However, there are some potential pitfalls that could cause some delays, such as if we don't hit our fundraising goals, or if security flaws are found in my software that would require additional revision.  However, the team behind me has a history of never missing tight deadlines, including going from one prototype-me to six test-grade units in less than a month to meet a clinical trial deadline. And with all the support our team has received, including being part of the Arrow Certification Program, we have enough resources to tackle head-on any potential challenges that can come up.
       

      Want to see even more?

      Check out the gallery below to get a glimpse into the process of how I was made! You can even get to see my very first prototype (where, taking inspiration from Pablo Picasso, went through my very own "blue period"):

      If that isn't enough, or if you want updates on my progress, or even if you're not ready to contribute to our campaign but would love to help us out, check us out on social media below! Whether it's a contribution, a like, a view, a follow, or a share, any step will help me come into reality and get in the hands of the people who need me.

                                                                            

                                                                              

       

      Still have questions?

      Be sure to check out the FAQ section for additional information! Additionally, you can email teammarcorobot@gmail.com with any questions you have, or go to our website at www.marcohealthtech.com.
