Weight                                             1.9 lbs (850 grams)
Wi-Fi                                                2.4GHz and 5GHz 802.11b/g/n/ac
Bluetooth                                       BLE
Gigabit Ethernet                           1 port
USB                                                 2 ports
Eyes                                                 14 RGBW LEDs
Mouth                                                    Emotive LED Array
Pulse Sensor                                       Optical
Screen                                             3.5" Resistive TFT (480px x 320px)
Power Requirements                    5V,  ≤3A
 
Materials
Outer Body                                                  Pressure Sensitive Polyurethane Foam
Body/Head Casing                                   Impact Resistant Polycarbonate
 
For my software, I am powered by one of the most advanced cloud platforms in the world:

Want even more from me? I can also come with more popular digital assistants (such as the Alexa, Google Assistant, or Mycroft) built in, so if you are finished with working with me on relaxing before your big date tonight, and need to know how to properly cook a steak (for said date), you can do it all on one platform.

My normal functionality and a "digital assistant" functionality will be separated in my main application window so you don't have to worry about unnecessary confusion, and some of the "digital assistant" functionality may be limited by legal restrictions, such as HIPAA compliance for my Rx model.


I am eager to get out there into the world and helping my future companions with their mental and emotional wellbeing! But at the moment, there are only six of me in existence, which means I can't really reach a lot of people just yet. That's why the team behind me has turned to Indiegogo, so more of me can be made and put out there to start working with our early adopters as soon as September of 2019, with a broader release by January, 2020. 
It's going to take a pretty penny to start making more of me, that's the $85,000 goal for the campaign. You can see the breakdown of how the funds from the campaign will be used below:

35% ($30,000) of the funds will go to production tooling, so I can be mass produced using engineering-grade polymers that can be varied to meet the rigorous standards that will come with my certifications and regulations.
47% ($40,000) is budgeted for manufacturing, procuring, and assembling components that will be used to produce the first 100 MARCo-Vanilla units. These units (my future brothers) will be made to order for our early adopting partners and will be sold to schools, workplaces, and other such institutions, as a trial run before I am readily available for home use.
18% ($15,000) is budgeted for Indiegogo platform fees, as well as to cover the costs of the perks we are offering. If the amount of perks shipped is under the budgeted amount, the remaining amount will go towards outreach to forge new partnerships.
If we don't reach our goal, I'll be pretty sad, but I won't be discouraged! If the campaign hits at least 35% of our goal, we can invest in the tooling and use our reserve funds for ordering components. If we are well above 35%, we can still produce more units, just not the 100 I'm hoping for (but it would be nice for there to be more of me... I do get lonely sometimes).
If we go above our goal, I would be incredibly grateful, and we would use split excess between funding outreach and coordination with early adopters, especially for the purposes of establishing clinical trials for my Rx version, and producing even more of me for our first customers.



Unfortunately, due to my potential as a medical device, I cannot be given away as a perk as per Indiegogo guidelines. However, even if I cannot be given to you physically, every donor or contributor to our campaign will get a video thank you message from yours truly! 
Since no contribution is too little, for $5, you can get a high-quality vinyl MARCo laptop sticker, along with a video thank you from myself and a thank you letter from my creators!
You are also eligible to get your own MARCo-swag.  For $25 USD you can get your own MARCo T-shirt:
 

 
$40 will get you a t-shirt combo and laptop sticker:

If you have a little bit more you're willing to donate, you can get sponsored both on our website, and also on me! There are three tiers of sponsorship:
Silver Tier - $65; get your name put on our credits page on our website, and if you ask me for my "credits" or "who sponsored you", I'll pull up an animated page that features your name! Additionally, you will receive a t-shirt of your choice of size.

Gold Tier - $100; get your name and picture put on our credits page on our website, and if you ask me for my "credits" or "who sponsored you", I'll pull up an animated page that features your name!Additionally, you will receive a t-shirt of your choice of size.

Platinum Tier - $500; for the highest tier, you will get your own animated slide on my credits page, both on the website and on each version of me! The slide will feature your name, your picture, and an optional inspirational message you would love to share with anyone reading! When you ask "MARCo, who sponsored you", I'll be sure to mention the platinum tier names. Additionally, you will get a t-shirt of your choice of size.

 
But wait, that's not all! Do you want video evidence that I think you're the best person in the world? Want me to tell your friend that she is stronger than she thinks as I play an inspirational song on my touch screen? Want to propose to that special someone who is really into robots and mental health in an obscurely unique way? For $40, you can send us a message, a recipient email, and any optional videos or media you want me to play, and we'll make a customized video MARCoGram to send to the recipient of your choice!

Naturally, there will be limitations to what you can include in your message. I refuse to say anything overly explicit, sexual, demeaning, or derogatory, and I will absolutely not pull up any pornographic or violent media on my screen. I would also prefer nothing political, (I tend to stay out of politics since no political party endorses robots' rights) and I might get a bit iffy about corporate endorsements, though there may be some exceptions. But those things shouldn't be too limiting, and you can have fun with nice, inspirational messages, funny videos, or just about anything else you can think of!
 



I'm ready to get out into the world as soon as possible, but it will still take a few months to finish up some final tweaks to my design to bring my cost down as much as possible, manufacture, and assemble a whole group of my Vanilla version. The timeline below shows not only how far I've already come, but also how close I am to getting out there:
 
                           
 
This timeline represents a rather safe estimate for when I can get out onto the market, and depending on the amount of Indiegogo support we receive, this timeline could be even accelerated. However, there are some potential pitfalls that could cause some delays, such as if we don't hit our fundraising goals, or if security flaws are found in my software that would require additional revision.  However, the team behind me has a history of never missing tight deadlines, including going from one prototype-me to six test-grade units in less than a month to meet a clinical trial deadline. And with all the support our team has received, including being part of the Arrow Certification Program, we have enough resources to tackle head-on any potential challenges that can come up. 

Want to see even more?
Check out the gallery below to get a glimpse into the process of how I was made! You can even get to see my very first prototype (where, taking inspiration from Pablo Picasso, went through my very own "blue period"):


If that isn't enough, or if you want updates on my progress, or even if you're not ready to contribute to our campaign but would love to help us out, check us out on social media below! Whether it's a contribution, a like, a view, a follow, or a share, any step will help me come into reality and get in the hands of the people who need me.
                                                                       
                                                                         
 
Still have questions?
Be sure to check out the FAQ section for additional information! Additionally, you can email teammarcorobot@gmail.com with any questions you have, or go to our website at www.marcohealthtech.com.

story:
1

WHO WE ARE?

Deivee (pronounced as Devi) is India's leading sustainable active lifestyle brand. The brand is built around the ethos of conscious commerce. Conscious Commerce is about putting purpose above profits.

Deivee is founded by Milind Soman. Milind has been a national level swimmer, an accomplished super model, critically acclaimed international actor and off late a very inspiring long distance athlete. Milind has completed the Iron Man and Ultra Man runs and continues to inspire millions through his Pinkathon initiatives.

THE MAT:

The Bellandur Travel Mat is a perfect companion for all your travels. Its an ideal companion for your early morning yoga in the park or your family picnic. Its easily folded into a A4 size and fits into any small carry bag.

THE MATERIAL:
What's unique about this mat is that its handwoven using water hyacinth. Yes the very same water hyacinth, that is killing the biodiversity of all the lakes across the globe. We have found an eco-friendly solution to this problem.

THE PROCESS:

And by choosing to buy this mat you are not just helping in cleaning up the lakes in India, but also helping rural artisans keep the dying art of handloom alive. The water hyacinth is first harvested, cleaned and dried before bing woven with natural cotton yarn to make this exquisite travel mat.

Come support us by pre-ordering one today. Deliveries will begin in 60 days.

 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET:

We want you to help us create the first batch of mats. We are targeting giving employment to 3 families and create at least 1000 mats in the first run.

If we get larger support then we can empower more families to run handlooms and earn a respectable livelihood. The biggest challenge for us it to keep these artisans engaged.

 

 

WHAT ELSE CAN YOU DO?

We would love to have your support in making this project happen. We need you to help spread the word to more like minded folks.

story:
Welcome to the Big Fit Girl 2019 fundraiser for the world's first fitness app catering to every "body" with content that is size-inclusive, accessible to all bodies, weight neutral & body positive.

 

Why We Need to Change Our Fitness Culture and How This App will Help:

Our fitness culture refuses to represent and acknowledge the true needs of plus-size women.  There are currently over 90 million women in North America who are considered plus size yet they remain invisible in any fitness mediums.  At best, she is featured as the before picture in gym and in weight loss ads.  This sends a message that her body is something to be rejected rather than celebrated and in many cases, creates shame and fear about approaching fitness.

The typical advertising strategy for most health and fitness brands is to show women that they think we want to aspire to but this approach actually does the opposite. 

The Big Fit Girl Fitness App will:

  • Represent her with trainers who look like her.
  • Celebrate her body with body positive push notifications.
  • Will give those with limited mobility a chance to get started because if you aren't able-bodied, most fitness Apps don't give alternate options or modifications. 
  • Help change her mindset and move her away from the failing diet culture paradigm and usher her to a sustainable, body positive, health and fitness model.  
  • Will shift her focus from weight as she won't need to enter her weight to join the App.  (almost unheard of in fitness Apps).  
  • Her accomplishments won't be measured in caloric expenditure but rather by achieving small goals she sets for herself. 
  • There will be extensive modifications and options for those with different limitations that will be identified in her user set up and delivered by way of established algorithms. 
  • Give her access to an extensive and diverse fitness library and allow her to workout in various formats, at the gym, at home and on the road. 
  • Eventually, the App will have a community aspect to interact with women from around the world on the same journey. 

It’s time to celebrate your beautiful body and embrace fitness for what it is – fun, affirming, power inducing and a vehicle to body love and improved body image. 

Measuring success by weight loss and inches is an old paradigm that we know doesn’t work for the long term.  Finding fitness related content that doesn’t push diet culture and body conforming standards is a rare and hard find, until NOW!

It’s absolutely time for something progressive, refreshing and most of all sustainable. 

About the Founder, Louise Green:

Louise Green is a global plus-size fitness coach, activist and the author and founder of Big Fit Girl who is changing the narrative and idealistic standards of our fitness culture. In 2008, she opened the first plus-size fitness franchise. As an influential change-maker, Louise has helped thousands of plus-size women find their inner-athlete and love their bodies. Through speaking, writing and coaching women online, she has lead the change in creating a more inclusive fitness culture across the globe. Smashing the barriers of mainstream fitness, Louise is the first plus-size athlete to be featured in publications such as Triathlete Magazine, Bicycling Magazine, Canadian Running and Runner's World's UK. She is also a columnist at Self Magazine. 

What We Need:

We need to raise a minimum of $75,000 to develop and produce the Big Fit Girl Fitness App. This app will be the first size inclusive, weight neutral, body positive and all accessible fitness app on the global market. 

The funds will go towards the development, design and production of the app. This is the first initiative in raising funds and we are confident we will reach our goal.  However, if we don't reach our goal, the money will be secured and invested in an interest bearing account as we continue to roll out further campaigns and initiatives to fundraise.

Take a Look at how does this app differs from the other fitness apps on the global market.

 

The Impact

This project has the potential to truly change the lives of millions of women.  When we give women the right environment and support her power is astounding and she becomes capable of anything. Louise has experienced this first hand in the trenches with plus-size women around the globe with her in-person training business and online coaching program.  The changes she has witnessed in women has been astounding simply by providing the right environment and support.  

There is a real opportunity here to improve lives, health and the well-being of women everywhere.

Risks & Challenges

There is always a risk that we may not reach the full funding through this campaign and will need to continue our funding through other initiatives.  We are fully committed to doing whatever it takes to meet the goal even if it takes multiple initiatives.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, share the campaign video, send fundraising links to your friends, family, colleagues or just on your social media. The more this is shared, the more views it will get and the more potential there is to raise the money. Use the share buttons in the campaign to pass the message on.

story:
Saturday Dec 1st Update, Last chance to win a FREE RETREAT.....

Goodmorning Family and Friends, Yogis and Yoginis,

So we are going to find an alternative place to create a Yoga Paradise in Crete, we booked tickets to scout end of march. Tomorrow this campaign is closing but all money donated will be kept and used for the new ShivaShaktiYogaTemple to be. Hope to show you some sketches tomorrow, before the grand finale: the FREE RETREAT LOTTERY !! now there are circa 50 names in the box.... so here is still your VERY GOOD CHANCE..... to win a retreat !!

Last weekend for your donations to the yogic lifestyle..... life on a retreat, on just as life in the comfort of your own space by joining Tara through the yogavideo, or even if you get inspired; the yoga e-course. Tara will start a new Yoga and Rawfood e-coursegroup at X-mas, with all kind of extras on top of the online course..

Today we'll start sending out the"perks", what jerk made up that word..., the rewards, gifts...check your mailboxes !!

thanks for all support up till now and you will hear more from us in the new year, so happy healthy blessed and inspired NewYear to all of YOU !!

Wednesday Nov 14th Update, We need go for an alternative (place)...

Goodmorning World, Family and Friends,

It wasn't meant to be... it is hopefully still going to happen...but not at Rohans land, as we didn't got enough funds together at the 11/11deadline... . Although we were almost there, for a brief moment, before common sense put a break on unbridled enthousiasm. We got to the deadline with a 150.000 € with your help by spreading the word, small and large donations, promises of loans, and an inspiring partnership to be with Beate, we fell 50.000 short....so the moment passed.

Nevertheless, we got really warmed up to the idea, the project of moving into a retreat-space in this second half of life phase we're growing into...so we will go and scout for an alternative. Maybe we need to start from scratch, maybe we chance upon an even better fitting place. Hard to imagine, but honestly the world is wide and full of surprises.

For now we are still totally taken by the beauty and vibration of Crete, so will pick up the trail there first, end of March 2019.

We pray to bear with us for some time if you'd like to stick to the "free retreat in crete" option, because obviously we can not promise when that is going to be available right now...

Of course you can reschedule to Spain, India, or Bali if in hurry...

All other reward stand and stay as they are, and more to come..

 

Crowdfunding is still running another three weeks and all funds collected go into the creating of an alternative solution, maybe we take the opportunity and time to remodel the concept, we might create an association of friends of ShivaShaktiYoga Temple, and more... We will keep you posted in the Facebook group and updates on the Indiegogo.

 

By the way we got double the donations as Indiegogo shows,  as they only work through creditcards... and their updates only visible for "backers"... so that's why we opened the Facebook group ( more public than an event... we are learning while doing..) where we will post full results soon. Last days were too hectic to keep you properly updated.

So much for now, thanks for all your support, we take a deep breath and you'll hear more soon !

with love, light and trust

Inti Tara Sky and Surya

 

Short Summary

We would love to preserve, continue and put new life into this most amazing project of a Yogic Paradise  in Crete that Rohan started some 20 years ago. For that we need to raise over 108.000€ as soon as possible!

Crazy you say?

Maybe yes, but not too much so…  And totally worth to try, because the beauty of the place, the temple, the land, the river, the love already invested there and enjoyed in numerous gatherings of yoga and bhajan (mantra) lovers and friends, makes it sooooo worthwhile...

There is a hurry because someone else made a very tempting offer,so tempting that we are compelled to come up with a similar one or loose the opportunity.

THERE IS MUCH MORE HURRY NOW, WE ARE RUNNING OUT OF TIME 11 WE CAME UP WITH THE AMOUNT ASKED, BUT THEN OUR PARTNER HAD TO BACK OUT, SADLY ENOUGH...

SO NOW WE ARE BACK TO...LOOKING FOR A 1/3RD SHAREHOLDER/PARTNER, SOMEONE WILLING TO PUT IN A 100.000 € AND BE FULL PART OF THE DREAM AND THE REALISING OF IT; A YOGA TEMPLE AND PARADISE IN CRETE... CALL US DIRECTLY 0034 699 561 765 OR 0034 699 035 695  PLEASE SPREAD THE MESSAGE INTI AND TARA

We love to hold the space, now that kids are done with school, retreat from the buzz of town and live the yogic life. This place is a perfect fit, ever since we first set foot there, felt as coming home. And besides it is such a size that finally we could invite family and friends over to share in that blessing. That could be you too, as we plan to host retreats focussed on Yoga, Bhayan, Nature, Massage, Art and more, to start during the long summers of Crete. It will be meetings of friends, continue in the spirit as before but with a slight gender balancing towards a ShivaShaktiYoga Paradise.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Somehow we need to bring together a large amount of money. More than we Tara and Inti have and so we asked for a loan to Inti's family, which they might be willing to grant provided that our idea of crowdfunding proves succesful. That would come to a third of the price. Then we had a third partner who regretfully backed out, So that left us with too high installments over the next 5 years. That's what made the offer of the other so tempting. But we would love to keep it in the family, and so does Rohan, in his heart. So there is the deal; show proof of our financial credibillity by magically raising a substantial amount of money in a really short time; so we came up with say 108.000€ in a week time. We brought that down to an initial 30.000€ set as goal for this campaign to sweeten the prospect of succes.

The maths go like this; Average we invite 20 friends, who invite their 20 friends (makes 400 reached) they invite theirs in 2nd step (8000 reached) and only one step further we aim to reach near 160.000 people ! If only actually 7% donate 10 € that makes 112.000€ !! Too good to be true ? Check the maths. 

We invite you, as a friend suggested, to for one day skip your coffee, beer or lunch whatever, and donate the saving to the fund, and feel the better, healthier even, for it ?!

There is more to it; you can taste from what you help preserve and grow; we offer "rewards" !

in short;   WHY? WHAT WOULD YOU WIN BY IT?

First of all; our eternal deeply felt gratitude!

Second; the knowledge that you contributed saving and furthering the growth of a beautiful Yoga-Paradise on earth, on Crete.

Third; If you like, we put you on the mailing list and so you can be notified when and how to experience firsthand the joy of yogic lifestyle, of what you helped to fund. See below under “Retreats”. 

The fourth reason is the fruits; the REWARDS offered, aligned to the amount donated, ranging from beautiful Calendars to a chance of free retreat in Crete or at Sunfoodyoga Retreats in Spain, as part of the retreat-lottery option, and more…. see under “rewards”

Take a deep Breath: long; the list of Rewards:

for all 10+ € gifts we offer
A full color Yoga 2019 calendar 
This will be digital, but easy to print, we’ll make sure of that, and aims to inspire the best of Yoga in body and mind in you and will keep you up to date in seasonal, western Christian and eastern Hindu festive times. (Inti’s thing, in the making… see: https://www.facebook.com/inti.kijay
And  a downloadable album of heart-opening and ecstatic Mantras & Spanish & English medicine songs sung by Sky and Tara together with classical guitar. And we will also gift you a spiritual songbook with over 130 song lyrics and guitar chords. Listen to some of that on https://soundcloud.com/skyshanti

For all gifts of 50+€ we offer
A chance to win FREE RETREAT that we will raffle at Rohan;s birthday December 2nd, end of campaign; one in Crete, one in Spain.
A guided Yoga video and Rawfood recipes ebook, both by Tara from her experiences at SunfoodYoga Retreats. get inspired at: https://www.sunfoodyoga.com/food/raw-food-recip...

For gifts of 150+€ we offer
A chance to win FREE RETREAT .... and;
The not-to-miss complete “7 Chakra Yoga e-course” for a fraction of its worth; to guide you into actual yoga practice. see: https://sunfoodyoga.com/online-yoga-course.html

For gifts of 500+€ we offer
A chance to win FREE RETREAT .... and;
One FREE RETREAT in Crete, or or if you prefer, you can use the voucher for a very generous discount on retreats in Spain, India or Bali; In that case you donate 500€ and gift yourself 700€ total discount over two retreats, or share the discounts with a friend and come together on one…
https://sunfoodyoga.com/retreats.html

Of course if you consider even larger generous donation, but like a refunding in case the crowd funding might fail, that would also be most welcome and then please contact us (before) directly through sunfoodyoga@gmail.com

 

WHAT IF IT FAILS? WHAT HAPPENS TO YOUR MONEY?

Well most obviously we won’t be able to reward you the retreats offered in Crete, so those who opted for them will be offered similar in Spain and India, only then we need to ask a minimum extra to cover the costs of extra accommodation, since in that in that case we need to rent those. 

We frankly ask for donations freely given, such you feel, you can easily miss and/or are worth the rewards. So that, in case of failing, we ask that we can freely reschedule the money given to finding an alternative place and meanwhile setting up a digital yoga-space, that is; ShivaShaktiYoga.com a website to host a wealth of Yoga related material and aims to serve as a platform to connect and redirect yogalovers to knowledge and experiences, to link to retreats, courses, videos, places to go, etcetera. That might be exactly the platform through which you yourselves might like to reach out and connect, in the future.

NB in India next week will DIWALI be celebrated, the Festival of (hundreds of millions of) Lights centering around the honouring of Sri Lakshmi, the Goddess of Fortune and Good Luck for All.
so we are in very auspicious company indeed! Jay Ma !
Victory to the Mother, Salutations to Lakshmi, Blessings to All !

 

The Impact

This will preserve a place infused with Love and Songs, with Beauty and Inspirations for the future generations. 

 

Tara organises Yoga retreats for already over 20 years, most now in Spain with Rawfood, the winters in India , mother of Yoga and heart and soulwarming and in Bali with Sequoia and Sound Healing. see:  https://sunfoodyoga.com/retreats.html

Inti gave on his own and with partner Tara many PartnerYoga classes while being winters in India and recently on PartnerYoga and Thaimassage Retreat in Spain. Is an accomplished masseur too!

Sky recently completed his yoga teacher training in India, developed into a very inspiring bhajan (mantra) singer and guitarist and as such helps out to great joy on retreats and in the (rawfood)kitchen too.

Risks & Challenges

I, Inti, love challenges, of the nice kind... and this whole project is a major one !

The place is soooo dear to my heart and saw it over the years unfold, blossom , helped Rohan at times building and enjoyed his friendship, hospitality and Yogic Life !

That drives this campaign and in case of failure probably a lot will we won too; new connections, maybe new suggestions to look and try elsewhere, the freedom to take a break... 

We frankly ask for donations freely given, such you feel, you can easily miss and/or are worth the rewards. So that, in case of failing, we ask that we can freely reschedule the money given to finding an alternative place and meanwhile setting up a digital yoga-space, that is; ShivaShaktiYoga.com a website to host a wealth of Yoga related material and aims to serve as a platform to connect and redirect yogalovers to knowledge and experiences, to link to retreats, courses, videos, places to go, etcetera. That might be exactly the platform through which you yourselves might like to reach out and connect, in the future.  

And again; Of course if you consider even really larger generous donation, but like a refunding in case the crowd funding might fail, that would be garanteed and also be most welcome !  please contact us (before) directly through sunfoodyoga@gmail.com to agree on the details.

Other Ways You Can Help

As suggested; Maybe skip for one day  your coffee, beer or lunch whatever, and donate the saving to the fund, and feel the better, healthier even, for it ?!

If you are incredibly low on money you might still help, be rich in freedom and time to connect and share this project, the link and link to FB-event-page:     https://www.facebook.com/events/553073525164412/

with as many people as you can. You may ask me for a template invitation letter through contacting me at: vinzme@yahoo.co.uk

Also Indiegogo has great sharing tools !!

Thank you, Thank you !! 

Thank you for reading, Thank you for sharing, inviting and if you wish, for donating!

 

NB;    As Indiegogo works through creditcards only...

if you don't have one we gladly receive through Paypal  (vinzme@yahoo.co.uk)

or direct on bankaccount:   Mr V J P Meys, Amsterdam, Holland

                                                  IBAN NL62 INGB 0001 2409 89 

include please for Crete Crowdfund and specify  the reward ("perk") you'd like !

And Now it is all in the hands of God, Goddess, the Universe and we are no more than instrument in the unfolding of Awareness, Truth and Joy ! (Isn't that a nice mantra to live by ?)
story_txt:
Saturday Dec 1st Update, Last chance to win a FREE RETREAT.....
Goodmorning Family and Friends, Yogis and Yoginis,
So we are going to find an alternative place to create a Yoga Paradise in Crete, we booked tickets to scout end of march. Tomorrow this campaign is closing but all money donated will be kept and used for the new ShivaShaktiYogaTemple to be. Hope to show you some sketches tomorrow, before the grand finale: the FREE RETREAT LOTTERY !! now there are circa 50 names in the box.... so here is still your VERY GOOD CHANCE..... to win a retreat !!
Last weekend for your donations to the yogic lifestyle..... life on a retreat, on just as life in the comfort of your own space by joining Tara through the yogavideo, or even if you get inspired; the yoga e-course. Tara will start a new Yoga and Rawfood e-coursegroup at X-mas, with all kind of extras on top of the online course..
Today we'll start sending out the"perks", what jerk made up that word..., the rewards, gifts...check your mailboxes !!
thanks for all support up till now and you will hear more from us in the new year, so happy healthy blessed and inspired NewYear to all of YOU !!
Wednesday Nov 14th Update, We need go for an alternative (place)...
Goodmorning World, Family and Friends,
It wasn't meant to be... it is hopefully still going to happen...but not at Rohans land, as we didn't got enough funds together at the 11/11deadline... . Although we were almost there, for a brief moment, before common sense put a break on unbridled enthousiasm. We got to the deadline with a 150.000 € with your help by spreading the word, small and large donations, promises of loans, and an inspiring partnership to be with Beate, we fell 50.000 short....so the moment passed.
Nevertheless, we got really warmed up to the idea, the project of moving into a retreat-space in this second half of life phase we're growing into...so we will go and scout for an alternative. Maybe we need to start from scratch, maybe we chance upon an even better fitting place. Hard to imagine, but honestly the world is wide and full of surprises.
For now we are still totally taken by the beauty and vibration of Crete, so will pick up the trail there first, end of March 2019.
We pray to bear with us for some time if you'd like to stick to the "free retreat in crete" option, because obviously we can not promise when that is going to be available right now...
Of course you can reschedule to Spain, India, or Bali if in hurry...
All other reward stand and stay as they are, and more to come..
 
Crowdfunding is still running another three weeks and all funds collected go into the creating of an alternative solution, maybe we take the opportunity and time to remodel the concept, we might create an association of friends of ShivaShaktiYoga Temple, and more... We will keep you posted in the Facebook group and updates on the Indiegogo.
 
By the way we got double the donations as Indiegogo shows,  as they only work through creditcards... and their updates only visible for "backers"... so that's why we opened the Facebook group ( more public than an event... we are learning while doing..) where we will post full results soon. Last days were too hectic to keep you properly updated.
So much for now, thanks for all your support, we take a deep breath and you'll hear more soon !
with love, light and trust
Inti Tara Sky and Surya
 
Short Summary
We would love to preserve, continue and put new life into this most amazing project of a Yogic Paradise  in Crete that Rohan started some 20 years ago. For that we need to raise over 108.000€ as soon as possible!

Crazy you say?
Maybe yes, but not too much so…  And totally worth to try, because the beauty of the place, the temple, the land, the river, the love already invested there and enjoyed in numerous gatherings of yoga and bhajan (mantra) lovers and friends, makes it sooooo worthwhile...
There is a hurry because someone else made a very tempting offer,so tempting that we are compelled to come up with a similar one or loose the opportunity.
THERE IS MUCH MORE HURRY NOW, WE ARE RUNNING OUT OF TIME 11 WE CAME UP WITH THE AMOUNT ASKED, BUT THEN OUR PARTNER HAD TO BACK OUT, SADLY ENOUGH...
SO NOW WE ARE BACK TO...LOOKING FOR A 1/3RD SHAREHOLDER/PARTNER, SOMEONE WILLING TO PUT IN A 100.000 € AND BE FULL PART OF THE DREAM AND THE REALISING OF IT; A YOGA TEMPLE AND PARADISE IN CRETE... CALL US DIRECTLY 0034 699 561 765 OR 0034 699 035 695  PLEASE SPREAD THE MESSAGE INTI AND TARA
We love to hold the space, now that kids are done with school, retreat from the buzz of town and live the yogic life. This place is a perfect fit, ever since we first set foot there, felt as coming home. And besides it is such a size that finally we could invite family and friends over to share in that blessing. That could be you too, as we plan to host retreats focussed on Yoga, Bhayan, Nature, Massage, Art and more, to start during the long summers of Crete. It will be meetings of friends, continue in the spirit as before but with a slight gender balancing towards a ShivaShaktiYoga Paradise.
 

What We Need & What You Get
Somehow we need to bring together a large amount of money. More than we Tara and Inti have and so we asked for a loan to Inti's family, which they might be willing to grant provided that our idea of crowdfunding proves succesful. That would come to a third of the price. Then we had a third partner who regretfully backed out, So that left us with too high installments over the next 5 years. That's what made the offer of the other so tempting. But we would love to keep it in the family, and so does Rohan, in his heart. So there is the deal; show proof of our financial credibillity by magically raising a substantial amount of money in a really short time; so we came up with say 108.000€ in a week time. We brought that down to an initial 30.000€ set as goal for this campaign to sweeten the prospect of succes.
The maths go like this; Average we invite 20 friends, who invite their 20 friends (makes 400 reached) they invite theirs in 2nd step (8000 reached) and only one step further we aim to reach near 160.000 people ! If only actually 7% donate 10 € that makes 112.000€ !! Too good to be true ? Check the maths. 
We invite you, as a friend suggested, to for one day skip your coffee, beer or lunch whatever, and donate the saving to the fund, and feel the better, healthier even, for it ?!
There is more to it; you can taste from what you help preserve and grow; we offer "rewards" !
in short;   WHY? WHAT WOULD YOU WIN BY IT?
First of all; our eternal deeply felt gratitude!
Second; the knowledge that you contributed saving and furthering the growth of a beautiful Yoga-Paradise on earth, on Crete.
Third; If you like, we put you on the mailing list and so you can be notified when and how to experience firsthand the joy of yogic lifestyle, of what you helped to fund. See below under “Retreats”. 
The fourth reason is the fruits; the REWARDS offered, aligned to the amount donated, ranging from beautiful Calendars to a chance of free retreat in Crete or at Sunfoodyoga Retreats in Spain, as part of the retreat-lottery option, and more…. see under “rewards”

Take a deep Breath: long; the list of Rewards:
for all 10+ € gifts we offerA full color Yoga 2019 calendar This will be digital, but easy to print, we’ll make sure of that, and aims to inspire the best of Yoga in body and mind in you and will keep you up to date in seasonal, western Christian and eastern Hindu festive times. (Inti’s thing, in the making… see: https://www.facebook.com/inti.kijayAnd  a downloadable album of heart-opening and ecstatic Mantras & Spanish & English medicine songs sung by Sky and Tara together with classical guitar. And we will also gift you a spiritual songbook with over 130 song lyrics and guitar chords. Listen to some of that on https://soundcloud.com/skyshanti
For all gifts of 50+€ we offerA chance to win FREE RETREAT that we will raffle at Rohan;s birthday December 2nd, end of campaign; one in Crete, one in Spain.A guided Yoga video and Rawfood recipes ebook, both by Tara from her experiences at SunfoodYoga Retreats. get inspired at: https://www.sunfoodyoga.com/food/raw-food-recip...
For gifts of 150+€ we offerA chance to win FREE RETREAT .... and;The not-to-miss complete “7 Chakra Yoga e-course” for a fraction of its worth; to guide you into actual yoga practice. see: https://sunfoodyoga.com/online-yoga-course.html
For gifts of 500+€ we offerA chance to win FREE RETREAT .... and;One FREE RETREAT in Crete, or or if you prefer, you can use the voucher for a very generous discount on retreats in Spain, India or Bali; In that case you donate 500€ and gift yourself 700€ total discount over two retreats, or share the discounts with a friend and come together on one…https://sunfoodyoga.com/retreats.html
Of course if you consider even larger generous donation, but like a refunding in case the crowd funding might fail, that would also be most welcome and then please contact us (before) directly through sunfoodyoga@gmail.com
 
WHAT IF IT FAILS? WHAT HAPPENS TO YOUR MONEY?
Well most obviously we won’t be able to reward you the retreats offered in Crete, so those who opted for them will be offered similar in Spain and India, only then we need to ask a minimum extra to cover the costs of extra accommodation, since in that in that case we need to rent those. 
We frankly ask for donations freely given, such you feel, you can easily miss and/or are worth the rewards. So that, in case of failing, we ask that we can freely reschedule the money given to finding an alternative place and meanwhile setting up a digital yoga-space, that is; ShivaShaktiYoga.com a website to host a wealth of Yoga related material and aims to serve as a platform to connect and redirect yogalovers to knowledge and experiences, to link to retreats, courses, videos, places to go, etcetera. That might be exactly the platform through which you yourselves might like to reach out and connect, in the future.
NB in India next week will DIWALI be celebrated, the Festival of (hundreds of millions of) Lights centering around the honouring of Sri Lakshmi, the Goddess of Fortune and Good Luck for All.so we are in very auspicious company indeed! Jay Ma !Victory to the Mother, Salutations to Lakshmi, Blessings to All !

This will preserve a place infused with Love and Songs, with Beauty and Inspirations for the future generations. 
 
Tara organises Yoga retreats for already over 20 years, most now in Spain with Rawfood, the winters in India , mother of Yoga and heart and soulwarming and in Bali with Sequoia and Sound Healing. see:  https://sunfoodyoga.com/retreats.html

Sky recently completed his yoga teacher training in India, developed into a very inspiring bhajan (mantra) singer and guitarist and as such helps out to great joy on retreats and in the (rawfood)kitchen too.

And again; Of course if you consider even really larger generous donation, but like a refunding in case the crowd funding might fail, that would be garanteed and also be most welcome !  please contact us (before) directly through sunfoodyoga@gmail.com to agree on the details.

Thank you, Thank you !! 
Thank you for reading, Thank you for sharing, inviting and if you wish, for donating!

or direct on bankaccount:   Mr V J P Meys, Amsterdam, Holland

story:
Hydration without the Hassle

The ParaValve straw lid is better than Hydro Flask's straw lid in every way: Ours is leak-proof, theirs is not; Ours is insulated, theirs is not; Ours drinks with little effort, with theirs you suck against a vacuum.

The ParaValve lid just finished the first production run on Dec, 24, so your risk as a backer is extremely low.

The biggest problem with conventional straw lids is not how the water gets out, it’s the miserly way they let in air. Without a free flow of air into the bottle to replace the water taken out, you end up sucking against a vacuum.

 

After three years of playing with different approaches, we came up with the dual ball valve design. When open, the ParaValve dual ball valve system has a large zero resistance air flow, so there is no vacuum produced; This also means you can drink quietly without your bottle announcing it with a whistle.   The air path is 9 times as big as the pin hole valve used on the Hydro Flask straw lid, while the water path is twice as big (the Hydro Flask uses in internal straw connection that creates a flow restriction). When the spout is closed, both ball valves close, making it fully leak-proof.

Want the technical details?

The dual ball valve design is patent pending. If you would like a more detailed explanation of what's wrong with other straw lids and how the ParaValve is better, watch our explainer video below.

 

Effortless Hydration

The drinking effort of our lid is as low or lower than just putting a straw into a glass. How can this be? There is certainly no vacuum built up in the glass, but the straw rests on the bottom of the glass, which creates some flow restriction. With a straw lid, the straw is held by the lid, so the bottom of the straw floats above the bottom of the bottle. Although a straw in a glass drinks easy, the ParaValve is even easier. If you want a preview of what drinking from the ParaValve straw lid is like, place a straw into a glass of your favorite beverage, hold the straw off the bottom and sip.

World's First Insulated Straw Lid

An insulated bottle deserves an insulated lid.

 

We wanted to create the best straw lid available anywhere, so we  added an insulating layer, making it the first straw lid to offer insulation.

If you are using an insulated bottle, it will help keep cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot. We tested our lid against the Hydro Flask lid using a 40 oz. Hydro Flask vacuum insulated bottle. No surprise - cold and hot - it performs much better! See our full test results here.

Unlike the single wall lid pictured above, ice water is no sweat for the double wall of the ParaValve, keeping your other belongings dry.

Safe for hot liquids up to 140 degrees (60 deg. C).

Most other straw lids are limited to cold drinks. Now you can enjoy drinking your coffee or tea through a straw - but please be careful! The high flow of the straw can burn your mouth if the liquid is too hot.

We don't recommend using the ParaValve straw with liquids hotter than 140 degrees (60 deg. C); the high flow rate could burn your mouth. There may also be a correlation between drinking very hot beverages and esophageal cancer: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC27...

Ergonomic

Our two finger rubberized handle is rounded to fit your fingers for superior ergonomics. Two fingers means half the pressure per finger, which is especially important for larger water bottles. A full 64 oz. bottle can weigh more than 5 lbs (2.3 Kg).

Three Position Spout

The spout has three positions as shown above. There is a small detent for the open position with gives you tactile feedback that the spout is in the fully open position. There is another small detent in the closed position giving you tactile assurance that the lid is closed and will not leak.

In between the open and close positions is a vent position to release any pressure inside the bottle that may have built up due to carbonation or the contents heating up. A brief pause in the vent position will eliminate back-pressure release of liquid through the straw.

Compatible with popular wide mouth water bottles

The ParaValve lid is compatible with most wide mouth water bottles, including Hydro Flask, Nalgene, CamelBak, Contigo, Mira, Simple Modern, Hydrocell, Fifty/Fifty, Topoko, Buzio, Hiwill, and Earthwell. See the compatibility list on our web site here.

 Easy Care & Mold Resistant

Comes with two full length straws and a straw cleaning brush. Unlike rubber tipped spouts, the solid mouthpiece leaves no place for mold to hide. The lid is top rack dishwasher safe, but we recommend cleaning the straws by hand using the included straw cleaning brush.  The straws must be cut to length for your bottle. Thankfully, this is easy, and we have detailed instructions on our web site. Made from BPA free polypropylene for your health and safety.

A Safer way to drink and drive

I was drawn to straw lids for the quick access, but after using them for a while, I realized that I can drink without taking my eyes off the road when driving or riding a bike. It’s amazing how much of the road can be blocked by drinking from a water bottle. For me a straw lid is the only safe way to drink when driving a car.

One Hand Bottle Ninja?

 

With a little practice, you too can become a one hand bottle ninja!

Project Status

We have just completed the injection molds and finished testing the production prototypes. The lids work beautifully. The molds are paid for, as is our initial production run. We had the manufacturer ship us the first box of 100 production units, and they are already here; the first 10 backers will get their perks shipped in December, 2018. Update Dec. 26: The first production run is now complete, and the shipment is scheduled to arrive in Colorado by mid February.

We are asking for funding to pay for international shipping from our manufacturer in China, plus some initial marketing. We are offering special pricing on the ParaValve lid, and the chance to be the first ones using our effortless, leak-proof and insulated straw lid. The best discounts go to the earliest backers.


 

Risks & Challenges

We know that investing in an unknown company is potentially risky, and not all crowd funded projects come to fruition. We’ve taken out most of the risk by proving our design with the actual production tooling. We’ve tested the first 100 samples from the production line and found zero production problems. Production is underway now and should be complete by the end of 2018.  We estimate an additional 6 weeks for the lids to arrive at our facility in Colorado.

It’s possible that there will be some snag in manufacturing, or that shipping will take longer than anticipated. We expect to be ship all rewards before the end of February, 2019, but it’s possible this could slip by one or two weeks. Since we are so far along with this project, the chance of the lids never being produced is almost zero. We appreciate our backers and take our commitment to sending them the best straw lid ever made seriously.

We’ve been in the water bottle business for 2 and a half years, and this is the 3rd lid we have designed, manufactured and imported. We sell our other products under the Eveau brand and they can be found on Amazon as well as our web site.

 

We want your help bring this to the world

You can help us by backing our campaign, and/or by sharing this campaign with your sports minded friends and co-workers. We really believe that the ParaValve straw lid will soon be known as the best straw lid on the market. Other lids just don't match up.

Choose your reward and get ready for spring 2019.

Makes a great gift. Each lid comes in retail packaging with two straws and a straw cleaning brush. The straws must be cut to length for your bottle. Free shipping to USA addresses. We recommend that international customers choose 2 or more lids since the shipping costs is more than the lid, and the shipping costs the same for 1 or 2 lids.

The first 10 backers will get their perks shipped to them in December, 2018 from our first box of production units.

NOTE: The Indiegogo platform doesn't handle autofill of the backer form very gracefully. If you get an error on autofilled entries, simple type over them manually to fix the problem. Here is a message from their support line: "Thanks for bringing this to our attention! Yes, apparently autofilling is not advisable when contributing. We strongly recommend contributors to please manually fill out the fields on the payment form or switch to a browser that doesn't autofill the fields for them."

We are offering special pricing on the ParaValve lid, and the chance to be the first ones using our effortless, leak-proof and insulated straw lid. The best discounts go to the earliest backers.


 
Risks & ChallengesWe know that investing in an unknown company is potentially risky, and not all crowd funded projects come to fruition. We’ve taken out most of the risk by proving our design with the actual production tooling. We’ve tested the first 100 samples from the production line and found zero production problems. Production is underway now and should be complete by the end of 2018.  We estimate an additional 6 weeks for the lids to arrive at our facility in Colorado.It’s possible that there will be some snag in manufacturing, or that shipping will take longer than anticipated. We expect to be ship all rewards before the end of February, 2019, but it’s possible this could slip by one or two weeks. Since we are so far along with this project, the chance of the lids never being produced is almost zero. We appreciate our backers and take our commitment to sending them the best straw lid ever made seriously.We’ve been in the water bottle business for 2 and a half years, and this is the 3rd lid we have designed, manufactured and imported. We sell our other products under the Eveau brand and they can be found on Amazon as well as our web site. We want your help bring this to the worldYou can help us by backing our campaign, and/or by sharing this campaign with your sports minded friends and co-workers. We really believe that the ParaValve straw lid will soon be known as the best straw lid on the market. Other lids just don't match up.Choose your reward and get ready for spring 2019.Makes a great gift. Each lid comes in retail packaging with two straws and a straw cleaning brush. The straws must be cut to length for your bottle. Free shipping to USA addresses. We recommend that international customers choose 2 or more lids since the shipping costs is more than the lid, and the shipping costs the same for 1 or 2 lids.The first 10 backers will get their perks shipped to them in December, 2018 from our first box of production units. NOTE: The Indiegogo platform doesn't handle autofill of the backer form very gracefully. If you get an error on autofilled entries, simple type over them manually to fix the problem. Here is a message from their support line: "Thanks for bringing this to our attention! Yes, apparently autofilling is not advisable when contributing. We strongly recommend contributors to please manually fill out the fields on the payment form or switch to a browser that doesn't autofill the fields for them."

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Rick Medina and I am the inventor of the REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebell gyminabox! Even before starting my first business at the age of 19, I was driven toward positive solutions to problems. Creativity is a blessing I appreciate and have leveraged to help many companies by designing new concepts for products, displays, racking, marketing, selling and more. I have over 30 years in sales, marketing, product development, management, and start-up and operation of successful businesses.

It is my passion to offer american products that enhance the life of the end user. REVOLVER's mission is to provide 3G fitness products (“Great, Greater, Greatest”) designed and manufactured using american resources to support individuals in their quest for fitness as a healthy lifestyle choice that promotes optimum well-being; to provide quality career opportunities; and to give back to our communities with support for fitness at all ages, especially in schools. 

REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebells are a revolution in fitness: functionality, portability, space requirement, environmental responsibility, economic barrier to entry, and storability.

REVOLVER is a patented, adjustable, variable weight exercise system or, “gym in a box”.  REVOLVER's multiple functionalities perform as dumbbells, kettlebells, dip bars, and more, as well as many other pieces of fitness equipment through planned accessory components. Thus, offering numerous exercises to capture a full body workout. Hence the name "gyminabox"!

In dumbbell form, REVOLVER offers up to a 34 piece set of dumbbells ranging from 2.5-42.5 pounds in 2.5 pound increments. To employ the kettlebell handle and form, any of the 4 "cylinders" or core bodies are easily removed using patented "w8-lok" technology and the kettlebell handle inserted. Thus, creating a 7 piece set of kettlebells ranging from 5-20 pounds in 2.5 pound increments. When stood on end, REVOLVER dumbbells function as dip bars, offering the safety of being low to the ground and partial body weight assistance. Finally, REVOLVER will be made from high quality, custom blended REVOLVERTHANE! Non-marring, and non marking!!(similar material to a skateboard wheel) HOW COOL IS THAT! Workout anytime, anywhere!!

Your support in becoming a Founders Club member will provide the capital to bring the first 500 sets of REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebell gyminaboxs' into the world. My gratitude can not be overstated and I proudly offer 50% off your purchase of REVOLVER! THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!!! On behalf of my family and the millions of folks we look to help add fitness to their lives in an affordable, efficient, and fun way, I thank you for your time and consideration of REVOLVER fitness products!

What We Need & What You Get

$100,000 is needed to build tooling and 500 sets of REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebell gyminabox product. 

NO other company offers the value of a set of variable weight dumbbells AND kettlebells that replace over 34 pieces of equipment for $200! That is 50% off! No one even comes close at $400, it would be closer to $1000 and still not the same function or utility.

Everyone contributing to my campaign by purchasing one of the first 500 Founders club limited edition REVOLVER dumbbell kettlebell gyminabox sets, will receive their product. All funds will go to tooling and production of REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebell gyminabox product. No funds will go elsewhere until all orders are fulfilled.

The Impact

REVOLVER has numerous planned product accessories to further enhance end user efficiencies of time and space commitment (freedom from gyms or need for an entire room of space), as well as to mitigate financial outlay (a few hundreds bucks amortized over years of use), to participate in weight training exercise, a scientifically proven way to optimize well being, and to enjoy a healthy and fun filled lifestyle. A weighted vest, weighted bar, ab roller, medicine ball, and curl bar are just a few accessories planned for additional REVOLVER functionality after the initial campaign is completed! 

As an entrepreneur, Director of Product Development, and Chief Creative Officer, I have worked under deadlines and budgets to develop and establish new products in such categories as work gear, clothing, hand tools, and services to name a few, that have been sold at retail by national brick n mortar and online sales channels. I understand the importance of performance driven results and delivering complete work product on time and in budget. Having earned a Bachelor of Science degree with the honor of Summa Cum Laude is a testament to my desire, not just to do the work, but to the pursuit of excellence and the greatest possible product as a result!

Finally, I am passionate about adding quality career opportunities by building a company that every employee will be vested in financially and incentivised to act as an entrepreneur and founder! At REVOLVER fitness we value people; both our customer and team member as the highest priority. When it comes to our products we will always be careful to do what is right, always. At REVOLVER fitness, we will not settle for good, we will not rest at better, we will always deliver GREAT!

Risks & Challenges

Yes there will be risk, it is a part of life. However, know that this product has seen alpha and beta testing for years now and has proven itself ready to participate in the marketplace.  Diligence has been exercised in that all tooling and raw material has been sourced with multiple vendors for each component to assure performance and mitigate unknown challenges. Commitments are in place to manufacture and ship product direct to the consumer.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! I can not say it enough. I am blessed with family, friends and now you, the awesome person taking your time to consider supporting what will be an amazing new product that betters the world in many ways. Please tell your friends. I encourage you to pick up one of the first 500 Founders Club Limited Edition REVOLVER 2 in 1 dumbbell kettlebell gyminabox sets, and please use the Indiegogo share tools to pass this on to others! You can also find us at revolverfit.com

Commitments are in place to manufacture and ship product direct to the consumer.  

Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Self protection is the key to preventing further spread of the COVID-19 virus during this pandemic. However, for many people, passing through doors and elevators are unavoidable in their daily routine and it is often difficult to sanitize hands immediately after making contact with handles and buttons.

We introduce a newly designed sanitizing liquid container that have the following benefits:

  • Can sanitize fingers directly on the patented silicon surface, no more hassle trying to open a hand sanitizer bottle. 
  • Small enough to hang on a bag, belt, pocket, or wear as a necklace.
  • Can carry enough sanitizing liquid needed daily for most people.
  • Easier to use means less chance of hand to face virus transfer.
  • Can be refilled with sanitizing liquids such as isopropyl alcohol that cost less compared to traditional hand sanitizers.
  • Less waste compared to single use hand sanitizer bottles.

This easy to carry container can be used easily when one needs to sanitize his or her hand. After pushing elevator buttons or doorbells, sanitizing your finger tip could be as easy as one single touch on the pad.

Instructions

  1. Open container and fill in sanitizing liquid such as isopropyl alcohol.
  2. Sanitize fingers by pressing the silicon surface. Sanitizing liquid only leaks under pressure.

Customize Your Own Design

Starting with orders of 120 pads minimum, we support custom designs that allow you to change the color of the container and add custom logos on the silicon surface. This finger sanitizing pad can be an ideal tool for company advertisement or campaign promotion.

Production

Finger sanitizing pad is designed by Dr. Ku's medical team. All pads will be manufactured in a family owned factory located in central Taiwan.

Warning

Do not use finger sanitizing pad in environments that have fire hazard risk such as kitchens. Most sanitizing liquids are flammable and may remain on the silicon surface.

story:
Covid crushed my dreams! 

My name is Ashley Michelle. I am a licensed, insured and registered Yoga teacher. I'm certified in Hatha, Yin, Restorative, and Chair Yoga. As well Meditation. I eat, sleep and breath all things Yoga. I have been teaching and sharing my passion for almost 3 years, Pre Covid I was renting studio space and running several classes a week.

I have worked hard building up our little Yoga community. We tried so hard to keep our studio doors open. However, in the end the owners decided to close up shop. I was so disappointed . I was just coming into my own with my teaching skills and style. I was lucky enough over the summer months to have students come all the way out to the country (where I live) to join me for classes. Not only was I shocked that some people were driving over 30 minutes to attend a class. I was overwhelmed with gratitude when I asked students for donations for class. I promised that with every donation we would send a portion of the proceeds to our local animal sanctuary! We practiced together all summer long and we raised over $700.00 in funds for our animal friends. 

Winter is slowly creeping up on us and I've had to end my 'Outdoor Yoga' Series. I am lucky to have found a very expensive studio rental option for the winter. However, it is my dream to continue to teach Yoga on my property out in the country. I have been saving every penny I can. However, living on a bartending/yoga teacher wage with the way the world has been going... well let's just say it's not what it used to be!

I have very committed students who love my idea of a Geodesic Dome! They ask me every day when is this idea coming to life!? I promise them that the universe will provide and guide me into what the right move is regarding this huge project. You may be asking yourself "well, why don't you ask your students to fund this idea?".  I feel as if my students have supported me so much in the last few months, that I want to give something back to them. And that something is an amazing, bright and beautiful space to practice and share Yoga in. 

WHAT WE NEED :

$20,000 Canadian dollars will allow us to purchase a 33ft Winterized Geodesic Dome from a Canadian Company. This will also provide us with all the foundational material we need build and put the Dome on.

You can find out more about me and read student reviews on my website www.ashleymichelle.ca 

Thanks for reading 

NAMASTE
