story:
Overview

IQYOU Health is a HIPAA-compliant health platform that takes a deep look at your DNA/genomics, Biochemistry (through labs), and Epigenetics (family history, diet, lifestyle, medications, activity level, and toxin exposure) to produce a 360° full-body health blueprint, to help you get to the root cause of chronic conditions and optimize your health. 

IQYOU does this by:

  • Finding your EpiBioGenetic® vulnerabilities and risk factors
  • Isolating the right diet and nutrients needed for you based on your EpiBioGenetics®
  • Reducing your dependence on pharmaceuticals and medications
  • Building long-lasting health, so you feel better and have fewer trips to the doctor

 

 

 

We currently do not have a healthcare system, but a Sick-Care system with big pharmaceutical companies masking your symptoms and keeping you sick rather than working to get to the root cause of the problem. With so many variables for preventative care, there’s never been a good solution to provide personalization of health, until now.

The power of IQYOU is in simplifying the complexities of staying healthy to provide a real roadmap for your best health, all based on science. Finally, a smart tool that can guide your best health at the touch of a button.
 

Based on the concept of EpiBioGenetics®, IQYOU is the only health assessment tool in the world that combines data from all three critical wellness components to give you an individualized blueprint to improve your health.  We assess genetic susceptibility and lower body burdens of toxic environmental factors through avoidance and detoxification.

 

 

Embedded in the platform are thousands of data points (which map risks and solutions) including over 40,000 clinical studies, 1,000+ prescription drugs, numerous articles and studies on nutrition, supplements, herbs, lifestyle issues as well as EPA environmental studies.

 

 

Start by filling out an initial health assessment (dealing with your lifestyle, eating habits, sleep, stress, toxins, exercise habits, medications & family history).  As you answer, our algorithms will generate follow-up "smart questions" designed                to dig deeper into specific areas of health relevant to you.

 

Based on the data provided, IQYOU will generate an initial Health Score for you, compute known toxic risks based on your location, and recommend certain lab tests to dig deeper and gather more data about particular areas of your health.  

 

Upload your DNA.  We offer a proprietary IQYOU DNA kit that is comprehensive and private and covers the full list of genes we need to look at for your health.  Or if you already have 23andme, you can upload your raw data as a start as well. 

 

* Please note that 23andme only reports on less than half of the DNA SNPs we need.  For a full report, we recommend using IQYOU DNA.
 

 

 

 

DNA is an important part of your EpiBioGenetic® profile, which also includes non-genetic factors, such as your diet, lifestyle, environment, and body chemistry.

IQYOU genomic testing tells you what specific chemicals you most need to avoid, and also which nutritional factors (vitamins, minerals, dietary changes) will make your detox enzymes work more normally.  

This is very important, because when you get the right nutrients to make your liver and other organs work as well as they potentially can, you are generally able to start the process of healing from within, which is our ultimate goal.


 

 

The system will begin to cross-reference all this information against our internal database of 40,000+ medical studies, drug profiles, and nutritional information to provide the user with a customized action plan for improving and maintaining their own unique health.

 

 

Suggestions are presented right on your 'Dashboard' and may include:

  • Recommended Lifestyle Choices: Our system will make lifestyle suggestions and rank them from critical to inconsequential so that you know which changes to make first.
  • Nutrient Balance: Based on hundreds of personal data points, IQYOU will suggest prioritizing the most important vitamins, minerals, and amino acids you need right now to optimize your health.
  • Diet Changes: In conjunction with vitamin and mineral balance, IQYOU is being designed to alert you about foods that may be harmful to your unique biochemistry. It will also recommend important foods for you as well as recipes to help you optimize your diet.
  • Genetic Red Flags: By analyzing your Genomic profile, IQYOU will inform you about risks to your biochemistry, so that you know what potential actions to take to best optimize your health and lifestyle.

 

 

Track Your Health Over Time. Gain Evolving Insights.      IQYOU is There for YOU. 
 

 

 

IQYOU DNA is a comprehensive gene test integrated into the IQYOU Health platform to help you understand how your mind and body work, so you can minimize health risks and live smarter.

IQYOU DNA is much more robust than some other DNA tests on the market. Other tests have far fewer SNPs in their DNA array (while IQYOU DNA has 350+ SNPs embedded) and do not look at Biochemistry or Epigenetics to show you what is REALLY happening in your body. Other tests simply focus on your ancestry instead of health.  With IQYOU, we want to take a deep look at how your Genes, Lifestyle, and Biochemistry work TOGETHER to affect your health.

It's easy to use -- just a saliva swab.  There's no blood.  No needles.  And it integrates directly into the IQYOU platform.  Once your test results are ready, they are loaded into your secure profile and color-coded and organized for you in priority order, with the most important action steps to take listed first.
 

 

Many DNA laboratories require you to spend hundreds of dollars to analyze just 20-30 gene variants in only one body system!  The IQYOU DNA test covers over 350+ key gene variants (called “SNPs”) across multiple body systems.

IQYOU DNA looks at gene variants that not only add to your risk for common conditions (such as obesity, diabetes, and cardiovascular disease), but we look for those that have clear physiological effects, with related lifestyle, dietary, and nutritional interventions. 

IQYOU is the only technology on the market today able to put this level of computational analysis to work for you!

 

 

 
 

As they are released, toxins interfere with normal bodily functions, according to their chemical structure:

  • Pesticides, for example, tend to interfere with nerve or hormone function
  • Plasticizers act like estrogen
  • Various other chemicals interfere with DNA transcription or various enzyme or hormonal functions
  • Heavy metals interfere with brain, immune and enzyme function at various points throughout the body
  • Chemicals, molds, and metals also affect the gut, the liver, pancreas, and so on

There is no organ in the body that is not potentially harmed by toxic exposures,  which can produce a very wide range of possible symptoms. The key to regaining normal function is effective detoxification – effective removal of toxic materials from the body.

 

 

 

 

 

 

No. In fact, IQYOU is meant to make your existing healthcare more streamlined and productive, so you're more aware of your own health. It's important for you to understand the toxins, foods, nutrients and lifestyle factors that are impacting your genes and your biochemistry.

IQYOU is build to collaborate with your health professionals. With everyone working from your same health blueprint, you can maximize your health potential.

IQYOU enables both you and your practitioner to quickly analyze thousands of data points about YOU and provide more accurate, personalized recommendations around food, nutrients, and toxins, so you feel better faster and optimize your body’s ability to perform.

 

Please consult with your physician or other qualified health care professional before using any product discussed within this website. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or condition. 

 

 

If you’re not satisfied with IQYOU for any reason, you’re free to request a full refund within the first 14 days.  Our only request is that you call us first, and let us help you with getting started in setting up your profile. Our goal is to help you get healthy as fast as possible.

 

 

 

When our campaign ends, we will send you a survey to collect your shipping information.

You’ll be among the very first to benefit from IQYOU's advanced health technology! You’ll lock in Indiegogo-only discounted pricing for your early support. We love you! (and you’ll love yourself with the extra relief peace of mind IQYOU will bring)

 


 

If there is a friend or loved one who could benefit from IQYOU, please share this campaign with them! Join us in assisting others to a longer, happier life on our mission to bring easy, affordable, personalized health to everyone. Use the links below or simply copy/paste the URL above and share it any way you’d like :)
 

 

For press inquiries about IQYOU or this Indiegogo campaign, email support@iqyouhealth.com or download our media kit including photos, GIFs, videos, branding, and more below.


 

Risks & Challenges

Over the past year, our software team has been working closely with our science team on streamlining the A.I. and the user interface to make it easy and understandable for both doctors and patients. We envision IQYOU to be a tool you login to weekly to get recipes, nutrient information and lifestyle/exercise goals customized just for you. With that being said, we cannot control everything, in any case of delays we promise to communicate with transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met!

If you are outside the United States, customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally.
story_txt:
Overview
IQYOU Health is a HIPAA-compliant health platform that takes a deep look at your DNA/genomics, Biochemistry (through labs), and Epigenetics (family history, diet, lifestyle, medications, activity level, and toxin exposure) to produce a 360° full-body health blueprint, to help you get to the root cause of chronic conditions and optimize your health. 
IQYOU does this by:

Finding your EpiBioGenetic® vulnerabilities and risk factors
Isolating the right diet and nutrients needed for you based on your EpiBioGenetics®

Reducing your dependence on pharmaceuticals and medications
Building long-lasting health, so you feel better and have fewer trips to the doctor

 

 


 



We currently do not have a healthcare system, but a Sick-Care system with big pharmaceutical companies masking your symptoms and keeping you sick rather than working to get to the root cause of the problem. With so many variables for preventative care, there’s never been a good solution to provide personalization of health, until now.
The power of IQYOU is in simplifying the complexities of staying healthy to provide a real roadmap for your best health, all based on science. Finally, a smart tool that can guide your best health at the touch of a button. 


Based on the concept of EpiBioGenetics®, IQYOU is the only health assessment tool in the world that combines data from all three critical wellness components to give you an individualized blueprint to improve your health.  We assess genetic susceptibility and lower body burdens of toxic environmental factors through avoidance and detoxification.
 


 

Embedded in the platform are thousands of data points (which map risks and solutions) including over 40,000 clinical studies, 1,000+ prescription drugs, numerous articles and studies on nutrition, supplements, herbs, lifestyle issues as well as EPA environmental studies.
 

 
Start by filling out an initial health assessment (dealing with your lifestyle, eating habits, sleep, stress, toxins, exercise habits, medications & family history).  As you answer, our algorithms will generate follow-up "smart questions" designed                to dig deeper into specific areas of health relevant to you.
 
 Based on the data provided, IQYOU will generate an initial Health Score for you, compute known toxic risks based on your location, and recommend certain lab tests to dig deeper and gather more data about particular areas of your health.  
 
 Upload your DNA.  We offer a proprietary IQYOU DNA kit that is comprehensive and private and covers the full list of genes we need to look at for your health.  Or if you already have 23andme, you can upload your raw data as a start as well. 
 
* Please note that 23andme only reports on less than half of the DNA SNPs we need.  For a full report, we recommend using IQYOU DNA. 
 

 

 
DNA is an important part of your EpiBioGenetic® profile, which also includes non-genetic factors, such as your diet, lifestyle, environment, and body chemistry.
IQYOU genomic testing tells you what specific chemicals you most need to avoid, and also which nutritional factors (vitamins, minerals, dietary changes) will make your detox enzymes work more normally.  
This is very important, because when you get the right nutrients to make your liver and other organs work as well as they potentially can, you are generally able to start the process of healing from within, which is our ultimate goal.

 

 
The system will begin to cross-reference all this information against our internal database of 40,000+ medical studies, drug profiles, and nutritional information to provide the user with a customized action plan for improving and maintaining their own unique health.
 

 
Suggestions are presented right on your 'Dashboard' and may include:


Recommended Lifestyle Choices: Our system will make lifestyle suggestions and rank them from critical to inconsequential so that you know which changes to make first.

Nutrient Balance: Based on hundreds of personal data points, IQYOU will suggest prioritizing the most important vitamins, minerals, and amino acids you need right now to optimize your health.

Diet Changes: In conjunction with vitamin and mineral balance, IQYOU is being designed to alert you about foods that may be harmful to your unique biochemistry. It will also recommend important foods for you as well as recipes to help you optimize your diet.

Genetic Red Flags: By analyzing your Genomic profile, IQYOU will inform you about risks to your biochemistry, so that you know what potential actions to take to best optimize your health and lifestyle.

 


 

Track Your Health Over Time. Gain Evolving Insights.      IQYOU is There for YOU.  
 

 
IQYOU DNA is a comprehensive gene test integrated into the IQYOU Health platform to help you understand how your mind and body work, so you can minimize health risks and live smarter.
IQYOU DNA is much more robust than some other DNA tests on the market. Other tests have far fewer SNPs in their DNA array (while IQYOU DNA has 350+ SNPs embedded) and do not look at Biochemistry or Epigenetics to show you what is REALLY happening in your body. Other tests simply focus on your ancestry instead of health.  With IQYOU, we want to take a deep look at how your Genes, Lifestyle, and Biochemistry work TOGETHER to affect your health.
It's easy to use -- just a saliva swab.  There's no blood.  No needles.  And it integrates directly into the IQYOU platform.  Once your test results are ready, they are loaded into your secure profile and color-coded and organized for you in priority order, with the most important action steps to take listed first. 

 
Many DNA laboratories require you to spend hundreds of dollars to analyze just 20-30 gene variants in only one body system!  The IQYOU DNA test covers over 350+ key gene variants (called “SNPs”) across multiple body systems.
IQYOU DNA looks at gene variants that not only add to your risk for common conditions (such as obesity, diabetes, and cardiovascular disease), but we look for those that have clear physiological effects, with related lifestyle, dietary, and nutritional interventions. 
IQYOU is the only technology on the market today able to put this level of computational analysis to work for you!
 
 


 
 

As they are released, toxins interfere with normal bodily functions, according to their chemical structure:


Pesticides, for example, tend to interfere with nerve or hormone function

Plasticizers act like estrogen
Various other chemicals interfere with DNA transcription or various enzyme or hormonal functions

Heavy metals interfere with brain, immune and enzyme function at various points throughout the body

Chemicals, molds, and metals also affect the gut, the liver, pancreas, and so on

There is no organ in the body that is not potentially harmed by toxic exposures,  which can produce a very wide range of possible symptoms. The key to regaining normal function is effective detoxification – effective removal of toxic materials from the body.
 
 

 

 
 

 
No. In fact, IQYOU is meant to make your existing healthcare more streamlined and productive, so you're more aware of your own health. It's important for you to understand the toxins, foods, nutrients and lifestyle factors that are impacting your genes and your biochemistry.
IQYOU is build to collaborate with your health professionals. With everyone working from your same health blueprint, you can maximize your health potential.
IQYOU enables both you and your practitioner to quickly analyze thousands of data points about YOU and provide more accurate, personalized recommendations around food, nutrients, and toxins, so you feel better faster and optimize your body’s ability to perform.
 
Please consult with your physician or other qualified health care professional before using any product discussed within this website. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or condition. 
 

 
If you’re not satisfied with IQYOU for any reason, you’re free to request a full refund within the first 14 days.  Our only request is that you call us first, and let us help you with getting started in setting up your profile. Our goal is to help you get healthy as fast as possible.
 

 

 
When our campaign ends, we will send you a survey to collect your shipping information.
You’ll be among the very first to benefit from IQYOU's advanced health technology! You’ll lock in Indiegogo-only discounted pricing for your early support. We love you! (and you’ll love yourself with the extra relief peace of mind IQYOU will bring)
 

 
If there is a friend or loved one who could benefit from IQYOU, please share this campaign with them! Join us in assisting others to a longer, happier life on our mission to bring easy, affordable, personalized health to everyone. Use the links below or simply copy/paste the URL above and share it any way you’d like :) 


 
For press inquiries about IQYOU or this Indiegogo campaign, email support@iqyouhealth.com or download our media kit including photos, GIFs, videos, branding, and more below.

 
Risks & Challenges
Over the past year, our software team has been working closely with our science team on streamlining the A.I. and the user interface to make it easy and understandable for both doctors and patients. We envision IQYOU to be a tool you login to weekly to get recipes, nutrient information and lifestyle/exercise goals customized just for you. With that being said, we cannot control everything, in any case of delays we promise to communicate with transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met!
If you are outside the United States, customs fees and duties may be required in order to obtain your order. Customs and duties are the responsibility of the buyer. We have no control over how long it takes for international orders to arrive. Please note that many international orders will be routed through a country other than that of its final destination. This is normal and is done to ensure a more secure delivery internationally.

story:
Short Summary

Smart Company - Big Problem - Large Market! Potential Unicorn!

My Name is Tony StCyr. I've been in Radio & Television most of my adult life. I've owned 2 radio stations, operated 4 Cable TV Channels & I am currently the CEO and Founder of Witty Inventions. I've invented a few things over my lifetime but nothing as helpful & beneficial to people as my latest invention I call the "Nose T". Since I was a child I dealt with nosebleeds. About 12 years ago I discovered a safe & natural way to stop a nosebleed in 5 seconds. I decided this discovery needed to be shared so I filed a patent and started developing and testing prototypes. Since i couldn't walk up & punch people in the nose it took some time to test! :) Along the way I sold my home, 2 cars, emptied my savings account & cashed in my retirement. In 2018 and 2019 I picked up a few friends who believed in my product and invested in my company. This helped us get the Nose T to where we are today.

Last year we did some testing at a Tattoo Shop and discovered that the Nose T stops bleeding on the exterior of the nose during and after nose piercing procedures. This discovery has opened an avenue to help people that wasn't even on our radar a year ago. The device is amazing and we have never had it fail on anyone we've tried it on and have never had any returned for a refund.

Children and the elderly are the two most at risk groups. Since nosebleeds are a huge problem & blood can be a bio hazard to others, I'm committed to helping get this item throughout the US and the world as quickly as possible.

We also are donating Nose T's to Schools, Children's Hospitals and other non profit organizations. 

By helping us get this product into the hands of the right people you are helping us alleviate millions of nosebleed sufferers fears & embarrassment, and help keep the environment around us safer.

What We Need & What You Get

I am currently seeking $250,000.00. This is the amount we feel we need to get The Nose T on the shelves of Major Department stores including, Walmart, Target, CVS, Walgreens and others as well as enable us to purchase much needed counter/shelf displays, additional inventory & additional labor for filling orders. 

Everyone who donates will receive a PERK! We are also matching & donate an equal amount of Nose T's to Children's Hospitals and/or Nursing Facilities, etc., for every Nose T we send out. 

We are optimistic that we will reach our goal of $250,000.00. In the event we fall short we will use the funds that are raised to order as much packaging and inventory that we need. We will also employ as many people as we can with funds that remain after packaging and inventory is ordered including a sales representative(s). 

The Impact

If you or someone you know has nosebleeds then you know the inconvenience and mess that it can cause. I had a nosebleed once for 30 minutes and it really scared me. Some people have even been rushed to the hospital for fear of bleeding out. In some parts of the country and the world an Ambulance or a Hospital could be hours away. We already have a few Nose T's in South & Central America, Egypt, China, Canada & other countries, but our goal is to get this device into high risk areas as soon as possible and not just in the United States. We have are actually hoping to donate Nose T's to the UN in the near future to get these into the poor & isolated areas of the world.

As I stated earlier I have owned and operated 6 Broadcast/Cable entities that were highly successful. I've manged lots of employees and dealt with 1000's of businesses in my career. You can be assured that I have the experience and the determination to see this through. People need this device. Soldiers & Military personnel need this device. The possibilities are endless & I'm counting on nice people like you to help us achieve our World Wide goal!

Risks & Challenges

We personally feel that at the stage in the development the majority of the risk has been mitigated. I have a great board of directors and we had a Business Development Firm advising us throughout much of 2019. Now we have two. According to the BDF we had a 7,000% increase in value as we scaled and operationalized the business to the next levels. The BDF also predicted that the company would be a Unicorn (1 Billion Dollar Business) in the near future if we didn't exit too soon.

Currently there are no products on the market that would be considered "competition" so the market is wide open to us. Getting into foreign markets will be a huge challenge with the risk of product theft and duplication. But we feel if we establish the Nose T quickly in those risky global markets and with the new China-US agreement now in place the risks are reduced.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for reading our profile. If you are unable to contribute you can help us greatly by directing your friends & family to our website. You can also help by letting ENT doctors, Emergency Room Physicians, Medical Facilities, Boxers, Wrestlers, Coaches and other Athletes know that help is available. Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools when possible.

Thank You For Your Help!

Tony StCyr, President

StCyr Industries/Witty Inventions

story:
Short Summary

My entire professional life has been dominated by skincare. As well the medicinal part as the cosmetic aspect of skin care has been the leitmotiv throughout my entire career. 

The skin is the first contact we have with other persons.  The touch, feeling, and appearance have a huge impact on our well-being and self-esteem. 

By understanding this psychological impact and combining it with my scientific background, I have been the witness of numerous persons who with correct skincare have seen their life change. 

That is why I decided to create my own products; the best possible ingredients for your skin. To make and keep it healthy, glowing and beautiful. So you look great all day, every day

 

What We Need

The products have been designed, developed and tested thoroughly. 

The first upscaling production batch was successful.

The stability of all 4 products is now being finalized with positive results.

Samples are available and been filled.

We have chosen the primary (jar) and designed the secondary packaging (box).

We are now looking for financing the first commercial batch including the production of the labels, the boxes, and artwork.

What You Get

In return for your support you will receive a luxurious gift box with the 4 products. 

The Impact

Beauty is not only having healthy skin, but it is also a combination of feeling beautiful & being beautiful. When this ultimate combination is achieved, it is an explosive mixture for self-esteem and self-confidence. The feeling of being empowered, that everything is possible gives you wings to fly, the sensation that you can rule the world. That moment is magical. We have created skincare products that capture that magical moment. Leaving nothing to a chance. A unique blend of the most potent ingredients that make the difference for your skin. Exceptional textures - Magnificently designed jars. 

Risks & Challenges

Making a first commercial batch (upscaling the production) is always a challenging step in the commercialization of a product. And as we have 4 products being produced at the same time of which 1 is a liquid, 2 are cream and 1 is an emulsion, we are multiplying the challenges. 

Until now the first upscaling has been successful. We have with success produced 4kg batches of each product and have not encountered major problems. Although we have been adjusting the ingredients of the night cream for better skin sensation and better stability at higher temperatures. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are a high-end beautician or are interested in distributing our products in your country, we would be very pleased to hear from you

story:
You've tried streaming online classes but still, feel nostalgic for the positive ambiance in the gym? If you miss going to the gym, STUDIO is here to help you recreate the complete & real gym experience at your home. Join STUDIO to set yourself up for effective workouts while working from home!

We are one step closer to launching the immersive smart screen that’s more than smart -- it’s brilliant. You are one step closer to linking all your existing equipment, taking class after class from the world’s best instructors, and joining a supportive community of like-minded fitness fans! All that -- in a screen that fits in any room of any size home. Read on to learn more about what the future of home gym workouts means for you! 

We're backed by some of the world's most notable investors.

The original investors behind Uber, and Classpass. 
 
The world’s largest wearable manufacturer.

Yahoo! News "The Studio home workout display works with your existing gym equipment"

Digital Trends "Forget the gym. Studio smart display gives you a great workout at home"

Engadget "...it can connect to a person’s existing home workout equipment, so you don’t need to pay for something like a Peloton bike, for example."

Uncrate "...the Studio uses Bluetooth and sensors to coach you through workouts using what you already have. "Connect The Watts "Meet STUDIO – the new fitness hub aimed at offering an interactive experience with your existing fitness gear"

Now, normally this is where you might stop and Google other options, compare STUDIO to the competition. Let us save you some time. There is no competition. There is nothing like STUDIO out there. Other products are simply another piece of equipment taking up space, or they focus primarily on strength and yoga classes.

STUDIO focuses on you. It connects to almost any type of equipment in your home gym. It has all the treadmill, cycling, strength, rowing, boxing, yoga, and recovery classes you want to take. And, at a fraction of the cost of other inferior home gym products, it fits perfectly within your budget.

Make STUDIO the brains of your home gym via Bluetooth! STUDIO can read the speed of your treadmill, the cadence of your spin bike, and data from your rower, your punch tracker, even allowing you to monitor your heart rate as you work up a sweat. 

If it's smart equipment, STUDIO will connect to it directly over bluetooth. The STUDIO app lets you quickly and easily control your connected equipment in real time with your iOS or Android smartphone. All it takes is a tap to control your new STUDIO home gym, so you can stay in the zone while you’re working out!*Remote control features differ depending on the specific model of equipment.

If some of your go-to gear doesn’t have Bluetooth, we offer sensors for treadmills, spin bikes, rowers, and boxing punch trackers, so you can monitor your stats and log your progress. 

We also work with all Bluetooth Heart Rate Monitors. This helps you stay competitive on our leaderboard, and let us recommend new classes and activities that you’ll love!

The immersive 43” vertical Hi-Def screen gives you all the motivation of the gym -- in the comfort and convenience of your own home! 

With 1800+ classes, and 6 new classes added every day, you’re sure to find the perfect sessions for your interests and intensity!

 

Take your workout with you wherever you go! It’s portable and doesn’t need to be hung -- reimagine your home gym without rearranging your home. STUDIO is built to withstand not only your workouts, but household wear and tear, even the little ones who could cause damage. Unlike a normal television, STUDIO is covered with 4mm damage-resistant tempered glass often found on commercial-grade digital displays.

Use the integrated leaderboard to share your data and results, and get inspired by others in the STUDIO community!

With just one $39/month subscription, you and your entire family get unlimited access to all of our classes, as well as full usage of the STUDIO screen. Seize the Indiegogo-exclusive deal we will ever offer on our subscription and get the discounted $300 annual plan as an add-on perk when you check out. Or download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store and subscribe at $39 per month after you receive your STUDIO smart hub. *Subscription is required to access our video library.


In 2017, we had a mission. Our mission was to make fitness accessible across the globe. 

STUDIO was born. We started out as a mobile app, as a way to perfect our content and software. We had a one-of-a-kind connected fitness platform that tens of thousands of members loved. We just needed hardware. Now STUDIO is here to bring your home gym experience to the next level.

STUDIO's early adopters aren’t just members, they’re our advisors, ambassadors for STUDIO. They’ve pointed us in the right direction with every milestone we’ve hit."

Looking to be a part of the next evolution in home gym tech? Join us as we create and improve upon the perfect home gym! 

STUDIO was conceived, designed and perfected by a team led by co-founder and CEO Jason L. Baptiste, President Nathaniel McNamara, Chief Content Officer Lisa Niren and Chief Technology Officer Rich Couzzi. We are instructors, engineers, entrepreneurs, media and tech experts. But most of all, we are ordinary fitness lovers, always on the lookout for an extraordinary workout.

Mass production on STUDIO begins this fall, with the product shipping to our first backers this November. We are thrilled to have you join us for this incredible journey. Right now, STUDIO is available for purchase in the U.S. and Canada.

For a special, limited time, we’re offering must-have accessories for all types of workout regimens so that you can build up an enhanced home gym experience! Click on the link and select the 'Secret Perk' under the 'Perk' section.

STUDIO Smart Hub comes with a 1-year warranty. You can also purchase a 3-year warranty for an additional fee.

This helps you stay competitive on our leaderboard, and let us recommend new classes and activities that you’ll love!The immersive 43” vertical Hi-Def screen gives you all the motivation of the gym -- in the comfort and convenience of your own home! With 1800+ classes, and 6 new classes added every day, you’re sure to find the perfect sessions for your interests and intensity!



 

Take your workout with you wherever you go! It’s portable and doesn’t need to be hung -- reimagine your home gym without rearranging your home. STUDIO is built to withstand not only your workouts, but household wear and tear, even the little ones who could cause damage. Unlike a normal television, STUDIO is covered with 4mm damage-resistant tempered glass often found on commercial-grade digital displays.Use the integrated leaderboard to share your data and results, and get inspired by others in the STUDIO community!With just one $39/month subscription, you and your entire family get unlimited access to all of our classes, as well as full usage of the STUDIO screen. Seize the Indiegogo-exclusive deal we will ever offer on our subscription and get the discounted $300 annual plan as an add-on perk when you check out. Or download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store and subscribe at $39 per month after you receive your STUDIO smart hub. *Subscription is required to access our video library.In 2017, we had a mission. Our mission was to make fitness accessible across the globe. STUDIO was born. We started out as a mobile app, as a way to perfect our content and software. We had a one-of-a-kind connected fitness platform that tens of thousands of members loved. We just needed hardware. Now STUDIO is here to bring your home gym experience to the next level.STUDIO's early adopters aren’t just members, they’re our advisors, ambassadors for STUDIO. They’ve pointed us in the right direction with every milestone we’ve hit."Looking to be a part of the next evolution in home gym tech? Join us as we create and improve upon the perfect home gym! STUDIO was conceived, designed and perfected by a team led by co-founder and CEO Jason L. Baptiste, President Nathaniel McNamara, Chief Content Officer Lisa Niren and Chief Technology Officer Rich Couzzi. We are instructors, engineers, entrepreneurs, media and tech experts. But most of all, we are ordinary fitness lovers, always on the lookout for an extraordinary workout.




Mass production on STUDIO begins this fall, with the product shipping to our first backers this November. We are thrilled to have you join us for this incredible journey. Right now, STUDIO is available for purchase in the U.S. and Canada.For a special, limited time, we’re offering must-have accessories for all types of workout regimens so that you can build up an enhanced home gym experience! Click on the link and select the 'Secret Perk' under the 'Perk' section.STUDIO Smart Hub comes with a 1-year warranty. You can also purchase a 3-year warranty for an additional fee.

story:
Runners care a lot about product performance.  In the making of FITLY, we logged hundreds of miles, challenging every inch of every component.  We are proud to say that FITLY has the most cutting-edge components available today.  

FITLY is a World's First with its totally awesome patent pending Thoracic Belt System: two subpectoral front pockets attached to a stretch belt that retracts slightly so all items are kept in place when you run and are naturally accessible without affecting your running form.  

 

We are sometimes asked whether FITLY is designed for man and woman.  The upper straps are adjustable.  You can see in the animation below that this particular runner wears FITLY fairly high.  She could have lowered the thoracic belt at least 4 inches/ 10 cm, making it totally fine for both man and woman and even below your cardio.

 

 

1. The Awesome Thoracic Belt System

Picture yourself running. Your hands naturally swing by your thorax making it very convenient to store and retrieve small personal items in the two subpectoral pockets without any impact on your running form. No need to stop or modify your gait to securely store a car key your friend just handed to you or to retrieve a gel.

 

The Thoracic Belt has a gentle stretch (retraction force) which locks all items in place. Nothing moves. No bouncing is possible and the retraction force is calculated to be soft enough to not affect breathing. 

This Patent Pending invention is incredibly useful during vigorous activities, especially runners who want to safely carry a few personal items.

The right pocket has three mini-slots to put away loose coins, a key, lip balm stick, or maybe a beautiful shell you pick up during your morning run so they do not rattle during your peaceful run! 

2. The amazing Fidlock™ Magnetic Fastener

The Fidlock system combines two fastening concepts in one: a magnetic snap and a mechanical lock that clips tightly around 1 of 3 positions, offering useful adjustments while on the run.  

Fidlock revolutionizes traditional fastening systems.

 

3. All-Weather, No Bouncing Phone Slot 

Cell phones are important for security, communication, music, orientation and training logs (apps).  They're so essential, we see people running with them in their hands daily. When asked if they'd prefer to stick it in FITLY and the reaction is always the same.  

Cell phones are expensive, what if it rains?   You need to protect it!

FITLY's Phone Slot is exactly designed to host your cell phone with two significant advantages over almost any other solution:

  • Your cell phone is locked into place in a pouch that sticks to your body, follows its every move so bouncing is impossible.
  • FITLY is water resistant. Your phone is protected from the toughest weather.

With today's headphone button, voice control, and smartwatches, hundreds of phone commands are readily available without the need to stop and access your phone:  Play Music, Skip, Answer/hang up, Call home, Play Radio, Hear messages, etc. Your phone is tucked away, entirely protected from the weather yet perfectly available.

 

Phone in: slide and lock it in.  

 

 

Phone Out: a nifty drawing mechanism makes it easy to pull your phone out. 

 

 

Your headphone cable is routed through the cable slot and special webbings on the straps so loose cables do not dangle.

 

4. High-Durability CORDURA® Fabric

Constructed using high tenacity military-grade fiber technologies, the CORDURA® fabric is exceptionally durable and puncture resistant. 

Our prototypes have been used hundreds of time, under heavy rain, and gallons of sweat with no sign of deterioration.  The fabric is "best in class", used in high-end mountain guide equipment, made to endure the toughest weather.

FITLY IS MADE TO LAST! 

 

5. A nice touch of Green Innovation.

S.Café® is an eco-friendly (Cradle to Cradle certified) soft fabric that combines nylon yarns and recycled ground coffee at the cellular level. The fascinating benefit is natural odor resistance.  Green innovation is a win-win!  The S.Café® fabric also naturally cools your skin temperature down!

Sweat, drizzle, pouring rain, FITLY’s 200% UltraWick is a techno-fabric that drains moisture and leaves you dry.  So soft, wear it on your bare skin!

Run, sweat, rinse, hang… repeat! 

 

 

6. Silent Zipper Tabs

FITLY is equipped with YKK special noise-free zipper tabs.  The tabs cannot move when you run so annoying ticking noise are impossible.  

Silence is gold.

 

7. Smart Multi-Compartments

All you need for a quick run precisely fits in one of FITLY’s multiple compartments. 

  • One Large pocket with your phone slot and a larger compartment where many types of items can be stored.  
  • Two Medium pockets on the back to store keys, additional gels, credit cards, ID, cash, etc. 
  • A clever “secret" Side pocket with a vertical zip to store your most valuable items as well as hydration up to 400 ml/13.5Oz if needed.   

All water resistant.

 

NB: We have posted a list of items designed to be stored for each pocket sizes at the bottom of the page. 

 

8. X-Shape Body Symmetry  

Using the steadiness of your upper back and chest area, FITLY’s X-Shape distributes the weight to snugly fit your body contour.  It allows free running movements while preserving total body symmetry.  

A pleasant feeling of wearing almost nothing…

 

 

9. Bilateral CleverAdjust

FITLY has five easy adjustments to make it your own: 

  • Two bilateral straps adjustments to lower the belt (up and down) so it is correctly positioned below the pectoral muscles. 
  • Two bilateral thoracic belt adjustments to reach sizes varying from 26 in/67 cm (XS) to 40 in/1052 cm (XL).  Your band size is calculated below the pectoral muscles/breasts (same as a cardio or the bottom portion of a bra (band)).  
  • The fifth adjustment is the three-pronged Fidlock Fastening System (see above) with 1 in/2.5 cm micro-adjustments at the front of the belt, useful while running.

 

10. Packed with Water Resistance  

Drizzle or pour, the PU-coated Cordura fabric is water-resistant. It does not make FITLY waterproof but resistant to endure the toughest weather!  

  • The phone slot brings additional moisture protection to the phone.  
  • A fully waterproof liner separates your back from the pockets making it impossible for sweat to affect the pockets' contents.  

No need to time the weather, postpone a work-out or try to outrun the oncoming storm.  No need for a plastic bag either!  Just keep on running and know your valuables are protected.  Very useful!

 

 

11. Safety Reflective Bands  

Front and back safety reflective bands as well as silver reflective logos for your night adventures. See and be seen!  

Also available is a 2-inch long webbing to attach an additional light.  It is especially important for bikers on an early morning ride. 

 

 

12. Whistle

Trivial but important, we placed a mini whistle directly in the front pocket so it can be immediately accessed. 

 

FITLY is a running accessory made for quick runs. The majority of people (85%) we surveyed run with 2 or more items, the most frequent are Cell Phones and keys (car, house, hotel). 

Of the 15% remaining, half would prefer having their cell phone for security and communication in the case of an incident but had not found a suitable way to carry it. 

For longer runs, where hydration and heavier gear affects performance, lots of options already exist.  Hydration is important but less of a focus in short runs (sub 45 min).  You can carry 130 ml/4.4 oz jugs or flasks in one of the front pockets and about 3X as much in the secret pocket.

 

...you can do less!  

Light and thin FITLY is also a clever solution to carry small personal items for travel, day trips, and less vigorous activities, such as kayaking, walking, hiking or just a visit to the museum or a city event. For travel, stick your passport or wallet in the “secret” side pocket for added protection. Wear your FITLY under your jacket for complete security.

 

Three different color accents and 2 sizes.  

FITLY covers sizes from 26 In/67 cm to 40 In/102 cm (under breast measurement), which spans from XS to XL.  Once you have pledged, we will reach out to you for your color and size selections. 

 

 

 

Since we launched FITLY, we have gathered 1000+ Positive Feedbacks!

Some were goosebumps worthy: 

“I love FITLY! I’ve tried multiple running belts and bags and they all ride up or move once I get going. And the material never seems to keep my phone safe from moisture. FITLY stayed snug, fit comfortably, and it kept my phone dry!”  

 

 "FITLY is extraordinary, a true gift to the running community".  

 

 "I wanted to keep the prototype I tested!".  

 

 “I have been a runner my entire life and FITLY is one of the best product I’ve ever used. I can jog or sprint with my wallet, phone, and keys and it won’t move even with the added weight. It feels just like a part of your body”.

 

 "I am running every other day after work and from work. I absolutely need my phone and have to take my car key with me. I tested FITLY. Nothing ever moves and my phone is 100% protected even when it rains. NEED ONE!".

 

Jean-Marc created it. Yohan designed it. Nicolas made it happen technically. Olag gave it a beautiful visual identity. Nicolas made the world aware of it and David is about to fabricate it!  All above average experts in their respective fields.

FITLY is a reality thanks to their dedication and selfless generosity.

 

​

FITLY has been in the works for a long time:

every time our cell phone was bouncing in our running belts,

or the armband was either too squeezy or too lose,

or the bottom of a backpack was rubbing us the wrong way,

or the price was prohibitively expensive,

or the use of plastic bags was the best moisture barrier we could find,

or simply whenever we handed over our stuff to someone else to make it work... 

A visual patchwork of FITLY's evolution:

List of items per pocket:

story:
So What's The Story?

A menstrual cycle will occur monthly within any body with a healthy uterus, regardless of how the owner of that body identifies. And while we cannot always work against biology, we can ease the struggle that trans men face in a market for which personal menstrual hygiene has forgotten.

ArtilleryBox is a monthly subscription to a service thought up and started by those who have been through the dysphoria and discomfort of having a monthly period. They remember and understand the fear and embarrassment that once came with trying to care for a body that did not belong to then.

With this box we aim to provide necessary products for a natural process, in a discreet and consistent way.

Why Now? Why This Box?

Although we as the LGBT+ community have made huge strides and won many battles in recent years, many things get overlooked in our fight for equality. Basic hygiene and care is one of them.

It’s often take for granted how many people with female genitalia do not associate themselves with that gender. Even more do not realize how harmful it can be to give someone no other option but to buy products marketed for an identity they’re trying to escape. More people are discovering their identities younger, with access to the internet and the information therein, and it is crucial that these young people do not feel alien in their own bodies, and in their communities.

ArtilleryBox aims to take away as much of the discomfort and dysphoria associated with buying and using these products as possible. With neutral packaging, quality products, a monthly schedule, and free shipping worldwide, we want to take away the stress behind the upkeep of your body.

We're not trying to reinvent the wheel, we want to bring equality into the realm of health and basic necessities.

What Does The Artillery Box Offer?

  • A set of tampons or pads made from quality organic products (your choice of tampons or pads, and type of flow) to last a monthly cycle. These will be packaged in recyclable, neutral, quiet packaging.
  • No advertising, gendered colours on packaging or gendered terms. The outer box, and the boxes containing the products themselves will be neutrally decorated and give away nothing of what's inside.
  • Information cards with advice about self-care - both physical and mental - to help people safely and comfortably learn to understand and care for their bodies. Both of us were incredibly lucky in the sexual and health education we received, but we know certain countries don't have that as a priority - especially for LGBT folk.
  • Subscription allows you to pay in advance and forget about the hassle of purchasing and storing these products - we will send them to you the same time every month for you to use.
  • Free shipping worldwide - guaranteed. Living in NZ and Australia, we know the frustration that comes with wanting to get anything sent our way. We want our customers to feel comfortable and not to stress over something as inconsequential as shipping. So no matter where you are, the ArtilleryBox can find its way to you.
  • Chocolate. Because everyone needs chocolate when the going gets rough.

Unfortunately, as this service is made to reach a lot of people, and we are just two young men, the boxes cannot be personalized to fit each individual. But we have been working hard on gathering information from our community, and after over 400 responses on our survey we think we have something that will please a lot of people.

Where Will My Money Go?

The money raised will go towards setting up a trademark name and copyright for the box, ensuring that when you buy an ArtilleryBox, you are getting a quality product checked and sent by us. 

It will go on purchasing the products needed per box, per person, per month, as well as on producing the packaging itself. We want to make sure that the boxes reach you safely; undamaged and not tampered with, and that when you get them they look beautiful and inconspicuous to anyone who isn't in the know.  

Money will also be used to establish a self-sustaining cycle of donation and subscription, that we hope to get running within the first year of ArtilleryBox going live. We plan to offer a Pay-It-Forward system with our boxes, allowing people to donate to the cause - perhaps without needing to use the service themselves - and thus giving people of little means access to our product as well.

Are There Stretch Goals?

There are stretch goals!

While we cannot cater to everyone's personal needs in regards to a monthly cycle - since everyone's is so different - we can aim to accommodate as many as we can. The initial launch of the ArtilleryBox will offer boxes that provide just tampons OR pads (in different flow categories) to subscribers. However...

If we reach $6500, we will be able to offer the option of applicators in the tampon boxes. While in NZ and Australia (where the creators are from) applicators are not common, we understand that countries like USA rarely stock tampons without them.

If we reach $7000, we will be able to offer boxes that come with a set of pantyliners, to allow for people to feel comfortable for the days between cycles. These will be offered as a separate option to the boxes that just provide for the monthly cycle, but would not exceed an extra charge of $1.50 per month.

If we reach $8000, we will be able to look into providing reusable and sustainable options in our boxes, such as cups, or reusable tampons and pads. Organic and quality products are of the utmost importance to us, and we want to make sure that anything we provide that will need to be used again is sanitary, comfortable, and good for the environment.

If we reach $10,000, we hope to be able to provide multiple boxes a month to shelters helping the LGBT community. We want to look domestically as well as abroad, and reach as many people as possible. Such a sum would greatly help us spread our wings and change more and more lives.

We hope that with word spreading about this product, we will be able to encourage companies working towards similar goals in our community to donate products to the subscription boxes. If this finds success, we are excited to see how far the ArtilleryBox can grow and how much more we can include after the inaugural year!

But we have been working hard on gathering information from our community, and after over 400 responses on our survey we think we have something that will please a lot of people.Where Will My Money Go?The money raised will go towards setting up a trademark name and copyright for the box, ensuring that when you buy an ArtilleryBox, you are getting a quality product checked and sent by us. It will go on purchasing the products needed per box, per person, per month, as well as on producing the packaging itself. We want to make sure that the boxes reach you safely; undamaged and not tampered with, and that when you get them they look beautiful and inconspicuous to anyone who isn't in the know.  Money will also be used to establish a self-sustaining cycle of donation and subscription, that we hope to get running within the first year of ArtilleryBox going live. We plan to offer a Pay-It-Forward system with our boxes, allowing people to donate to the cause - perhaps without needing to use the service themselves - and thus giving people of little means access to our product as well.Are There Stretch Goals?There are stretch goals!While we cannot cater to everyone's personal needs in regards to a monthly cycle - since everyone's is so different - we can aim to accommodate as many as we can. The initial launch of the ArtilleryBox will offer boxes that provide just tampons OR pads (in different flow categories) to subscribers. However...If we reach $6500, we will be able to offer the option of applicators in the tampon boxes. While in NZ and Australia (where the creators are from) applicators are not common, we understand that countries like USA rarely stock tampons without them.If we reach $7000, we will be able to offer boxes that come with a set of pantyliners, to allow for people to feel comfortable for the days between cycles. These will be offered as a separate option to the boxes that just provide for the monthly cycle, but would not exceed an extra charge of $1.50 per month.If we reach $8000, we will be able to look into providing reusable and sustainable options in our boxes, such as cups, or reusable tampons and pads. Organic and quality products are of the utmost importance to us, and we want to make sure that anything we provide that will need to be used again is sanitary, comfortable, and good for the environment.If we reach $10,000, we hope to be able to provide multiple boxes a month to shelters helping the LGBT community. We want to look domestically as well as abroad, and reach as many people as possible. Such a sum would greatly help us spread our wings and change more and more lives.We hope that with word spreading about this product, we will be able to encourage companies working towards similar goals in our community to donate products to the subscription boxes. If this finds success, we are excited to see how far the ArtilleryBox can grow and how much more we can include after the inaugural year!

story:
Introducing...iON Performance...

Hey there!  I'm  A.D., maker of iON Performance Soak.

iON was developed from a need to prepare for and recover from intense athletic performances. 

Over the past year, I have channeled my athletic experience, passion for solving problems and helping people and 10 years of marketing experience in healthcare and wellness to develop and introduce iON to market. 

We have had strong interest and success to date and this campaign will not only allow us to scale the production and marketing of iON Soak, but lay the foundation to evolve iON from a novel crafted product to the Personal Care brand of choice for athletes and highly active people.

What We Need 

The objective of the campaign is to raise $20,000 to meet immediate needs and opportunities including. This Indiegogo campaign is part of a larger fundraising initiative for the brand.

  • Refining our retail packaging per request of highly interested retailers who've agreed to stock iON after a few packaging upgrades
  • Scale up production and logistics 
  • Increase our ability to leverage economies of scale in purchasing ingredients and supplies
  • Supporting geo-targeted experiential and digital promotion to drive traffic to new retailers

Why iON?

Rapidly growing participation in competitive sport, e.g. CrossFit, triathlons and masters level athletes are increasing the number of people involved in highly intensive athletic activities…around 4 Million by our count...

Those who engage in this high intense activity take on three distinct personal care needs

  1. Priming for Competition
  2. Coping with Physiologic Demands of Intense Activity
  3. Transitioning to the next activity in their busy lives

iON endeavors to be the Athlete’s Personal Care Brand of Choice

•A smart insight guided brand with keen perspective on unique needs of the athlete

•Functionally selected ingredients targeted to meet these needs

•A Pipeline of personal care solutions expertly designed and delivered for their convenience

We have assembled a product development team with experience uniquely suited to meet these needs: 

Anthony Davis, MBA Marketing, BS Engineering, 10 years of marketing experience in healthcare, pharma and wellness. Top 10 World Ranked Masters Track & Field Athlete & National Champion

Dr. Arlaina Brown, DPT, 10 years of experience in physical therapy, All American PAC-10 Athlete

Isoke Baptiste, RN, experienced nurse and cosmetic chemist 

 

Dr. Arial Burrus, PharmD, experienced retail pharmacist 

Our Process

Risks & Challenges

The key challenge in launching iON successfully will lie in:

  • Effectively identifying consumer needs based on deep insights.
  • Developing effective solutions to meet these needs
  • Equipping an infrastructure with the resources to efficiently bring these solutions to market

In addition to the core product development team, we have assembled executive advisers with extensive experience in consumer insights, consumer product retail and new venture acceleration to help guide us through a thoughtful, incremental development plan. 

This plan starts with building success through local retailers while gaining brand awareness and our digital footprint, leveraging new venture programs such as Whole Foods Local Producer and Amazon Launchpad, and setting a target to be a strong regional brand within the next four years.

Help iON be the next success story

We appreciate your interest in helping us grow the brand that supports individuals pursue their athletic ambitions.  We'd love your support in 3 ways: 

1. Get Perks...Donate! 

It takes resources to make this happen! Choose a level you are comfortable with, get one of the cool curated perks! 

2. Spread the Word

Please take a moment to share with those in your network who might also think iON is a cool idea to support! 

3. Positive Love! 

Even an encouraging word, a prayer, a kudos go a long way in encouraging us through the hard work that it takes to launch a brand. Please provide comments, likes, loves or even helpful feedback - it would be greatly appreciated! 

On behalf of the iON team, I thank you so much for taking time to even read all of this, let alone your consideration for supporting this dream. 

Thanks so much! 

Let's Make it Happen! Great Things Ahead! 

A.D. & the iON Team

story:
Please be sure to visit the link and watch our story via the Sacramento Bee: https://www.sacbee.com/news/business/biz-columns-blogs/cathie-anderson/article135320224.html 
 
Short Summary

Hello everyone,

Prior to writing this summary regarding our Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign, I leaned towards writing more from the perspective of the company, trying my best to avoid the story of my life. However, after further consideration and sound advice from great people, I can now see the importance in sharing my remarkably life-changing story to the public to both motivate and inspire others in situations like mine, my goal in life. As you can read below, I once studied mixed martial arts and while sparring at an every-day practice, I broke my neck and was left partially paralyzed. Although it was a very tragic moment, I found that my focus and determination made it fairly easy to shift my direction to one goal that I've always had in mind prior to fighting, business school. Along with continuous personal physical therapy, I kept in direct contact with a lot of the disabled community around me and discovered several problems, or what some may call, needs. This leads me to the introduction of a start-up company, FuseFit LLC, whose focus is to provide at-home and on-demand personal trainers to the homes of the disabled and elderly, who often find inaccessibility and transportation to be their number one struggle. Our company's vision is to be the number one choice for optimizing both fitness and nutrition for all the disabled and elder communities around the world. Knowing exactly what these marginalized communities experience, first-hand, and providing alternatives is exactly why this is the industry exactly where I was destined to sow my seed. Our company is starting a Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign to raise money for both the establishment of our patented software application and a operational fund until reaching our next stage of development. All contributions come with one or more small rewards that will be rewarded to each contributor following a successful crowdfunding campaign. Not a single donation will be overlooked. Each contributor should keep in mind that they are providing a much-needed opportunity to fuse that gap that stands between one's limits and their independence.

Where’s my money going?

For the sake of being transparent and accountable with all contributors and backers, the money that will be raised is transferred, following a successful campaign, into FuseFit's bank account and allocated in the departments as shown in figure 1: 8.5% fees for Indiegogo, 18.5% will go into Application Development, 25% allocated into Operations, 13% allocated towards Accounting, and the remaining 35% will be allocated towards Marketing.

Figure 1

What we ask and What you get

Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaigns are an easy way for friends, family and the all-around general public to show their support and get involved in upcoming business campaigns that are in their infant stages of development. Based on the amount that you are willing to pledge, our company will be offering rewards that come with each pledge, as well as the option to simply donate as a gift. Although the general idea is to raise funds, FuseFit wants to give back by offering the following perks (some which are available only in FuseFit's location of operation):

Hint: During the #1stweek, if you contribute $65 or more, you receive a free K3Scooper to bring the necessary pre/post-workout powders with you to go.

  • Social Media Follows
  • Cash Vouchers
  • 30 min. Session Vouchers
  • 60 min. Session Vouchers
  • Social Media Shoutouts
  • Your name cemented on our website as a genuine supporter
  • The K3Scooper

Risks and Challenges

It is essential to our company and myself that all information is full transparent to our backers. A couple critical risk that is foreseen:

  1. Raising the correct amount of funds.
  2. Utilizing those funds to choose the appropriate outlets that can optimize our connection with the entire disabled and elder community, worldwide.

Besides noteworthy praise and thousands of eyes who viewed us on KCRA, in The Sacramento Bee Newspaper, and many other exciting private articles, FuseFit envisions future partnerships with various accessible sporting websites, such as Sacramento Paralympic Club and The Valor Games (you can read more on their information by clicking the link). We do project that as the company grows, as will our quality list of partnerships.

The Impact

There isn't a contribution that is overlooked and only with your support can FuseFit can become a responsive and flourishing business, providing a constructive vision for hundreds of thousands of both disabled and elder individuals who look to exceed their limits.

If You Can’t Contribute

Thank you for those who can contribute and if you feel that you are unable to contribute to the cause, I completely understand. Another major contribution for those who simply cannot is by using the Indiegogo sharing tools and showing this special page to everyone you know. Share, Share, Share, Share. Yes, I am from just a small town in California, but I do believe that with the power of networking, everyone across the globe can discover and join the FuseFit vision and fuse the gap between limits and overall independence. 

 

-Thank You

story:
Now who doesn't love a properly groomed maintained looked after beard.

What a beard needs is care, time and grooming products and we provide the best!

 

Beard Lab has been around for a while and we have actually had a previous Kickstarter project which went very well.... But with the time we have been running I have learnt lots about the business and the community of bearding.

So we have decided with what we have learnt is that we need a little rebranding to turn this into something a little more than what it is currently. As currently this isn't supporting us or our growing family but we really want to carry this on and do this as much as possible as the customers and fans we have had have been very supportive and I believe we have helped them on their quest to have the very best facial hair they can possibly grow.

We currently have been offering a lot of different products and really we have found that only a few of those we had actually sold well. So me and my partner have had a think about reducing our range and bringing the very best of a few products to the bearded people of the world.

 

So what is Beard Oil anyway?

 

Beard Oil is essential for any bearded man (or woman) due to its conditioning and cleanses properties, this is much better than using most shampoos and conditioners as it won't strip your beard of its natural oils and will instead help replenish them with oils similar to that which the skin secretes. This helps stops the dreaded itch that most bearded men seem to moan about (If they don't use Beard Oil). So no itch probably means more beards and what could be bad about that!

Any help, be it backers or sharers would be amazing!

For the best beard blog around visit our blog at http://www.beardlab.com

 

 

 

So What Is Changing?

 

Beard Lab will change in many ways for example:

We are creating brand new products from Beard Oils to an amazing super nourishing Beard Butter.

Our New Beard Oil has a new base which is a blend of Apricot Oil, Macadamia Oil, Avocado Oil and Argan Oil.

Our New Beard Butter has organic coconut oil (cocos nucifera), organic palm oil (elaeis guineensis), organic jojoba wax (simmondsia chinensis cera), organic peach kernel oil (prunus persica), cocoa butter (Theobroma Cacao), avocado butter (persea gratissima), palm free vegetable glycerin and vitamin E Oil.

We will be changing our labels and branding to be totally consistent.

We will be a lot more cost effective than many other brands and still deliver on quality.

We are also going to be using some great local supplier to keep us topped up.

We will ensure our products we carry on being unique as they have been with some great scented options.

And hopefully we can be a better more sustainable business.

 

We have been testing the new products for over two months now to make sure they are of the highest quality for you all.

 

 

 

What Else Is New?

 

Along with our New Beard Oil & Beard Butter we will also be having a revised version of the Beard Wash we made before. Below is a example of our label for the Beard Wash.

Eventually we will be also releasing a Beard Styling Wax, A Moisturiser aimed at men and even more Beard Oils. Also we are re-releasing our sell out Beard Brush, which when we stocked it before sold out with 2 weeks!



The clothing line we will release for sale will also include Bamboo T-Shirts, Baseball Style Shirts and maybe some Hats too.

We will be doing lots more on the blog and YouTube channel too!


Why are you changing Beard Lab?

 

We are changing because we need to keep up to date and keep things fresh and Kickstarter provided us with a great start with the last campaign and we have learnt enough to make Beard Lab great.

A lot of companies seem to start up all the time and they do not seem to possess the experience and knowledge that I have gained after a ridiculously long time of having a beard. I want to share that knowledge to help other bearded folks grow the best they can.

We were one of the first companies to introduce a Beard Friendly Soap that I know of.

 

With your help I can first of all spend more time helping bearded people get the facial hair they want whilst also hopefully stopping some of the stigma that gets attached to bearded guys such as being lazy, homeless and having family members ask you to shave all the time. Which yes I know most of you have experienced. I still get the odd family member with the stupid comments.

Also I would love the opportunity to have a stable business of my own at home where I can stay with my little girls too. Crimson my 3 year old helps me a lot with packing orders which is awesome and I want that to carry on please.

 

And if you support this campaign check out the awesome rewards you will receive!

 

Thank you!
