story:
Pommade Divine for on-the-go

We know our customers love Pommade Divine, so much so they want to take it everywhere with them - on holiday, to the gym, out shopping. Even though our 50ml jar is beautiful and perfect for the bathroom cabinet or bedside table, it just isn't designed for that kind of use.

Over the last 18 months we have worked hard with our formulator and manufacturer to develop Pommade Divine for on-the-go. We tested, tested, and tested some more - until we finally cracked it. The result is our natural, trusted formula now available in a travel-friendly 30ml tube, perfectly compact and light enough to put in your handbag, carry-on luggage or even pocket.  

 

Why are we crowdfunding?

In order to bring you the Pommade Divine you so love, we have made the decision to order a larger quantity upfront so that we can get lower costs and in turn, lower prices for our customers. This approach also allows you to help shape the future of our company. We couldn’t be more excited after hearing all your requests for a travel product for so long.

Once we have the new product up and running, we will then be retailing in the future through our usual channels including our website and with all our iconic retailers. So be sure to check in with your usual stockist when you need to re-order a tube in the future.

 

Pommade Divine in the Press

"POMME-Aid, miraculous for cuticles" Vogue

"The best-kept secret for 300 years..." The Mail on Sunday

https://pommadedivine.com/pages/press

 

Our Story

Every brand has a story, but Pommade Divine's is truly remarkable. First written about in the 1700s by Princess Elisabeth Charlotte (Marie-Antoinette's great-grandmother), she insisted it was "the best thing if you had burned yourself with sealing wax. "

Known as "nanny's magic cream", Pommade Divine was a staple household good during the Edwardian and Victorian era for any skincare need - bumps, bruises, burns, chapped hands, lips, nappy rash - even to heal cuts after sitting on one's pocket watch... 

But then in the 1980s, Pommade Divine disappeared off the shelves. Luckily, it was bought by a family who knew of its wonderful properties and kept it going selling to family and friends.  

A few years ago, we decided to revive the recipe originally developed by Butler & Co., chemists to the Royal Household in 1800, and bring this British heritage jewel back to the public. 

Pommade Divine is available today in some of the most iconic premium retailers such as Liberty London, Colette in Paris and luxury e-retailer Net-à-Porter, as well as carefully selected specialist health & beauty boutiques all over the world. 

 

How It Works

Pommade Divine is a natural, multi-purpose balm that helps to soothe, repair and protect skin after everyday wear and tear and can be used for: 

There are infinite ways to use our miracle balm, including:

A rich moisturising protectant, Pommade Divine is made from 97% natural ingredients and can be used on adults, children, babies and even animals - it will treat a sore paw on a dog and grazes on horses.

The unique combination of essential oils, spices and resins, tried and tested across the centuries, is blended into a skin-softening, nourishing base of shea butter, jojoba and lanolin. The result is efficacious, versatile and restorative - a must-have for every handbag and bathroom cabinet in the nation.

  • Benzoin: Typically found on the Indonesian islands of Sumatra, the benzoin tree produces resin extract, which is a mild antibacterial. As an essential oil, it helps eliminate infection-causing bacteria from the surface of the skin. It actively heals dry, cracked skin and is also

    good for arthritic pains.

  • Cloves: Due to its antiseptic properties, clove oil is useful for wound, cuts, scabies, athlete’s foot, fungal infections, bruises, prickly heat, scabies, and other types of injuries. It can also be used for treating insect bites and stings and is an excellent insect repellant thanks to the distinct aroma.

  • Nutmeg: Mixed into a balm, it can make skin look clearer and brighter within a few days, reducing scars and alleviating acne. It also brings relief from muscular and joint pain. Apply it to a localised area of swelling and discomfort, and the pain melts away.

  • Cinnamon: It has antibacterial, anti-fungal, antimicrobial and anti-clotting properties, and is rich in essential minerals such as manganese, iron and calcium, while also having a high content of fibre. Cinnamon oil acts as a coagulant and helps to stop excess bleeding, therefore, facilitating the healing process. It is also a fantastic insect repellant.

Our formula is free from: parabens, PEG, mineral oils, artificial dyes, and silicons. Pommade Divine is made in England and is not tested on animals.  

 

The Results

Pommade Divine has received hundreds of 5* reviews from happy Pommade Diviners. Customers love it! Here are just a few of our favourites: 

https://pommadedivine.com/products/pommade-divine

 

Awards

 

What We Need & What You Get

We're only asking for the minimum amount of money needed to get the first run of the 30ml tube into production.  Your donation will go towards ordering the raw and packaging materials, initial tooling costs, manufacturing and delivery to our warehouse.

Your contribution not only means a lot to us, but it benefits you as well!  How?

So outside of the good feeling you'll receive for supporting our small British business, you will be receiving our travel-size Pommade Divine for a discounted price before it hits the stores!  

For those who would like to try our Pommade Divine in a 50ml jar, we also have fantastic offers including a family pack saving 40%.

Once we have received all donations, we will be able to place an order for all the necessary materials. These will take about 12 weeks to be delivered before we are able to manufacture in the UK. The first tubes of Pommade Divine for on-the-go will be available in Summer 2017.

 

Unable to Donate?

We completely understand!  Please help us by sharing this page with someone who can!  Any and all help matters to us. We are grateful for your support. 

 

Timings

Meet the Team

Pommade Divine was brought back to life by Ania Richmond in December 2014 after falling in love with it's British heritage story. Gurjeet Grewal joined Ania in July 2016. With a combined 20 years of experience in marketing, sales and finance; and huge passion for beauty - we are determined to re-establish Pommade Divine as a household name.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Pommade Divine on the face?

Pommade Divine can be used anywhere on the skin. As a multi-purpose balm, it can help with the treatment of a variety of everyday skincare problems. From chapped lips, to a graze on the knee to rough heels and bruises.

Is Pommade Divine safe to use?

Pommade Divine has been dermatologically tested, an is suitable for all skin types, even the sensitive skin of young children and babies. Pommade Divine is free from parabens, paraffin, silicones, mineral oils, petroleum and synthetic dyes.

How should I store Pommade Divine?

Pommade Divine should ideally be stored at room temperature. Keep above 0°C and out of direct sunlight.

How long will Pommade Divine last?

Once opened, Pommade Divine will last for 36 months.

I’m pregnant and worried about using essential oils. Can I use Pommade Divine?

We have had some wonderful testimonials from our customers who have used and are using Pommade Divine during their pregnancies. However, since everyone’s response to the physical and hormonal changes of pregnancy is different, we would recommend that you perform a patch test if using for the first time. If there are any specific uncertainties, we recommend you consult your GP before use.
story_txt:
Pommade Divine for on-the-go
We know our customers love Pommade Divine, so much so they want to take it everywhere with them - on holiday, to the gym, out shopping. Even though our 50ml jar is beautiful and perfect for the bathroom cabinet or bedside table, it just isn't designed for that kind of use.

Over the last 18 months we have worked hard with our formulator and manufacturer to develop Pommade Divine for on-the-go. We tested, tested, and tested some more - until we finally cracked it. The result is our natural, trusted formula now available in a travel-friendly 30ml tube, perfectly compact and light enough to put in your handbag, carry-on luggage or even pocket.  
 
Why are we crowdfunding?
In order to bring you the Pommade Divine you so love, we have made the decision to order a larger quantity upfront so that we can get lower costs and in turn, lower prices for our customers. This approach also allows you to help shape the future of our company. We couldn’t be more excited after hearing all your requests for a travel product for so long.
Once we have the new product up and running, we will then be retailing in the future through our usual channels including our website and with all our iconic retailers. So be sure to check in with your usual stockist when you need to re-order a tube in the future.
 

Pommade Divine in the Press
"POMME-Aid, miraculous for cuticles" Vogue
"The best-kept secret for 300 years..." The Mail on Sunday

https://pommadedivine.com/pages/press


 
Our Story
Every brand has a story, but Pommade Divine's is truly remarkable. First written about in the 1700s by Princess Elisabeth Charlotte (Marie-Antoinette's great-grandmother), she insisted it was "the best thing if you had burned yourself with sealing wax. "

Known as "nanny's magic cream", Pommade Divine was a staple household good during the Edwardian and Victorian era for any skincare need - bumps, bruises, burns, chapped hands, lips, nappy rash - even to heal cuts after sitting on one's pocket watch... 
But then in the 1980s, Pommade Divine disappeared off the shelves. Luckily, it was bought by a family who knew of its wonderful properties and kept it going selling to family and friends.  
A few years ago, we decided to revive the recipe originally developed by Butler & Co., chemists to the Royal Household in 1800, and bring this British heritage jewel back to the public. 
Pommade Divine is available today in some of the most iconic premium retailers such as Liberty London, Colette in Paris and luxury e-retailer Net-à-Porter, as well as carefully selected specialist health & beauty boutiques all over the world. 
 
How It Works
Pommade Divine is a natural, multi-purpose balm that helps to soothe, repair and protect skin after everyday wear and tear and can be used for: 



There are infinite ways to use our miracle balm, including:

A rich moisturising protectant, Pommade Divine is made from 97% natural ingredients and can be used on adults, children, babies and even animals - it will treat a sore paw on a dog and grazes on horses.

The unique combination of essential oils, spices and resins, tried and tested across the centuries, is blended into a skin-softening, nourishing base of shea butter, jojoba and lanolin. The result is efficacious, versatile and restorative - a must-have for every handbag and bathroom cabinet in the nation.


Benzoin: Typically found on the Indonesian islands of Sumatra, the benzoin tree produces resin extract, which is a mild antibacterial. As an essential oil, it helps eliminate infection-causing bacteria from the surface of the skin. It actively heals dry, cracked skin and is alsogood for arthritic pains.

Cloves: Due to its antiseptic properties, clove oil is useful for wound, cuts, scabies, athlete’s foot, fungal infections, bruises, prickly heat, scabies, and other types of injuries. It can also be used for treating insect bites and stings and is an excellent insect repellant thanks to the distinct aroma.
Nutmeg: Mixed into a balm, it can make skin look clearer and brighter within a few days, reducing scars and alleviating acne. It also brings relief from muscular and joint pain. Apply it to a localised area of swelling and discomfort, and the pain melts away.
Cinnamon: It has antibacterial, anti-fungal, antimicrobial and anti-clotting properties, and is rich in essential minerals such as manganese, iron and calcium, while also having a high content of fibre. Cinnamon oil acts as a coagulant and helps to stop excess bleeding, therefore, facilitating the healing process. It is also a fantastic insect repellant.


Our formula is free from: parabens, PEG, mineral oils, artificial dyes, and silicons. Pommade Divine is made in England and is not tested on animals.  

 
The Results
Pommade Divine has received hundreds of 5* reviews from happy Pommade Diviners. Customers love it! Here are just a few of our favourites: 

https://pommadedivine.com/products/pommade-divine
 
Awards

 
What We Need & What You Get
We're only asking for the minimum amount of money needed to get the first run of the 30ml tube into production.  Your donation will go towards ordering the raw and packaging materials, initial tooling costs, manufacturing and delivery to our warehouse.
Your contribution not only means a lot to us, but it benefits you as well!  How?
So outside of the good feeling you'll receive for supporting our small British business, you will be receiving our travel-size Pommade Divine for a discounted price before it hits the stores!  
For those who would like to try our Pommade Divine in a 50ml jar, we also have fantastic offers including a family pack saving 40%.
Once we have received all donations, we will be able to place an order for all the necessary materials. These will take about 12 weeks to be delivered before we are able to manufacture in the UK. The first tubes of Pommade Divine for on-the-go will be available in Summer 2017.
 
Unable to Donate?
We completely understand!  Please help us by sharing this page with someone who can!  Any and all help matters to us. We are grateful for your support. 
 
Timings

Pommade Divine was brought back to life by Ania Richmond in December 2014 after falling in love with it's British heritage story. Gurjeet Grewal joined Ania in July 2016. story:
You will be directly helping build H.O.P.E.

Why The Health Not? is offering a comprehensive wellness ecosystem: real-time, personalized, lifestyle management for everyday people like you and me, interested in preventative health (life) care.

You can map your goals and progress in our interactive app and pair-up with quality health & wellness providers on demand, according to your specs, not someone else’s.

Why The Health Not? WELLNESS 2.0.

If we truly want to move away from our current “sick-care” system, let’s embrace digital health and all the advantages it puts into the hands of individual’s, and embrace WELLNESS. That’s true health care. Because, WHY THE HEALTH NOT?

"Why The Health Not?" is creating innovative technology solutions and products that deliver personalized lifestyle management through real-time collaboration. When you back our development of the exclusive H.O.P.E. (Health Oriented Pairing Engine) technology, you will help simplify health by connecting people, providers, and products that proactively meet one’s true wellness needs.

 

Here is what we're building with your contribution

We need funding for developers and designers of H.O.P.E. (or Health Oriented Pairing Engine). This is the center of our solution and an industry first. We use H.O.P.E. to match individual consumers with wellness professionals, products, services, and educational materials. "Why The Health Not?" has  created a unique matchmaking algorithm that brings customers to providers, patients to specialists, and health seekers to healthcare services – all utilizing a mathematically proven pairing engine.

The funds we raise here will be put into our development & analytics process to understand an individual’s needs on an emotional level and motivates them to achieve the goals that are meaningful to them. Through this process, "Why The Health Not?" will be able to collect important data to help find streamlined solutions to minimize trial & error for generations to come.

You can be a part of a working solution aimed to give individuals the power to choose the well-being solutions that feel right for them.

When you contribute, you support H.O.P.E.

With your contribution, you'll be a bridge-building, closing the gap between seekers and providers. If you appreciate that good health involves all the pillars of wellness, you will value connecting with us to support the physical, emotional, intellectual, social, spiritual and financial needs of the whole person.

Of course, building H.O.P.E. has its challenges

Our effort is not without challenges. "Why The Health Not?" competes in a complex and multi-billion-dollar market of healthcare referral generation and wellness information services. We will have to remain focused, but flexible in maintaining our exclusivity. In addition, the digital technology landscape is constantly changing, so we must stay up-to-date with our platform development.

Other ways you can help build H.O.P.E.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us to get the word out among your friends, family, and social media connections
  • Help us raise awareness with your employer, because healthy employees are good business
  • Help us share our Indiegogo campaign with the share tools

Building the Bridge of HOPE

Our digital bridge design is based on The Bridge of Peace, a bow-shaped pedestrian bridge over the Kura River in Tbilisi, Georgia. The bridge which stretches 490 ft over the Kura River was ordered by the City Hall of Tbilisi to create a contemporary design feature connecting Old Tbilisi with the new district.
We love the concept with connecting the old with the new. We feel this represents our mission to bridge the gap in healthcare. Combining both old practices and new technologies.

Since our platform is an online service and represents a digital interface, we are unable to offer physical bricks with personalized engravings. This is why we are building it digitally! It will be a visual representation and signature staple of how we built the path to awesomeness. 
Always on our site to show how and when we built it! Imagine if you could see the first contributors to facebook or YouTube. Who were they? What did they talk about? What was their why?

By joining our mission to shift the way we view healthcare, you become a pioneer in paving the path for future generations. Just like the Bridge of Peace was created to inspire peace amongst the Georgians we intend to build the Bridge of Hope to inspire a common peace amongst the healthcare industry. Bridging the gap between reactive and proactive medical plans. By supporting the "Bridge Footing" you are the support beams to allow the foundation to take shape.

Bridging the gap between reactive and proactive medical plans. By supporting the "Bridge Footing" you are the support beams to allow the foundation to take shape.

story:
Our objective: To raise S20,000 -To build 4 wells in Africa

Our Aim: To provide Clean safe drinking water that does not carry water borne diseases

Our Moto: Let’s take the first step in fighting poverty.

Cost/well : Estimate AUD$5000/per well

Background

Africa has been suffering from poverty for over 50 years. One of the main indicators that could aid them from poverty is water. An average human can survive one month without food but only one week without water. Clean water is essential for survival especially in Africa. People are affected by contaminated water and lack of basic sanitation. More people are being killed by polluted water and no proper sanitation compared to violence in the country, such as war. The ones most affected by this are children as their bodies are not strong enough to fight diseases such Astrachoma, Hepatitis, Typhoid, Malaria, Sleeping Sickness and Meningitis..

The United Nations reported that 20% of the world’s population struggle to gain access to safe drinking water every day.In Africa alone, people spend 40 billion hours every year walking to the nearest water source. Furthermore, on average, women in Africa walk 6 kilometers to get water and the water source may or may not be clean due to being prone to contamination. Time spent walking result in diseases keeping them away from school, work and taking care of their families. Along their long walk, they're subjected to a greater risk of harassment and sexual assault. With safe water nearby, women are free to pursue new opportunities and improve their families’ lives (charitywater.org, 2015/)

The only way to fight poverty is to educate and to maintain the health of the people. Water has a vital role to play in responding to the socio-economic crisis in Africa. Thus the first step to fight poverty in Africa is to provide safe water nearest to their dwelling, which may than lead to women and children having time for school, work and lessen the risk of harassment and sexual assaults. Moreover, the only way to make a big difference in this world is to start small and this is one way to help the human population.

Water - Facts:
•  Diseases related to water are caused either by the lack of water or drinking polluted water.
•  Such diseases include trachoma, hepatitis, typhoid, polio, malaria, sleeping sickness and meningitis.
•  Trachoma alone is the main cause of blindness of 6 million people worldwide.
•  2.4 billion people (nearly the half of world’s population) do not have access to adequate water supplies.
•  2.2 million people in developing countries die every year from diseases related to lack of water and drinking unsafe water.
•  Around 6,000 children – most of them less than 5 years of age - die every day from water-borne diseases.
•  The average distance that women in Africa and Asia walk every day to collect water is 6 km.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Ray and I live in Montreal, Canada. I work in the financial services industry and I am passionate about internet technology. I also have a strong background in sales and business development. One of my major achievements in online technology is Key4IT, a virtual trade show for software companies, where I was involved in content and back office management. My educational background is sociology, international development and communication (media). 
Our online baby store http://www.rayenone.ca has been our minimum viable product (MVP) for the past couple of months. We have used a lean start-up business model (the process of idea generation, prototyping, presentation, data collection, analysis and learning) to develop our e-commerce website.
The world will always have problems and businesses exist to solve those problems. Back in 2000, the cost of starting an online business was about $5 million. In our era, things have changed dramatically. We are passionate about helping families address their child care needs. The reason why we started this campaign is to enable us launch an e-commerce baby store with a community-based business model. We love technology and we want to create the first community-based baby e-store in the world. It is a fact that more than 90% of parents and family members need help in terms of getting affordable baby supplies. We want to connect with them and understand what their needs are in a bid to provide sustainable solutions. 

What We Need 

The overall objective of this campaign is to raise CAD$50,000 to give a massive boost to the online baby store http://www.rayenone.ca.  Competing with the likes of Babies R Us, Amazon, and Wal Mart is a challenge that we welcome. It is good for the economy by creating jobs while also supporting other companies through purchasing products and forming partnerships. The funds raised will be used for hiring, enhancing web security, further developing the user interface and architecture, search engine optimization (SE0), innovative payment processing, and building a robust supply chain network. We would source our products locally and internationally as well. For now, we are using word-of-mouth marketing (WOMM) and social media as our primary marketing tools. Regarding our value proposition, we offer a community-based business model for e-commerce. We are different from our competitors because of our niche market and because we are changing the way the baby market works. We would also run a baby care and demand forecasting service called Smart Baby (SB) to help parents effectively manage childcare costs and monitor child development. This would significantly add more value to child care. We also aim to provide free delivery for our clients following a phone or online order. Billionaire Mark Cuban says it is foolish to get a loan for a new start-up. We turned to crowdfunding because it is a viable alternate financing vehicle compared to financing from venture capitalists (like on Shark Tank and Dragons Den). The crowdfunding industry is worth $US 16.6 billion today. That's the power of social capital. A donation of any amount from you would be well appreciated. There are perks available as well. Thank you for your support!

The Impact

www.rayenone.ca is a start-up community-based online retailer of bestselling baby products. Our vision is “making parents happy.” To stand out, we are providing an interactive retail experience for our clients. Our innovation stems  from the fact that we provide a personalized service for each family that does business with us. It is not just about online shopping. We know parents are value-conscious and time-starved, so we want to be able to provide that personalized service. 

This project is valuable because part of our long-term strategy is to take this business globally to create jobs and create a better society in which parents raise children with joy. We will be targeting emerging markets in the future.

As part of our corporate social responsibility plan, we will be donating new and used baby products and supplies to families in need.


Risks & Challenges

The main challenge is funding. However, this is no excuse. We have thoroughly done our research and our target customers think it is a good concept. Our role is to commercialize the business idea into a successful venture.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand, some people just can't contribute. We humbly ask you to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you so very much!

This would significantly add more value to child care. We also aim to provide free delivery for our clients following a phone or online order. Billionaire Mark Cuban says it is foolish to get a loan for a new start-up. We turned to crowdfunding because it is a viable alternate financing vehicle compared to financing from venture capitalists (like on Shark Tank and Dragons Den). The crowdfunding industry is worth $US 16.6 billion today. That's the power of social capital. A donation of any amount from you would be well appreciated. There are perks available as well. Thank you for your support!

 The Impact


www.rayenone.ca is a start-up community-based online retailer of bestselling baby products. Our vision is “making
parents happy.” To stand out, we are providing an interactive retail experience for our clients. Our innovation
stems  from the fact that we provide a
personalized service for each family that does business with us. It is not just about online shopping. We know
parents are value-conscious and time-starved, so we want to be able to provide
that personalized service. 
This project is valuable because part of our long-term strategy is to take this business globally to create jobs and create a better society in which parents raise children with joy. We will be targeting emerging markets in the future.
As part of our corporate social responsibility plan, we will be donating new and used baby products and supplies to families in need.


    Risks & Challenges
The main challenge is funding. However, this is no excuse. We have thoroughly done our research and our target customers think it is a good concept. Our role is to commercialize the business idea into a successful venture.


    Other Ways You Can Help
We understand, some people just can't contribute. We humbly ask you to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. You can use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you so very much!

story:
https://www.facebook.com/ads/create?campaign_id...


BRUSH EFFECTS - Giving Everyone Pure *Brushing Joy*



Brush Effects Is all about giving everyone pure *Brushing Joy*. This Futuristic Toothbrush Is Extremely Important To Our Daily Brushing and Making us Stewards of our Water Resources. Going into the Future we together can make a monumental change in the way we brush our teeth, our overall oral care health and saving our precious water resources.

The Cost Factor

We spend a lot on electronics for ourselves and our children, It would be cool to see their faces when they get one of these and smile through their daily brushings, adults too. The Toothbrush - The one thing that can prevent many types of sicknesses and diseases, prevent cavities from forming, gum disease, gingivitis, mouth cancers etc. A toothbrush costs us only a buck a month that's it, but it is the care taker of our mouths, teeth and overall health. As you read on I will say this now -Your child  would love a Brush Effects Toothbrush and so would you.

The Green Factor - Save our Precious Water Please

An amazing thing Brush Effects excels at - The environment and water wastage is becoming such a serious debate the world over. Think about this - 55% of people who brush their teeth run the water non stop till they are done, especially kids (How many kids in each household? - Scary!! that's gallons per person wasted every day ) The @BrushEffects toothbrush is the future, when you use our toothbrush you get 60% faster brushing times, for those people who run water non stop, that equals to 60-70% less water wastage per person. Let's all be stewards of our Earth and save it's precious water resources, right now. Look at what's happening in California right now and other areas of the world, massive droughts. They are seeking ideas in which people will conserve water. Your contribution helps us move forward one of the biggest oral care tech products that saves millions of gallons of water per day. 

This small little - Futuristic - Highly Designed Brush Effects toothbrush could be one of the single most important factors in saving our precious water resources.  Buy A Perk and help us give you amazingly fresh breath, clean teeth. Plus 100% more germ removal  and 60% faster than before (brushing time).

 LIFE

 We all know one of the most dreaded parts of our days are mornings. We have to climb out of bed and get ready for our day. And if you have children..... well, need I say more? Brushing our teeth is a love or hate daily task we all must do in order to have healthy gums, clean teeth and proper oral care health. Improper oral care is the leading cause of many sicknesses and disease, all of which can be reduced or eliminated by brushing teeth properly and removing inner mouth germs.

With our Brush Effects Toothbrush Technology we went to great lengths to make sure we created a toothbrush design that greatly enhanced the oral care experience. We wanted faster brushing, a cleaner mouth, cleaner- whiter teeth, a toothbrush that could also give you flossing action for the first time ever, and a wider tongue scraper area and inner mouth scrapers. Plus, we added all these features to our toothbrush in a size comparable to today's current toothbrush, now that's INNOVATION! The head of our toothbrush is 2mm smaller in length and 2mm wider that the current toothbrush we all use. We have 4x the features in a comparable size.

As you can see above, our Brush Effects Toothbrush, brushes all 3 sides of your teeth, plus our scrapers clean your mouth so amazingly, even you will be shocked at how clean and fresh your mouth and teeth will be. You get amazingly clean teeth front to back. Lifting food particles to the surface. The old tech just pushed food back and forth back into teeth and the back areas were always too tough to clean properly. I have three daughters and my business partners have children too. We know and understand how hard it is to get children to not only brush their teeth, but to ensure they do it properly. We pretty much have to stand by them while they do it. And do they really brush their teeth properly? The answer, 90% of the time, is no they don't.

The Great news is, with the Brush Effects toothbrush, that is no longer the case. They will brush all three surface areas of their teeth properly, and faster, every single time, and love doing it- and so will you. Adults and children will have an amazingly clean, germ free mouth. We are making the whole brushing experience fun for kids and adults of all ages. Make sure to watch our video before you read any further. That way you will experience all Brush Effects is, today, tomorrow and into the future.

I want to make sure about one thing right now, innovation will never progress unless we have backers like you. We need to build a huge fan base, and kindly ask that you please share our Brush Effects Indiegogo page with your friends, family and even your friends with blogs. Use the hash tag #BrushEffects, then post a Selfie with that hashtag with you showing the world one huge smile on Facebook and Twitter.

Share our video and link to our Indiegogo Page on your Twitter page, Facebook page, Instagram etc. -Share this with everyone you can and share what we are trying to accomplish. Oral Care is extremely important, so please help us spread the word- The future of oral care has arrived with Brush Effects.

Please help us grow, grow, grow. It's because of you Brush Effects will become a part of every person's daily Oral care routine. Click on the below links and follow us, Thank you so much.

https://twitter.com/Avtar1971

https://twitter.com/hashtag/BrushEffects?src=hash

https://twitter.com/BrushEffects

Families know, that proper oral care health prevents many sicknesses and disease. Improper oral care leads to expensive Dental Bills. Brush Effects is here to take oral care into the future. Families 1st

I just wanted to make sure I acknowledge you first; you are the most important factor here to helping us make Brush Effects a Global hit.

Remember: Your Teeth are the track, our toothbrush is the train! Please watch our video, before reading further, thank you.

THE STORY

Our vision is for Brush Effects to become a global leader in oral care innovation, lead by a revolutionary redesign of the toothbrush that will radically change the way consumers think about oral care. Just like products from Apple Inc.  people want their products because they are trend setters and tech leaders, thats who we want to be in the oral care health field and a few major surprises we have planned, for products to come. We want to bring to market products that are true game changers. With Brush  Effects this is our 1st salvo we are throwing. Your health is so important to us and we are giving you one of the most innovative toothbrushes ever.

At Brush Effects, we want to see families out having fun, with big beaming beautiful smiles; not at the dentist with expensive bills, caused by improper oral care. Today's current toothbrush is fine, but the Brush Effects toothbrush is far superior.


•Now let's tell you about our amazing Features and Benefits

Feature: Tri Brush Head (TBH) brushes teeth from all sides effectively and does not take up as much room as regular toothbrushes that sit on top of your teeth.

Benefit: better and faster cleaning – up to 60% faster than traditional methods.

Feature: Innovative scrapers on sides and back of brush head.

Benefit: cleans the sides of the tongue and inner mouth and lips, eliminating harmful bacteria and bacterial gunk build up. These features will ensure a germ free mouth, like never before.

Feature: Unique Accordion Flex Sides (AFS)



Benefit: fits over any size teeth, adjust from smaller to bigger teeth and back again.

Feature: Interlocking Bristles

Benefit: better cleaning of the teeth by removing more plaque/gingivitis than a traditional brush, also allows bristles to clean between the teeth more like flossing action. You can also twist your wrist back and forth; this allows the bristles to clean in between teeth, for the first time ever. That's right, flossing action from a toothbrush that brings food particles to the surface, just like flossing!

Feature: Unique Handle Design.

Benefit: allows for far better control than any traditional toothbrush, ergonomically designed to fit in the palm of your hand comfortably.

The Green Effect

•The unique design of our toothbrush allows for faster brushing than ever before. This in turn leads to less water wastage by children especially, who unsupervised, often run the tap non-stop while brushing their teeth. There are also many adults who brush their teeth with the water running. The Brush Effects toothbrush allows for 60% faster brushing than today's current toothbrush. That's 60% less water wasted! A huge benefit in today's Earth-conscious world.

We did a side-by-side comparison of our Brush Effects toothbrush and today's current toothbrush, with both running the tap the entire time while brushing. In this test, a user using today's current toothbrush used a full sink and a half of water while brushing their teeth. With the Brush Effects toothbrush, which allows 60% faster brushing time, these water users used only half a sink of water while brushing. Now add that up amongst all those adults and kids who run water while brushing around the world (DAILY THAT IS). We are really helping Mother Nature out by conserving our precious and limited water resources.

The old way above, you had to be a contorshnist to brush your teeth, this way, that way, this way, that way, this way, that way - it's no wonder kids hate brushing there teeth -ummmm us adults too. 

Let's Talk about the Markets

For Brush Effects, Initially, we have identified eight key markets that we will target with multi-tiered products tailored specifically for each of them:

•Professionals - Travellers

•Military

•Retail consumer market

•Licensee line

•Dental professional market

•Hospitals, retirement homes and care homes

•Pets

•Denture Market

By focusing on the above markets as discrete opportunities we will ensure our sales and marketing efforts resist redundancy, maintain high degrees of measurability and accountability and allow us to be agile and fluid in our efforts to develop the Brush Effects brand.

The Industry for Dentures and Care Homes

For those who have limited mobility or for caregivers who have to brush the teeth of their patients, Brush Effects will make brushing their teeth far easier than ever before.

Caregivers will love that they can brush their patients' teeth in half the time by reaching all 3 sides at once. Now they will have more time to do other things; all of which are important to their day and all the while giving exceptional care - day in and day out..

The Brush Effects toothbrush will also help seniors and denture wearers in a huge way. Brush Effects will help denture wearers clean dentures easier and faster than ever before, with little effort.

Imagine the big smiles caregivers and patients will share everyday when it comes to brushing Teeth with Brush Effects toothbrush Tech.


Military - Let's talk military

It's like this most of the time for Military Personnel - whenever and wherever they can- they take care of their oral care health in the most extreme times and on the go.

Soldiers are busy and often work in extremely stressful environments. It is a difficult lifestyle and we appreciate their service and sacrifice. We wanted to give them a truly spectacular tool that would help make their tours more comfortable and that much easier. And that's where the Brush Effects Toothbrush comes in. The Triple brushing surfaces gives them super-fast, high-quality brushing, every time. They also have the biggest germ removing tool ever, our triple brush head tech, with side scrapers.

Since 1917 Proper Oral Care Health is a VITAL and Important part of our Military Personnels' lives.


Pets

In time we will be offering three models: one for small dogs, one for medium dogs and one for large dogs – plus a premium version.


For a puppy like our Golden Retriever Buddy, until he is full size, his oral care is important. It's up to us to maintain his teeth and make sure his breath is always fresh. With the Brush Effects Toothbrush we just made it that much easier.

(Names - Colors - Design language differences/changes may be made here)

• Let's Talk Pets- MARKET ANALYSIS - PETS

Overview

Dental disease, or periodontitis, is the number one oral disease in dogs and cats. Over 95% of all dogs and cats will get dental disease in their lifetime, usually by age 2-3 it has significantly started. Periodontitis is an infection of the tooth root, which ultimately results in infected teeth. When periodontal infection starts, these bacteria get into the pet’s circulation system, eventually leading to heart, liver, kidney, bone and joint disease.

Approximately 75% of all dog owners and more than 50% of cat owners consider their pet a member of the family. Over 80% of dog owners and 63% of cat owners buy gifts for their pet. Brush Effects will concentrate on this emotional relationship between owners and pets to educate on the importance of oral care and the benefits of Brush Effects products for their pets .

Facts & Figures

•80% of dogs show periodontal disease by age 3

•those who do purchase oral care products purchase 4-6 oral care products a year, a number that significantly outpaces other pet grooming products.

•the global pet care product market is 81 Billion

•Americans spent 45.4B on pets in 2009, a 5.1% increase from 2008 and nearly double spent a decade ago.

•The pet oral care market is worth over 450M in the US alone.

•The global pet oral care market is estimated to be over 4.5B.

This shows Pets are a huge part of our families. At Brush Effects our triple brush head will clean all three sides of their teeth easier than ever before.



LET'S TALK ABOUT OUR WONDERFUL KIDS.

Brushing your children’s teeth can either be a fun activity or a chore. It takes a while before toddlers enjoy brushing.

We have all seen this play out- our kids refusing to brush their teeth. Plus they never do it properly. Brush Effects guarantees they brush all sides every single time with minimal effort and done in half the time.

Kids usually feel cranky when it’s toothbrushing time. Sometimes it’s the sensation caused by the toothbrush that makes them irritated. Kids have a very limited attention span, getting them to brush their teeth for a full two minutes is truly a battle in itself. The Brush Effects toothbrush will be a new and creative way to make brushing fun for your little ones. You need to start this habit early in order to protect your child’s teeth from cavities and tooth decay.

Make brushing a bonding time. Kids learn mostly by example. When you show them that you also brush your teeth regularly, that gives them something to imitate.You can do some strokes on your child’s teeth then do the same on yours. Brushing together is a great bonding time for you and your kids because you’re experiencing and learning something together.

We are very concerned about children's teeth and adults teeth. With your pledge, it will help us focus on a huge goal of ours- to bring the most innovative toothbrush ever - to men, women and children the world over.


A DENTAL MISSION DONE BY VOLUNTEERS LIKE JENNY ARE IMPORTANT TO TEACHING AND BRINGING ORAL CARE HEALTH TO CHILDREN ALL OVER THE WORLD. At Brush Effects we want to make sure every mouth in the world gets a chance to experience the future of Oral Care .

Look at this picture below. You can see where cavities mostly start and the progression of them. Today's current toothbrush is fine, but too many times the back of the teeth and in between teeth get neglected. With our Brush Effects Toothbrush, you get SUPERIOR cleaning action from the front, top and back of your teeth with every stroke.

Plaque can also cause an irritation in the gums and result in various gum diseases. In fact, gingivitis is one of the basic gum diseases that is caused by irritated gums. It is basically the crud, germs and plaque in our mouth that result in this gum disease. The initial stages of this gum disease include bleeding, red, swollen and tender gums. The good news is that if diagnosed in the early stages, it is possible to reverse and treat gingivitis.

Look at the head on our toothbrush - would you honestly not want to remove as much plaque and germs out your mouth to prevent sickness, cavities, gum disease, and have amazingly fresh breath and clean teeth? Well we are with you in saying yes, that's why we designed Brush Effects with great attention to detail.

It is also recommended that a toothbrush should be replaced every three months or the moment the bristles begin to wear out or fray. Thus, brushing our teeth is a simple solution to a lot of health problems and is therefore quite advantageous. Plus you save on those expensive dental bills and days laying in bed sick.

Facts & Figures

•The global market is over 33 Billion in sales per year

•The average American uses 3 toothbrushes/year; there are 315M Americans, resulting in over 900M annual sales

•The oral care industry in North America is 9.8 Billion in 2012 and is expected to grow to 10.9 Billion by 2015

•Since 2008, the oral care industry in North America has shown a steady 3-5% growth rate annually

•Europe has a growth rate of 5-6%/year

•India, China, Africa and Brazil are seeing explosive growth in oral care, upwards of 11-14%/year

•India and China in particular are facing radical growth as government health programs are pushing oral care to their respective populations; some analysts believe these markets could potentially double in the coming years. For example, only 50% of the Indian and Chinese population is known to use modern oral care products and only 15% brush twice a day. With our Brush Effects Toothbrush Tech, we want to pursue the local Governments around the world and encourage them to make oral care health one of their populations' top priorities.

Now, How Are We Going To Get Brush Effects into your Hands?

Manufacturing

The professional sourcing company we are partnering with has manufactured many styles of toothbrushes in an extremely high quality manufacturing environment for years. They have an experienced team in the field to assist with quality control, packaging, shipping and other logistics.


We're proud that we will have Brush Effects fans in many countries. We will ship worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. *Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region*.

Backing Brush Effects on Indiegogo.com is simple and secure, and open to everyone around the world.

•Log into your Indiegogo.com account, or create a new account.

•Click the *Pink* "Contribute Now Project” button at the top of this page.

•Enter your pledge amount and select a reward tier (this is the Toothbrush Reward you want to receive).

•Submit your payment information and that’s it!

You should receive a confirmation email moments after you submit the form. Indiegogo.com accepts Apple Pay for U.S. Customers only or credit card associated with Visa, MasterCard, or American Express for all other Countries. All payments are in US dollars. You can also use Pay Pal to purchase perks.

https://twitter.com/hashtag/BrushEffects?src=hash

https://twitter.com/BrushEffects

https://twitter.com/Avtar1971


Risks and challenges

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one as cool as the Brush Effects Toothbrush. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for it's Indiegogo.com campaign reveal. We will do everything in our power to get our toothbrush into production form , from it's current prototype stage. We will do everything in our power to deliver our perks fully, but it is not gauranteed.

MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling/moulds to manufacture any product is 60 to 70 days. It requires expert knowledge to get it right. We are working with a manufacturer who knows their business, and that's making high quality toothbrushes. To minimize the possibility of mistakes and delays we're working with tooling manufacturers/partners with a track record for prompt quality.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the Brush Effects Toothbrush gets ready for its spotlight there may be some fine tuning of our design and finalizing sizing. Our pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine our design. Products like these give a manufacturer insight into our product design dream and together we will fine tune the manufacturing process for Brush Effects. Any changes will always be for the benefit of you, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

FULFILLMENT: Despite the best planning, there may be factors that we cannot control such as equipment malfunction, transport or supplier delays. While we hope that your support on Indiegogo will enable us to begin production on a commercial scale, we have no idea as to whether it will be 'business as usual' for us or an overwhelming demand. If more people than we anticipate want a Brush Effects Toothbrush, we may have to scale up the factory or set up additional manufacturing in other facilities, or purchase more equipment. We will endeavour to produce the product as quickly as quality will allow. 

Sometimes things can go wrong that can cause delay. These setbacks will only make us more determined to give our customers the most amazing brushing experience ever. 

Please join our Brush Effects Facebook page and follow updates. Also please follow us on Instagram and Twitter under the Twitter Hashtag #BrushEffects  or @BrushEffects.

Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." 

Paypal needs the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page

Thanks so much for all your amazing support and contributions.

Please Note:

  • our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country.

  • combined shipping: at this time we do not have any price estimates for combined shipping. Currently it is more cost effective to send each product individually and we are working with our shipping companies to get better rates ASAP.

The old way above, you had to be a contorshnist to brush your teeth, this way, that way, this way, that way, this way, that way - it's no wonder kids hate brushing there teeth -ummmm us adults too. Let's Talk about the MarketsFor Brush Effects, Initially, we have identified eight key markets that we will target with multi-tiered products tailored specifically for each of them:•Professionals - Travellers•Military•Retail consumer market•Licensee line•Dental professional market•Hospitals, retirement homes and care homes•Pets•Denture MarketBy focusing on the above markets as discrete opportunities we will ensure our sales and marketing efforts resist redundancy, maintain high degrees of measurability and accountability and allow us to be agile and fluid in our efforts to develop the Brush Effects brand.The Industry for Dentures and Care Homes For those who have limited mobility or for caregivers who have to brush the teeth of their patients, Brush Effects will make brushing their teeth far easier than ever before.Caregivers will love that they can brush their patients' teeth in half the time by reaching all 3 sides at once. Now they will have more time to do other things; all of which are important to their day and all the while giving exceptional care - day in and day out..The Brush Effects toothbrush will also help seniors and denture wearers in a huge way. Brush Effects will help denture wearers clean dentures easier and faster than ever before, with little effort.Imagine the big smiles caregivers and patients will share everyday when it comes to brushing Teeth with Brush Effects toothbrush Tech.Military - Let's talk militaryIt's like this most of the time for Military Personnel - whenever and wherever they can- they take care of their oral care health in the most extreme times and on the go. Soldiers are busy and often work in extremely stressful environments. It is a difficult lifestyle and we appreciate their service and sacrifice. We wanted to give them a truly spectacular tool that would help make their tours more comfortable and that much easier. And that's where the Brush Effects Toothbrush comes in. The Triple brushing surfaces gives them super-fast, high-quality brushing, every time. They also have the biggest germ removing tool ever, our triple brush head tech, with side scrapers.Since 1917 Proper Oral Care Health is a VITAL and Important part of our Military Personnels' lives. PetsIn time we will be offering three models: one for small dogs, one for medium dogs and one for large dogs – plus a premium version.For a puppy like our Golden Retriever Buddy, until he is full size, his oral care is important. It's up to us to maintain his teeth and make sure his breath is always fresh. With the Brush Effects Toothbrush we just made it that much easier.(Names - Colors - Design language differences/changes may be made here)• Let's Talk Pets- MARKET ANALYSIS - PETS  OverviewDental disease, or periodontitis, is the number one oral disease in dogs and cats. Over 95% of all dogs and cats will get dental disease in their lifetime, usually by age 2-3 it has significantly started. Periodontitis is an infection of the tooth root, which ultimately results in infected teeth. When periodontal infection starts, these bacteria get into the pet’s circulation system, eventually leading to heart, liver, kidney, bone and joint disease.Approximately 75% of all dog owners and more than 50% of cat owners consider their pet a member of the family. Over 80% of dog owners and 63% of cat owners buy gifts for their pet. Brush Effects will concentrate on this emotional relationship between owners and pets to educate on the importance of oral care and the benefits of Brush Effects products for their pets .Facts & Figures•80% of dogs show periodontal disease by age 3   •those who do purchase oral care products purchase 4-6 oral care products a year, a number that significantly outpaces other pet grooming products.•the global pet care product market is 81 Billion•Americans spent 45.4B on pets in 2009, a 5.1% increase from 2008 and nearly double spent a decade ago.•The pet oral care market is worth over 450M in the US alone.•The global pet oral care market is estimated to be over 4.5B.This shows Pets are a huge part of our families. At Brush Effects our triple brush head will clean all three sides of their teeth easier than ever before. LET'S TALK ABOUT OUR WONDERFUL KIDS.Brushing your children’s teeth can either be a fun activity or a chore. It takes a while before toddlers enjoy brushing.We have all seen this play out- our kids refusing to brush their teeth. Plus they never do it properly. Brush Effects guarantees they brush all sides every single time with minimal effort and done in half the time. Kids usually feel cranky when it’s toothbrushing time. Sometimes it’s the sensation caused by the toothbrush that makes them irritated. Kids have a very limited attention span, getting them to brush their teeth for a full two minutes is truly a battle in itself. The Brush Effects toothbrush will be a new and creative way to make brushing fun for your little ones. You need to start this habit early in order to protect your child’s teeth from cavities and tooth decay.  Make brushing a bonding time. Kids learn mostly by example. When you show them that you also brush your teeth regularly, that gives them something to imitate.You can do some strokes on your child’s teeth then do the same on yours. Brushing together is a great bonding time for you and your kids because you’re experiencing and learning something together.We are very concerned about children's teeth and adults teeth. With your pledge, it will help us focus on a huge goal of ours- to bring the most innovative toothbrush ever - to men, women and children the world over.A DENTAL MISSION DONE BY VOLUNTEERS LIKE JENNY ARE IMPORTANT TO TEACHING AND BRINGING ORAL CARE HEALTH TO CHILDREN ALL OVER THE WORLD. At Brush Effects we want to make sure every mouth in the world gets a chance to experience the future of Oral Care .   Look at this picture below. You can see where cavities mostly start and the progression of them. Today's current toothbrush is fine, but too many times the back of the teeth and in between teeth get neglected. With our Brush Effects Toothbrush, you get SUPERIOR cleaning action from the front, top and back of your teeth with every stroke.  Plaque can also cause an irritation in the gums and result in various gum diseases. In fact, gingivitis is one of the basic gum diseases that is caused by irritated gums. It is basically the crud, germs and plaque in our mouth that result in this gum disease. The initial stages of this gum disease include bleeding, red, swollen and tender gums. The good news is that if diagnosed in the early stages, it is possible to reverse and treat gingivitis. Look at the head on our toothbrush - would you honestly not want to remove as much plaque and germs out your mouth to prevent sickness, cavities, gum disease, and have amazingly fresh breath and clean teeth? Well we are with you in saying yes, that's why we designed Brush Effects with great attention to detail. It is also recommended that a toothbrush should be replaced every three months or the moment the bristles begin to wear out or fray. Thus, brushing our teeth is a simple solution to a lot of health problems and is therefore quite advantageous. Plus you save on those expensive dental bills and days laying in bed sick.Facts & Figures•The global market is over 33 Billion in sales per year •The average American uses 3 toothbrushes/year; there are 315M Americans, resulting in over 900M annual sales •The oral care industry in North America is 9.8 Billion in 2012 and is expected to grow to 10.9 Billion by 2015•Since 2008, the oral care industry in North America has shown a steady 3-5% growth rate annually•Europe has a growth rate of 5-6%/year•India, China, Africa and Brazil are seeing explosive growth in oral care, upwards of 11-14%/year•India and China in particular are facing radical growth as government health programs are pushing oral care to their respective populations; some analysts believe these markets could potentially double in the coming years. For example, only 50% of the Indian and Chinese population is known to use modern oral care products and only 15% brush twice a day. With our Brush Effects Toothbrush Tech, we want to pursue the local Governments around the world and encourage them to make oral care health one of their populations' top priorities.Now, How Are We Going To Get Brush Effects into your Hands?ManufacturingThe professional sourcing company we are partnering with has manufactured many styles of toothbrushes in an extremely high quality manufacturing environment for years. They have an experienced team in the field to assist with quality control, packaging, shipping and other logistics. We're proud that we will have Brush Effects fans in many countries. We will ship  worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. *Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region*. Backing Brush Effects on Indiegogo.com is simple and secure, and open to everyone around the world.•Log into your Indiegogo.com account, or create a new account. •Click the *Pink* "Contribute Now Project” button at the top of this page. •Enter your pledge amount and select a reward tier (this is the Toothbrush Reward you want to receive).•Submit your payment information and that’s it!You should receive a confirmation email moments after you submit the form. Indiegogo.com accepts Apple Pay for U.S. Customers only or credit card associated with Visa, MasterCard, or American Express for all other Countries. All payments are in US dollars. You can also use Pay Pal to purchase perks.https://twitter.com/hashtag/BrushEffects?src=hashhttps://twitter.com/BrushEffectshttps://twitter.com/Avtar1971Risks and challengesNo one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one as cool as the Brush Effects Toothbrush. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for it's Indiegogo.com campaign reveal. We will do everything in our power to get our toothbrush into production form , from it's current prototype stage. We will do everything in our power to deliver our perks fully, but it is not gauranteed. MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling/moulds to manufacture any product is 60 to 70 days. It requires expert knowledge to get it right. We are working with a manufacturer who knows their business, and that's making high quality toothbrushes. To minimize the possibility of mistakes and delays we're working with tooling manufacturers/partners with a track record for prompt quality.PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the Brush Effects Toothbrush gets ready for its spotlight there may be some fine tuning of our design and finalizing sizing. Our pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine our design. Products like these give a manufacturer insight into our product design dream and together we will fine tune the manufacturing process for Brush Effects. Any changes will always be for the benefit of you, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.FULFILLMENT: Despite the best planning, there may be factors that we cannot control such as equipment malfunction, transport or supplier delays. While we hope that your support on Indiegogo will enable us to begin production on a commercial scale, we have no idea as to whether it will be 'business as usual' for us or an overwhelming demand. If more people than we anticipate want a Brush Effects Toothbrush, we may have to scale up the factory or set up additional manufacturing in other facilities, or purchase more equipment. We will endeavour to produce the product as quickly as quality will allow. Sometimes things can go wrong that can cause delay. These setbacks will only make us more determined to give our customers the most amazing brushing experience ever. Please join our Brush Effects Facebook page and follow updates. Also please follow us on Instagram and Twitter under the Twitter Hashtag #BrushEffects  or @BrushEffects.Disclaimer"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." Paypal needs the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page
Thanks so much for all your amazing support and contributions.

Please Note:

our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country.
combined shipping: at this time we do not have any price estimates for combined shipping. Currently it is more cost effective to send each product individually and we are working with our shipping companies to get better rates ASAP.

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Sherldine and am currently doing a PhD in Biomedical Sciences at Charles Sturt University via distance education. I am in my second year of studies and is to begin work on my dissertation. My dissertation project will investigate the effects of exercise training on the changes and recovery of autonomic function in patients with high blood pressure following cardiac rehabilitation. 

According to the research, abnormal autonomic function more specifically a chronic increase in sympathetic nerves and a decrease in parasympathetic nerves are few of many speculated pathophysiologic mechanisms that may be responsible for the development of high blood pressure and  other related conditions.

It is important for all high blood pressure patients to improve their autonomic nervous function by taking  blood pressure medications the standard approach to treatment or by making lifestyle changes or a combination of both. It is widely presume that regular exercise training is important to reduce cardiovascular risk and death from high blood pressure complications.

My research is undertaken to further expand on the usefulness of exercise-based therapy as a non-pharmacological option to boost patient’s autonomic function, therefore, improving their health and prognosis. It is hopeful my research also will contribute to improve treatments and management of cardiovascular diseases.

I have a deep passion for my research because my mother has been living with high blood pressure most of her adult life and a family relative have died from the condition. I also know countless people with the condition. I sincerely want to contribute to the advancement in cardiac rehabilitation and cardiovascular research. One of my goal is to contribute in developing, implementing and evaluating appropriate exercise prescriptions for cardiovascular disease patients.  Another of my goal is to better understand the role of regular exercise as a mediator in the regulation of autonomic function in patients experiencing high blood pressure.

Although I was approved student loans during my first year of study, I do not qualify to receive any more due to the nature of my study. I am also ineligible for grants because I attend university outside my country.

Your generous contribution will help me finish the last of my journey which is to start my dissertation project. I need upfront funds to support this project and to pay my tuition for the 2015 study period. In total I need $10,400 to cover my tuition for the winter and spring sessions and $1,600 which will cover the cost to use the cardiac rehabilitation facilities to carry out the research.

By supporting my studies you will be keeping my dream alive to further enhance my knowledge in cardiovascular research, while making a difference in the lives of cardiovascular disease patients.

Furthermore, cardiovascular disease is a serious global health issue and many have died from its complications. Many heart conditions are preventable and treatable with modifiable behaviours such as exercise participation. I would greatly appreciate your kindness to support my research endeavours.

Thank you in advance for your support.

story:
Short Summary

Hey, I'm Liam. Like lots of teenagers, I struggled at school, was quite disruptive to my teachers and dropped out before completing year 12.

But soccer (or football as it really should be called!) has been my life's passion and it's something I'm really good at.

Last year, I was lucky enough to visit my grandparents in the UK and whilst I was there met with the head coach at Morcambe Football club. They've got an awesome youth academy and I couldn't believe it when they offered me a spot there on a two season deal!

This is the break I need to start a career.

Australia has been good to me and I have represented SA and Australia in my sport on many occasions. I also spent some time at the AIS which was a brilliant opportunity.

I'm determined to make it in the game and would love to play in the English Premier League, although playing in the A-League would still be a dream come true!

What I Need

The cost of being at the academy is being taken care of through my scholarship but my parents are having to fund my return flights, living expenses and spending money but I need to come up with the cash for the first flight over - $800.

For that, I will get to the UK and can start at the academy.

The Impact

Although what I am looking to do won't save lives or feed the world, it will create a huge opportunity for me to carve out a career in something I know I'm good at. Any help I get will be much appreciated. I'd love the opportunity to become successful and one day give back in many different ways.
THANK YOU!

story:
Thank you for coming to our fundraising site. Our 60 day online campaign has ended but if you would still like to donate, please mail a check, Payable to: 

Wingman Drivers
2138 S. Indiana Ave, Unit 911 
Chicago, IL 60616

www.Facebook.com/WingmanDrivers

Background
  • Grissom Joint Air Base is in a very rural area with sparse and expensive taxi services (20-30  minute drive to a restaurant, bar, or movie theater) 
  • We need an opportunity to unwind off of base as many of us are away from our family and loved ones, sometimes for extended periods of time 
  • Males between the ages of 22 to 45 are most at risk for Alcohol-related accidents and the average age of Air Force Enlisted member is 34 
  • Alcohol-related crashes kill someone every 51 seconds and DUI accounts for approximately 1.5 million arrests each year 
  • We aim to eliminate the incidence of alcohol-related driving incidents for military members who have had too much to drink 
  • This program will be reliable, free of charge, anonymous, and operate outside of the chain of command 

What we need
  • We have a cadre of volunteers ready to drive 
  • We have an EIN (Tax ID #) and are about to launch 
  • We need money for Promotional Products to help get the word out ($250) 
  • We need money for the Non-profit 501(c)3 application ($400) 
  • We need money to reimburse our volunteer drivers for gas ($50)

story:
The story

Vanuatu was devastated by Cyclone Pam on March 13, with as many as 100,000 people left without food, water, or shelter. Vanuatu Helicopters and explorer Sam Cossman are launching a disaster relief mission to fly supplies to inaccessible villages, and to fly out those most in need of medical help. But we need money for fuel and equipment. Every $4 you can give will help save a life. 

The situation in Vanuatu

International aid efforts are focused on the damage in Port Vila, the nation’s capital, and Tanna, an island in the south east of the Pacific archipelago. But the damage is just as bad if not worse on the much smaller Shepherd Islands leading north from the capital. Not a single village has been left standing over a 100-mile stretch from Pele Island up to Ambrym Island where Sam's volcanic expedition took place mere months ago. As many as 50,000 people have been left without food, water, medical supplies, and shelter. Most of the small boats use to connect the island chain were demolished by the storm. Without natural fresh water or even coconuts left to drink, some have resorted to drinking seawater. On tiny Mataso Island, villagers were cut and killed by corrugated iron sheets ripped from their houses by the wind, and their sea-level houses were completely destroyed by the waves. The situation elsewhere is still being evaluated but due to the inaccesbility of the islands, the death toll is still unknown.

Our team

Vanuatu Helicopters (www.vanuatuhelicopters.com) pilots Ben Clark and Andy Martin operate the only Helicopter operation in the country and have a combined 10 years flying experience in the entire archipelago. Explorer and viral video producer, Sam Cossman (www.samcossman.com) who visited the Shepherd Islands on two recent expeditions to one of the world's most active volcanoes on Ambrym Island documented this verdant paradise prior to its complete annhilation (as seen in the attached video).   Given the teams knowledge of the surrounding area, existing relationships with tribal leaders and government officials, access to high profile resources like the only Medivac-helicopters and super yachts in the country,  it's up to us to make a difference.  We are collaborating with the owners of Umbra, a super yacht equipped with both a helipad and desalination plant (which can produce 4,000 gallons of fresh water per day) and have flown in two additional helicopters from New Zealand to run relief flights into the many remote parts of Vanuatu which have yet to receive any support.

What we need

We just began the operation and now it's up to all of us to keep these flights going. Without continued funds to buy fuel and supplies, this operation will be very short lived, so I'm asking for your help.  Please contribute if you can as there's no donation too small.   There is not a more well assembled, dedicated team in the country to make the kind of impact we are cable of making.....together we will save lives and help the resilient people of Vanuatu rebuild.  

We'd be honored to have you join us and the Ni-Van people in our fight against Cyclone Pam, please donate today!

story:
Summary

     First of all thank you so much for taking the time to stop and read this. My name is Cory Lutz. I am the sole owner of Elite Strength and Fitness LLC. I was honorably discharged from the United States Army in August, 2014. I was an airborne infantryman so we can all understand that the transition to civilian life has not been easy. Being a grunt really doesn't correlate with any job titles in the civilian world.

     For several years now i have been very dedicated to a fitness lifestyle. I have done research on every aspect and am on an extremely meticulous diet and workout plan. I am certified as a personal trainer through the National Academy of Sports Medicine. After bouncing around from job to job, i am now a sales manager of a personal training company. I also attend Gardner-Webb University pursuing a major in business. 

     My long-term goal is to expand into a nationwide line of gyms to possibly include; a clothing line, supplement store, and offer personal training. I briefly started my entrepreneurship by doing house calls as a personal trainer. Now, sadly, my business is on hold while i work a full time job.

What I Need

     With that being said, my short-term goal is to start a small supplement retail store to get my foot in the door and break into the fitness industry. I have calculated all of the risks and weeded out the competition. I believe the ideal of my business and the entirety of the plan is guaranteed success and i am hoping to make a move before the opportunity is squandered. Most of the funding will go toward merchandise, rent, utilities, and employment.

     My problem is i come from a very humble background and as we all know, it takes money to make money. I have zero funding and with the economy in shambles no banks or lenders are taking any risks with start-up businesses. I am looking for any amount i can get. I have always been a hard worker so i am dedicated to make this work. Give me $50,000 or $5 dollars and i will be equally grateful for both. 

The Impact

     My passion for fitness is exponential. I have experienced how it has changed my life and the lives of others. Being fit generates happiness and a healthy life. It can reverse many life inhibitions and health deficiencies. The impact of helping my company is by growing the fitness industry. This industry is already estimated to be one of the fastest growing industries due to america becoming more and more self-aware. We have faced a huge obstacle larger than any other country has faced, which is obesity. Would you rather spend thousands of dollars on medical bills or go spend hundreds being in shape. Obesity is the lead cause to most of our country's illness. Increasing the fitness industry will decrease obesity and  decrease illness, thus decreasing the demand and inflation of medical expenses.

Other Ways You Can Help

 I know times are tough so i completely understand if you cannot contribute. A way you can still help is by spreading the world. Post this page on social media or any other way that can help the cause. Thank you so much!
