story:
About Charm City Integrative Health



At Charm City Integrative Health we offer alternative therapies based on an integrative approach that takes into account the health of your whole body. Our drug-free options have the ability to heal our you and let you live your life to your fullest potential. Our services include Acupuncture, Massage, East Asian Medicine, Clinical Counseling, and Nutrition.

(One of our new therapy rooms)

As the largest acupuncture practice in Baltimore City, we are excited to add some of the hottest cutting-edge therapies to our list of services:


Whole Body Cryotherapy - We are one of the first in the state of Maryland to offer this cutting edge therapy, which treats pain, depression, weight management, and workout recovery.


Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy (HBOT) - Our chamber is similar to the ones that many NFL players use at home. It's used for post workout recovery and can also treat everything from autism to wound healing.


Halotherapy AKA Salt Therapy - The type of therapy uses a booth called a salt cocoon. The patient reclines while inhaling the equivalent of fresh, sea air. This therapy has been shown effective in severe respiratory disorders, allergies, asthma and sinus congestion.  


In addition to these high-tech therapies, we also have a professional nutritionist who will provide customized dietary counseling. This will be the perfect compliment to our selection quality supplements and nutraceuticals you can’t find at your local vitamin store.  


About the Charm City Team


​

Tom Ingegno, Owner (pictured above - center)

I’m a Licensed Acupuncturist and Integrative Medicine Specialist. For over 15 years I’ve been practicing Oriental Medicine, the last 10 of which were spent proudly here in Baltimore. I am passionate about helping people recover from illness and injury. My team and I have grown, changed and expanded three times since setting up our first clinic.

Charm City Buzz

WBAL TV Feature:



Why Indiegogo

Localizing healthcare and making alternative therapies become part of your regular wellness program is our passion. We are devoted to sharing our knowledge so that someday these alternatives will be the go-to first step before more aggressive treatments are sought. By using this platform we hope to gain more exposure not only for our clinic but for the integrative healthcare movement as a whole. Please, join us in this important endeavor!


Budget

As a way of gaining more visibility, we have expanded our business. We have moved to a larger location to allow for the additional equipment and services. Our new office is set to open in July.


While the expansion has been self-funded up to this point, these are the ways your contributions will be used to support our transition:


  • Increase our social media presence

  • Increase our inventory of supplements

  • Offset some of the expansion expenses

  • Offset some of the moving costs




Rewards




Other Ways You Can Support Our Project


Please, share this campaign with your friends and family who might be interested in integrated healthcare.

Click here to share on Facebook!

Click here to share on Twitter!


You can also follow or like us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube!

story:
Short Summary

Youth Fitness Movement (YFM) consists of a former profesional basketball player and personal trainer, two world class moms, and an attorney. Between us we have nine children.  We have spent a lot of time with our children, their friends, and in their schools. 

Childhood obesity rates have tripled in the last 30 years.  Studies have shown that by the time children finish the 1st grade they already have started to lose their mobility and range of motion. Poor posture habits have started to set in, and for any child suffering from ADHD, symptoms are magnified in a movement-deprived setting. Recent studies have shown that "sitting is the new smoking." Let's face it--our children are doing way too much of it.  We all are!

Our mission . . . no, our PASSION, is to stop this trend! As a group of concerned parents we want to get kids active and help them develop healthy movement practices through our fun, interactive classroom fitness videos that educate, motivate and inspire in six essential wellness principles--speed, mobility, strength, endurance, focus and nutrition. These videos and other educational content will be made available through our website, youtube and other social media.  We want children across the world to become YFM strong!

However, we need help to make this happen.  We want to be THE ultimate children and youth wellness resource for teachers, parents, and families. Your contributions will allow us to reach more people by enhancing our website, app and social media development, as well as producing more and better content. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $20,000.  We will use campaign funds as follows:

  • Purchase professional camera and filming equipment (approximately $4,500), 
  • Website enhancement and app development ($8,000)
  • Video editing and production ($3,500)
  • Educational materials for schools ($4,000)
Based on your contribution levels, we are happy to provide you with YFM gear, to spread the YFM Strong message.   (Sorry we don't have YFM mousepads because we want people out of their chairs doing exercise not just surfing the web).
If we don't reach our goal, we will prioritize our spending by first applying funding to website enhancement and development and video production and editing.  Our next priority will be marketing, since our goals and objectives cannot be met if people don't know about us.

The Impact

The need is dramatic-- and so will be the impact.  Little things can go a long way.  In fact, did you know that if an elementary-age child merely stands at his or her desk during the school year, the physical impact is the equivalent of running three marathons.  Just imagine the improvement in schools and for those kids who become part of our movement. Healthy habits learned while young translate into healthy habits for life. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest single barrier to implementing a healthy lifestyle may boil down to one simple factor -- a knowledge deficit.  Therefore, our greatest challenge is to get the information to people, and to transmit it in such a way that it motivates them to act.

We will overcome this hurdle by engaging and educating parents and teachers.  Our videos and other content will be free, which removes the cost barrier.  Once they have joined our movement, we will provide them with continued training through webinars, scheduled programming, and ongoing support. We will also provide challenges for classrooms and schools to encourage the application of these principles.

YFM's significant experience working in schools and with parent teacher organizations and teachers themselves has given us the insight and ability to reach our goals and objectives. We have spent and will continue to spend lots of time with teachers, parents and students to gather input and feedback about what we are doing. The truth is that YFM was born from both necessity and our actual experience.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please go to our website (www.yfmstrong.com) and subscribe.
  • Please like, follow and share our pages in social media.
  • Remember to use Indiegogo's share tools!
  • And of course, get your children up and moving by using our fantastic videos and wellness content.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We have launch part 2 of our campaign! Please follow link: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/med-west-leg...


Legal California medical cannabis business recovering from raid, bank accounts frozen

Assets Frozen. We need your help for our legal defense fund so we can fight for the future of the legal cannabis industry in California and America

On January 28, 2016 at 7:30 a.m., approximately 30 officers in body armor, helmets and carrying automatic weapons, sledgehammered the front door of Med-West, a San Diego-based company that makes legal cannabis-based medicines for legal dispensaries in California.

Interestingly enough, the local news media knew about the raid and splashed the news over the public airwaves. They reported that the officers had a search warrant for a suspected “Hash Oil Lab”. Cash was seized. Bank accounts were frozen. Two employees of Med-West were handcuffed and detained for hours and later arrested. The officers gave each other high fives as they left the building with their haul.

Just another drug bust?

No. It wasn’t.

Med-West is a legal business, that is highly regulated. Trusted in the cannabis industry and led by a cannabis pioneer who has helped influence national drug policy in multiple states.

James Slatic, a serial entrepreneur and CEO of San Diego based business Med-West Distribution, LLC, wasn't at the building during the raid and has not been arrested or charged. Slatic created the company to make and sell CO2 extracted medical cannabis products, including vape pens and cartridges. Slatic is part of the movement that wants to help create a great new American industry, and to stop putting people in jail for this helpful plant.

He has an entrepreneurial vision of helping people and raising awareness of the many options of medical cannabis and giving back to be of service to this new industry. James was a founding member of the National Cannabis Industry Association, and founding board member of California Cannabis Industry, and Nevada Cannabis Industry Associations, sits on the Board of Marijuana Policy Project, and is a regular speaker at industry and activism events for CalNorml and Drug Policy Alliance.

Med-West medicines are not the crude products of yesteryear. Rigorous laboratory testing, in a city-licensed facility, is done throughout to ensure proper potency and purity. Importantly, Med-West cannabis oil products are produced within strict adherence to state laws using a CO2 extraction method. And importantly, NO CO2 extraction took place at this facility.

Med-West does not sell their products to individual patients, only in wholesale to licensed dispensaries. City officials in San Diego were regular visitors to the 14,000 square-foot facility. Even police officers had stopped by for a visit earlier in the year. But just a few weeks after a new statewide law, that Slatic helped write and pass, took effect a local DA preformed a "smash and grab" on Med-West, and somebody called the media.

Follow the Money

The lives of James, his wife and daughters and the employees of Med-West changed drastically on January 28, 2016.

Law enforcement personnel raided Med-West took everything, in. All the companies products, raw materials, computers, hard drives, laptops, files, tax and patient records were seized, along with a large sum of cash due to be used for payroll and product purchases.

In the aftermath of this raid, 21 employees are now out of work, and patients in the hundreds of collectives we served were deprived of their medicine.

It appears that money for at least some of the personnel who planned and conducted the raid was paid from federal funds designated for homeland security ... to protect and defend our nation from terrorism.

Slatic’s Assets, Even Personal and Family Bank Accounts, Have Been Frozen 

This includes his wife and teenage daughters’ accounts as well. His wife, Annette, is a Federal employee at the VA Hospital in La Jolla, and has nothing to do with the business. Their daughter is a student at San Jose State, and could not even buy food at school. According to his bank, this was done with nothing more than a signed letter from a San Diego police detective. The bank will not provide his attorneys with a copy of the reported court order, nor will the police or D.A.’s office.

A Simple Request

Help us fight back by contributing to the Med-West Legal Defense Fund.

With their assets frozen, Slatic and his team need funds to pay attorneys, consulting experts, and others who will help them fight back against this misguided raid.

An escrow account has been established and fiduciary controls have been put in place to protect the integrity of the funds raised. The funds will be used to pay attorney’s fees and for the myriad of expenses that come along with a fight against the government.

Financial support during this critical time will be deeply appreciated ... some in the industry have already promised to help once this fund is established ... but we would also appreciate small, individual contributions from people who share our belief in the fledgling American cannabis industry.

Truth is on our side. James Slatic and Med-West need those who believe in the American Cannabis industry to provide them with the financial support they need to win this fight. If this can happen in San Diego, California … it can happen anywhere.

What We Need & What You Get

We have the following available for donors:

  • 80 Silver California coins $1,000
  • 70 Silver Nevada coins $1,000
  • 20 Kayman Bikes™ Flash E-Bike for donors of $5000 
  • Whatever we raise that is not used we will help others in similar situations


All proceeds go to legal costs, and other fees and costs toward the business opening again to help patients. Whatever we raise that is not used will go to help others in similar situations They are seeking to open (in a new location) for patient's care and medicine soon.  For more information, you can search Med-West San Diego on google, find them on instagram MedWestLLC, or facebook MedWestDistribution page.

Congressmen Dana Rohrabacher (R-CA) and Earl Blumeneur (D-OR) with James Slatic Discussing Asset Forfeiture and the Med-West Raid 



Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone is able to contribute financially. Here are some other ways that we are asking you to help:

  • Share this on Facebook, Twitter, Etc.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Take action for Marijuana Law Reform

Thank you for your support!

Web Sources:

MED-WEST, http://www.med-west.com (accessed February 10, 2016).

FOX 5 SAN DIEGO, http://fox5sandiego.com/2016/01/28/hash-oil-business-halts-operations-as-detectives-search-lab/ (accessed January 28, 2016).

NBC 7 SAN DIEGO, http://www.nbcsandiego.com/news/local/Police-raid-hash-oil-lab-kearny-mesa-366884221.html (accessed January 28, 2016).

NBC 7 SAN DIEGO, http://www.cbs8.com/story/31086445/police-raid-kearny-mesa-business-suspected-of-illegally-producing-hash-oil (accessed January 28, 2016).

story:
You Can Bring Healing to the World

You have the power to bring Somatic Experiencing (SE) therapy to survivors of sexual assault, human trafficking, and other traumatic events by helping me complete my second year of training! Nya, (my canine co-therapist) and I thank you!

Even small donations are so helpful!

SE is an innovative, gentle, neurobiologically based therapy that deeply heals by helping the client use their innate protective systems, re-unifying body and mind through the autonomic nervous system. SE, and other trauma healing psychotherapies that include the body, is endorsed by leaders in the field of psychological trauma, including Bessel Van der Kolk, Bruce Perry, Stephen Porges, and Peter Levine (its creator).

Here are some details:

  • I'm a trauma therapist, Licensed Clinical Social Worker (LCSW), and survivor in St. Louis, Missouri. I have a small private practice where I specialize in treating trauma, especially trauma from sexual assault, human trafficking, military service (I'm a veteran), and shock events like car wrecks and other boundary breeches. My great dog, Nya, a Blue Heeler, is my co-therapist (that's her in the picture with me). I have a sliding scale and work hard to serve my community.
  • I'm raising funds to pay for my second year of Somatic Experiencing (SE) training. SE is a gentle method of resolving trauma, healing from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD), anxiety, depression, and other mental, emotional, and physical health challenges that are held in the body, and that does not require continually revisiting the traumatic experience. You can find out more about SE here: http://www.thewildtherapist.com/se.html
  • By helping fund my training you will be helping people who have suffered trauma and are stuck in the aftereffects. Many people have PTSD symptoms and haven't even realized it. Then they find that "positive thinking" just isn't making them feel better. I  have found that healing trauma holistically, including mind AND body, frees people up to live their lives as they truly wish. I don't want this to be available to only people who have incomes high enough to afford it (or low enough insurance deductables!), so I offer a sliding scale. This sliding scale, though, does limit my income, which makes it hard to pay for the SE training. I paid for all of the first year on my own. Now I need help to enter the second year, so that I can increase my skills and bring them to the people.
  • In addition to SE I use depth psychology, therapeutic dream work, and have been trained in the cognitive therapies. But recent evidence is showing that the cognitive therapies may not be as effective as previously thought, and my work goes well beyond that and into neurobiologically-sound work (such as SE).
  • Here are some links to more info about me:
    Interview: Wisdom of the Wounded Healer, with The Breathe Network, 
    Yes! Magazine, interview as part of article on helping during #Ferguson
    Huffington Post Interview, National Freedom Day
    The St. Louis Beacon, Commentary
    Margaret's Blog on Huffington Post, which includes my widely read four-part series "Trauma Training Should Be Mandatory for Yoga Teachers."
    And of course my web site: http://www.thewildtherapist.com/

What We Need & What You Get

  • Here's the numbers breakdown: 
    Year 2 SE Training, after the 25% scholarship I received = $2400
    Balance remaining from Year 1 training = $989
    Total = $3389
  • If i raise the entire amount I will offer a pro bono therapy spot with unlimited sessions for a survivor of sexual assault or human trafficking. 
  • If I raise half the funds I will offer a pro bono spot for a survivor of sexual assault for one year.
  • I've got some perks for you. But I can't offer psychotherapy or social work services in exchange for donations, because it wouldn't be ethical to do that.
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, all the funds I do raise will go toward paying for the training. Every amount helps! 
  • If I surpass my goal the overage will go toward funding year three of SE training (the final year)! Yay! 

The Impact

  • Bring healing to the St. Louis community
  • Help trauma survivors heal and thrive
  • Bring system change through trauma-informed practice

Risks & Challenges

  • I have a long track record of overcoming challenges. I have survived many traumas, myself, including sexual assault and human trafficking. I clawed my way out of pain and completed two masters degrees and clinical licensure. I work from the depth paradigm of the Wounded Healer, which believes that through trauma and its healing great creativity is born, and the ability to help others find their own internal power to heal. I've written all of this, and have been interviewed by some major media outlets. Making money hasn't been my strongest talent, thus far, but I sure am diligent and unstoppable. And able to my sacrifices. I went a year without a car to pay for most of the first year of SE training, am happy to live in a small house, and my home office keeps overhead low. Maybe I've prioritized service and sanity over the material, but I've also created a life I love and that I can live. Now I'm fulfilling my dream of helping other people heal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate here are some other ways to help:

  • Get the word out about my campaign. Share it on social media or email it to your friends.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Send friends and family who are suffering from anxiety, depression, panic attacks, nightmares, and other difficulties information about Somatic Experiencing, help them find a trained practitioner in their area.

And that's all there is to it. You're awesome!

story:
Meet Tootz The Unicorn

Whenever you get a notification Tootz announces it with a blast of awesomeness.  It responds to twitter @replies and follows as well as programmable hashtags.  You can also configure your Tootz to monitor your twitch account and let you know when your favorites go live or whenever you get a subscription or tip. In short, Tootz will give you a rainbow whenever the Internet is singing your praises.

The Pitch

  • We are raising $9000 to get the wholesale prices we need to allow Tootz to get in as many people's hands as possible at the best possible price.  We also want to keep this idea train going and bring more fun tech to the world.
  • You get a stand alone robotic mythical beast that talks to the internet and lets you know when wonderful things happen.
  • Tootz is a real IoT device that brings only the best news in the best way. Configure it to watch out for #HappyHashtags or #NewsAboutMe not to mention whenever @PeopleILike are online.
  • If we don't reach our goal we will continue to push the boundaries of technology and mythical beast research.
  • We have set out to create a product that people will care for not just an e-toy.  It's an interface between you and the internet that should bring a little joy to your life every time it goes off. Because we know that, sometimes, everybody could use some good news.
  • It uses the latest in Internet of Things technology(node.js and websockets) to do just that and let you know that something good happened, in a fun way. We are very proud of our little device, hopefully you will love yours too.

Yes but How Does It Work?

Tootz integrates with twitter, Facebook, twitch and gmail but will connect to more services in the future.  It is Powered by USB or battery for fully untethered fun.

The Impact

 The World NEEDS it  and only you can make this happen. Happiness is contagious and Tootz is catching. Numerous unemployed unicorns will find homes to poot rainbows in and provide happiness to a person who needs it badly.  With your help we will make the world a more colorful, wonderful place.

Risks & Challenges

Finding mythical creatures is not easy, not to mention teaching them how to use their magic to monitor the interwebs.  Also manufacturing and sourcing the parts is hard and getting the unicorns out by the holidays is not easy, But we are up to the challenge.
  • We have a great team of "Unicorn Wranglers" that have made many dreams like this a reality in the past.
  • We're all set to go.  The jellybeans and cotton candy is ready and the unicorns are chomping at the bit. All we need is your help.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Hey, folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  Because the world just needs a Unicorn that toots rainbows.
  • follow @TootzTheUnicorn on twitter for news and upcoming events.
  • Visit the fantastic artist Ollie Santos at olleesantos.com
  • Just share this with anybody who could use some light-hearted fun. 

ReadWrite piece on Tootz

story:
V

isitez notre page Indiegogo en Français  


Meet Catspad

Available now on Noova!


The Smart Water & Food Dispenser For Cats 

Catspad is a beautiful and sleek automatic cat feeder and water dispenser. Perfect for all parents of one or more cats, Catspad will help you keep your pet healthy and happy, even when you’re away from home. Catspad is the only cat food dispenser that allows you to schedule your cats’ meals and monitor their nutrition from anywhere in the world using its application! 



Catspad Takes Care of Your Cat Wherever You Are.

Beside its automated feeding feature, Catspad enables you to check your cat's nutrition and daily consumption rate as well as get notifications when food and water supplies are low using its application on any smartphone!


 Catspad in The News!


"Cat lovers can be closer to their little campanions" Le Journal du Geek

"Kibbles 3.0" FrenchWeb

"Very practical especially when you travel" Stuffi

"Catspad will be a real assistant in your daily life" Scoop.it

"Taking care of its cat without hands, it is possible!" Objetconnecte.net


 The Best Feeder Ever! 




 Why Catspad?

Our expert team of professional designers and technicians developed Catspad to respect the cats’ nature and answer to cat owners needs. Its technology and design provide an amazing experience for both, cats and cats owners. 

1.  Catspad food dispenser enables you to feed your cats just like the wild typical ones; it has a small bowl that allows to dispense small amounts of food frequently throughout the day. Its sealed reservoir conserves kibbles for one month and keeps them fresh and strong

2.  Catspad water dispenser makes it attractive for cats; it keeps the water running and fresh and encourages cats to drink more. The water dispenser includes a filter, which removes bad tastes and smells annoying for cats.

3.  CATSPAD’s size and format will blend seamlessly with your home decor. It’s electrically powered, and also equipped with a battery in case of a power outage.




 How Does it work?

Catspad can be installed in easy steps, all what you have to do is:

  1. Turn on your Catspad
  2. Download Catspad application
  3. Connect your Catspad to your Wi-Fi network (Following the App's instructions)
  4. Identify your cat (Manually, by using a collar or your cat's subcutaneous chip)
  5. Enter your cat's information (Photo, name, age, etc..)

  6. If you have more than one cat, you just have to repeat steps 4, 5 and 6 for each one and you will be able to check each cat's consumption individually.

  7. Stay connected to your cats!


 The Catspad App

With Catspad, our smart cat feeder, the mobile application and all the services are totally free. In the first time, the app will be available for iOS and Android. Windows Phone and Webapp platforms will come shortly after the first releases. Catspad also works for multiple cat profiles per users.


What Can You Plan Using The App?

1. The water fountain:

  • You can activate the water fountain continuously
  • You can activate or deactivate the pump of the fountain at anytime you want (Example: You want it to be turned off during night because you don’t want to hear the sound of the water flowing )
  • You can activate it only when the cat is near the Catspad

Notes:

  • We advise to keep the fountain active all the time, because the moving water will attract your cat and encourage him to drink more, which will keep him healthy and therefore avoid many health problems.
  • To keep the water healthy, the pump should be activated once every 1 hour. So even if you deactivate the fountain, the Catspad's pump will be activated automatically to replace the water in the bowl with a fresh one.

2. The kibbles stock:

Catspad can distribute the kibbles with exact quantities and at specific time during the day and as much times as you want. Scheduling the meals is as easy as setting an alarm on your smartphone. You can setup the time, the frequency and the quantity for the kibbles distribution. (Example: from 7:00 am till 7:00pm, 3 times everyday or just on Sunday, 25 grams each time). You can also schedule meals as much as you want.


3. Supplies notification

With the default settings, Catspad will automatically alert you if the level of supplies is too low (3 days before it gets empty). You can change the alert setting and make it 7 days before, for example.


4. What to do if a power outage happens when you are away from home?

In case of power outage, Catspad has a backup battery that can last for one month. If your internet box doesn’t work and you are no longer connected to Internet, your Catspad will not be able to send updates to your mobile, though it will continue to take care of your cat by distributing the kibbles as per the last schedule setting and activating the water fountain every one hour. The objective is to keep the main utilities of the machine functioning, which are the food dispenser and the water fountain. 


 Tech Specs

  • Size: 20” x 13”
  • Weight: 4 kilos
  • Food capacity: 1.7 Kilos
  • Water capacity: 8 litres sufficient for one month
  • Works with all types of kibbles
  • Washable
  • Multiple sensors (RFID, weight, pressure)
  • Rechargeable backup battery
  • Controlled through mobile application
  • Connected to the home Wi-Fi network

         


Advised By Trusted Veterinary!

Catspad has been designed and tested by expert veterinarians. They are willing to recommend it for your cats. 


 Perks For Our Indiegogo Contributors

 What You Will Get 

Each Catspad comes boxed with the following:

  • 1 Catspad

  • 1 Charger

  • 1 Collar (will help you track your cat’s nutrition)


 Where We Are and Where We are going

The funds we will receive from this campaign will help us to further develop our project, we actually need 100,000 Dollars to finalize it. You can check the breakdown of the tasks we worked on and what we are aiming to accomplish after the campaign below:


 Our Amazing Team

Catspad is the fruit of trusted friendship between Julie & Brice, friends from high school.

They went last year on vacation and left Mozart, Julie’s cat, with a friend who got sick. Sadly, Julie and Brice had to cut their vacation short in order to return and take care of Mozart.

Brice, an engineer and a big fan of technology, asked himself: « why is there no smart product that can help us take care of our cat and save our vacations? »

This is when they embarked on their big adventure.

Julie and Brice decided to adapt connected technology to facilitate the life of cat's owners by creating a new smart dispenser for cats. They decided on asking cat lovers from different sectors to help them develop the project.

Catspad was born and the team was created  with Mozart, our everyday inspiration manager!

 Risks & Challenges 

Every new and innovative project involves risks, but we are doing our best to minimize those risks. There may be manufacturing and production delays that are out of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. 

We are motivated about our amazing project, we created a trustworthy team. We believe in our idea and worked hard to do what we have done within a short time frame. 

Above all, we are cats owners and we developed Catspad with the help of other pet owners, that is why we are sure that our product is useful for any cats owner. Our only goal is to succeed and make the life of all cat owners easier.

With our expert team and with YOUR SUPPORT, we are going to achieve our goal, and produce Catspad and deliver it on time.


 Catspad Referral Program 


With our Catspad referral program, you will have the chance to get your Catspad for Free!

How does it work?

It is very simple: every time we got a new contribution through your personal URL link, you will get 10% back of your investment.

Example: If you purchased your Catspad & you shared your unique URL on your social media channels & 10 persons purchase the Catspad, you will be entirely refunded. 

You can start right now:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account 

  2. You should be a backer (if you are not, contribute now)

  3. Share our page using your unique URL and invite people to purchase Catspad

  4. We will count the number of purchase generated through your URL at the end of the campaign

  5. We will then issue you a refund on the Catspad you have purchased
How to find your personal URL?

When you log into your Indiegogo account, and visit our campaign page, you will see the share icons on the left side. You just have to click on the link icon to generate your unique URL and share it via email or your social media channels.



How to keep track of your referrals?

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

  2. Click on your profile name on the right top of the page 

  3. Click on "Contributions" in the dropdown menu 

  4. Click on "Referrals" tab in the menu 

  5. Track your referrals 



 Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. You can simply tell us what you think about our product because your feedback, comments and suggestions matter for us. You can also talk about us, generate a word of mouth and share our project page using Indiegogo's share tools, with your friends who will be interested in our product! 

"Meowwwwwwwww".. this will be a great thanks from all cats around the world!

And in return, we thank you very much in advance for your contribution and support!

 FAQ

1. Is the app free?

Of course it is! The application will be available on the AppStore and the Google Play Store for free, all you have to do is to download it and connect it to your Catspad.

2. Is it easy to connect Catspad to the Wi-Fi and the application?

It’s all handled when you turn on the Catspad: it will send a signal to the app and all you will have to do is to follow the instructions to sync your Catspad to your user account.

3. Can I use my catspad with multiple phones ?

Catspad was made to facilitate the cat’s owner’s life. In order to do that, your Catspad can be connected to many phones, so your family members can track your cat(s)’s health and nutrition. It can also be connected to your tablet, your PC, and all the devices where the app is installed to monitor your cat's nutrition. A web app is also under development.

4. What is the voltage needed for my Catspad ?

Catspad is made to work worldwide. You will receive the Catspad with the adapter according to the country you live in.

5. Can I turn it off?

The dispenser has an ON/OFF button, so you can turn it off whenever you want.

6. Is it easy to clean Catspad?

The bowl, the water dispenser and the reservoir can be easily disassembled and are easily cleanable with a sponge or even put to the dishwasher for some parts.

7.  Am I alerted if my cat does not eat conveniently?

Since you can track your cat's nutrition, you can know what the big changes are in his nutritional behavior. Your app will therefore notice it and notify you in the minute.

8.  What will happen in case of power outage?

Catspad got a battery that automatically goes on if a power cut occurs. The smart feeder can function on battery for a whole month. 

9.  What will happen in case of Wi-Fi disconnection?

In case of a power outage or any problems that causes a Wi-Fi disconnection, the Catspad will continue to work normally. It is just no longer connected to your phone: it will work as you firstly set it up.

10. Can it be used for dogs?

Yes, Catspad can be used for little dogs.

11. How much are the shipping costs?

The shipping costs $ 30 but we are offering it for our first 50 buyers.

12. When can I get my Catspad at home?

As shown above, the Catspad will be entirely ready to be delivered in December. So you’ll have it at your home for your cat’s next Christmas!

13. Can I move my Catspad one it is in use? What is its weight?

You are totally free to move your Catspad. As empty, its weight is 4kg, so you can do it easily, without any help!

14. Is Catspad safe for my cat?

Yes! At Catspad, we truly love cats, so everything has been done to ensure the safety of our tiny little friends.

15. Can I use Catspad with any race or type of cat?

Yes, you can use Catspad for any cat aged more than 2 months and a half.

16. Can I put wet food inside my Catspad?

Catspad doesn’t support wet food because it’s too hard to keep it fresh.

17. What country is catspad made in?

Catspad is a French product. Our team works from Toulouse, the “pink city” (or Ville rose) in the south-west of France.

18. How many cats Catspad can be used with?

As many as you have! There is no limit for the number of cats that Catspad can manage.

19. Can Catspad be delivered anywhere in the world?

Cats' lovers are everywhere, so is Catspad! Wherever you are, we can deliver it for you.

20. Does Catspad comes with a warranty?

Catspad has a one year warranty after you receive it. If anything happens to your device, we will take it back and replace it for you.

You are totally free to move your
Catspad. As empty, its weight is 4kg, so you can do it easily, without any help!
14. Is Catspad safe for my cat?

Yes! At Catspad, we truly love cats, so
everything has been done to ensure the safety of our tiny little friends.
15. Can I use Catspad with any
race or type of cat?
Yes, you can use Catspad for any cat aged
more than 2 months and a half.
16. Can I put wet food inside
my Catspad? 
Catspad doesn’t support wet food because
it’s too hard to keep it fresh. 
17. What country is catspad
made in? 
Catspad is a French product. Our team
works from Toulouse, the “pink city” (or Ville rose) in the south-west of
France. 
18. How many cats Catspad can
be used with? 
As many as you have! There is no limit for the number of cats that
Catspad can manage.
19. Can Catspad be delivered
anywhere in the world? 
Cats' lovers are everywhere, so is Catspad!
Wherever you are, we can deliver it for you.
20. Does Catspad comes with a
warranty? 
Catspad has a one year warranty after you receive it. If anything happens to your device, we will take it back and replace
it for you.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Jason Venckus and I am the founder of Momentum Fitness and Health in Chicago (burbs). But I wasn't always the athletic 37 year old you see in the video and I wasn't always a personal trainer or health coach. When I was 28 I was very sick. I didn't eat right or exercise, I smoked and I drank and it took it's toll on my health. I wasn't even 30 yet and I was on blood pressure medication as well as one other pill!

I decided I needed to change my life so I wouldn't be taking dozens of pills by the time I was 50. I got into running, exercising and eating healthy! I left a stressful job and relationship! I quit smoking and greatly reduced my drinking! And you know what? It worked!  That's when I decided I wanted to help others turn their health around. I became a  personal trainer and later a health coach and I've been helping people for over 5 years now! To this day I have complete 5 full marathons and two Half Ironman distance triathlons. Even my father has made a valiant comeback to running and fitness.

I want to reach out to more people. I want to provide fitness for people of all ability levels, in any situation at any time. We at Momentum want to build a video and recipe library that you can access at the gym, in a hotel, at home or even in parking lot! And for a very affordable price to our fans. But it has to be good! We have to have good camera equipment, fantastic settings and motivational people to get would be exercisers excited!

Your contribution can help us get there. It can help us provide affordable, instructor lead workouts that you can do at any time in any situation. What sets us apart from other online fitness sites? For starters you can pick and choose what workouts you do daily. You don't have to be strapped into a 12 week program. We understand that sometimes you are a little sore and may need a different workout that day. You can choose that! We will also have a portal to track all of your goals, action steps and accomplishments and be able to share them in a "member's only" online wall. Imagine the support you get from others that may be in your shoes or have gone through it. You will also have online access to our trainers for any questions.

We can reduce the world's obesity epidemic, hypertension, type 2 diabetes and many other chronic illnesses by working together!


What We Need & What You Get

We need about $8,000 dollars to build the website infrastructure alone. On top of that we will have shooting and editing fees for each video as well as rental space to shoot some of our videos until we upgrade a space of our own.  We are currently estimating it will cost $25,000 total to complete the project and provide a decent studio of our own. We will of course use parks and hotel rooms for workouts as well and these will come with rental fees too. Should we use models or actors they will come with a price too but we will try and use everyday, hardworking people that best represent us.

For your donation you will receive a branded T-Shirt (Dri-Fit) as well as free enrollment on the website and a water bottle with time markings to keep you on track! If you live in the area or are visiting you will also have access to our classes. We just may eventually have live demonstrations and classes near you too! The length of your membership will depend on the amount of your investment but can include lifetime membership. Workouts and recipes for life!
We are going to launch this thing no matter what! As long as we can get to the $10,000 mark, the website will be launched. I have many partners that I can negotiate with and pay as we go or at a later date. We are currently in business as a simple studio and have some working capital and lots of support!

The Impact

This project will help you as well as others: find daily motivation and support. find daily workouts you can do at any level, find daily corrective exercise workouts as needed, workout anywhere (home, hotels, office, parks and even empty parking lots), find healthy recipes no matter your food preference, have access to members that can share their success stories and struggles, access to real personal trainers via the web and track your progress by uploading photos, measurements and logging exercise.

My company started out as a $0 start up with a $600 loan from the P's in 2013 in a very competitive business, fitness. The very first year we did about $6,000 while I  working part time as well, the following year we almost tripled our revenue and third year we doubled it again adding two trainers. We now have 14 weekly classes along with individual clients and something we call office hours. This is all done with zero dollar marketing as well. We are building a large social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.
We at Momentum know how hard it is to find daily motivation to go to the gym each day and workout, especially when you don't have a planned routine. Many stumble about the gym doing the same machines with no real intention. This gets boring! That's why our classes are different workouts each time you come in and have options for all ability levels. Trainers can be expensive, I admit that, but what they can give you the support, workout design and encouragement you need.  We want to bring that to you where ever you are!

Risks & Challenges

With any investment there is always risk and especially so in the fitness and nutrition industry. There are so many new products and gimmicks that it has created a $31 billion a year industry. We are not trying to sell you miracle cure books or products. We strongly believe the best way to health and fitness is clean nutrition and exercise with proper progression. This has always  been the  underlying truth with all the products you see on TV. We aren't them and trends are leaning this way with the holistic health movement.

We are not rebuilding the wheel on fitness and nutrition, we are just using it better than anyone else. We continue to build Momentum (see what I did there) using that same wheel and inspiring others to take their health and the health of their families seriously. We continue to expand our sphere of influence and are relentless with our message.  

We overcome our obstacles by never giving up and you should too!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that sometimes money is short and it's just not in the financial budget to donate but if you could please share our campaign with your friends, families and circles we would greatly appreciate it! Once the website is complete I promise you affordability.

Indiegogo has amazing tools for sharing our campaign and getting the word out!

"Let us help you find your Momentum!"

Kind Regards,
Jason C Venckus

story:
Our Story

300 million people suffer from asthma globally.  Despite the prevalence of the disease, very little attention is given to improving the lives of those who suffer from it every day.  Our objective is not only to manage asthma symptoms, but also to introduce a suite of products that will act as an infrastructure to improve overall quality of life.

We have developed a device that will help predict when a child is about to have an asthma attack. The device will provide real-time data that can be shared with researchers to help in the search for a cure for asthma.  Along with the device, we are developing an educational platform to teach children and parents how to control asthma symptoms, and a home inspection tool that can be used to ensure that asthmatics are living in a safe environment.

With $10,000 we will move forward with the development of these tools.  Any additional funds raised will go towards testing, and getting our tools into the hands of asthmatics.  The more we are able to raise, the more areas we will be able to test, and the greater the impact that we can have on families who struggle with asthma.

When you donate to this project, you become a part of a cause that will bless the lives of millions of children.  Because of you, they will be able to breathe easy and be able to enjoy a higher quality of life.


Educational Platform


Current asthma education does not connect on a personal level with children because many platforms are not taking advantage of today's technology.  We have done extensive consumer research in the asthma and allergy space.  We are working to provide the best asthma education experience for the "Touch Screen" generation.  On a HIPPA secure video portal we connect the hospital to the home so doctors can teach patients everything from proper inhaler technique to adjusting the built-in digital asthma action plan.  After 2 years of research and collaboration with our 20+ person advisory team, we have distilled decades of practical knowledge into the new standard curriculum to educate children with asthma through an interactive app.

  • Interactive Games
  • Motion Graphic Videos (Boast higher retention rates)
  • Personalized Learning
  • Built-in Reward System
  • Digital Asthma Action Plan


Environmental Assessment Platform


Maintaining a healthy home environment is essential to controlling asthma.  Many children have been rushed to the ER only to return to the environment that triggered the attack in the first place.  Fortunately, there are some public health departments and non-profits that have implemented early home visit programs to assess the air quality in a home and to check for possible triggers.  The results have been wonderful, lowering ER visits by 60% on average.  However, these programs are expensive to set up and manage.  We have designed the Control A+ Environmental Assessment Platform to provide the necessary tools at a low cost. This will allow our data system and tool kit to scale to public health departments and nonprofits  across the country quickly.  All of this is accessible through an app; the connected tool kit can plug into an iPad.

Components:

  • iPad connected tool kit (infrared camera, black light, humidity/temp, etc.)
  • Data system and dashboard
  • Inspector's library
  • Direct link to lab

Asthma Assist Device



Our device is designed to monitor vital and body indicators and the environment in order to warn when a child is at high risk of having an asthma attack. It acts as a bridge to help parents and kids control asthma triggers and irritants by giving real­time notifications of possible environmental factors that could lead to asthma attacks.  The device can calculate the environmental factors and make recommendations of activities to help the kids avoid situations that could trigger an attack.  It will also work as a home respiratory therapy tool, giving information to help children to build lung function by having them exercise at optimal times. This is accomplished through our proprietary video game controller designed to monitor their lung function while allowing activity and fun. The data collected by the device can be shared through a HIPPA-secure portal with doctors and researchers, opening a new era of real­time clinical research.



This will empower children with asthma to take an active part in managing their condition. It will alert parents of possible threats - giving them peace of mind - and it will give doctors a 360° view of their patients’ condition  and the data to make better recommendations for treatment. 

Components: 

  • Video Game Controller
  • Monitors Indoor Environment
  • Monitors Outdoor Environment
  • FEV1 Lung Function Monitor
  • Link from the Home to Hospital

Impact


Our mission is to empower asthmatics so that they can control their asthma, not be controlled by it.  The educational app and environmental tool kit alone have the potential to lower ER visits by over 50%.

With the infrastructure of the Control A+ product line, the future for asthmatics looks much brighter.   Children will have the best interactive education platform to connect the hospital to the home.  Parents, patients, and doctors will have a research tool that will take personalized medicine to the next level. Our products will lower the effects of fear-based trauma and disempowerment issues associated with asthma. Parents will have peace of mind knowing that they have effective tools to prevent their child from having an asthma attack.


Our Team

Our team is 19 people strong.  As long as asthma keeps threatening lives, we will be working as efficiently as possible to get our products into the hands of those who need it most.


Your support will make a significant difference in the lives of those who struggle to breathe everyday.  Those who are helped will be forever grateful for your generosity.

story:
Welcome to Soundembrace Health!

I see something that the rest of the world doesn't see. Another way. What would life look like, what would it feel like if you no longer had to deal with pain? My name is Danielle Hall and I am the founder and lead practitioner at Soundembrace, LLC. 

I have a healthy discontent with the status quo and my mission is to bend and reshape your view on what life can actually be like. What it should be like. Pain free and filled with so much joy!

I am here today because I am asking you to see what I see. This vision is bigger than me and I need your help.

I help people live a life they love waking up to. I accomplish this by creating sound experiences that relieve stress, reduce pain, increase mental clarity, create ease and balance within emotions, and connect to the depth of your soul being. 

Soundembrace Health is more than an app. This is a tool for transformation on a grand scale. Through my sound healing 1 on 1 practice, I have had the opportunity to support the healing journey of so many. People with PTSD, insomnia, anxiety, people who have dealt with varying degrees of trauma, self worth issues, and life transitions. Relieving stress. Reducing pain.

As you will learn below, the features of the app go beyond simply sharing the power of sound healing music.  It takes into consideration that we are scientifically proven to be unique. Not one of us are the same.  Who we are, the state of our body and our mind, is a reflection, and is influenced by our genes, and the things that influence the expression (or activation) of those genes, or switch them on and off.   (This is called Epigenetic factors.)

By taking into consideration these Epigenetic factors, we will give you an areal view of your health and wellness story.  All of this so you can gain new perspective and awareness surrounding your goals for your health and wellbeing. Awareness provides the opportunity for choice, and it is through your choices that you have the opportunity to change the trajectory of your life.

Awareness = Empowered Choice = Opportunity for Profound Change

A new paradigm in health is surfacing and it requires technological innovation. Innovations that supports and empowers individuals in their health journey.  In person Sound Healing sessions are helping so many!  Just think about the potential to help so many more with this app.

Donating will not only support the efforts to make this tool for transformation a reality, it will support the transformation that occurs when someone finally feels that sense of relief and hope they have been longing for. Something I had the opportunity to experience in my own wellness story. (Check out "My Story" below)

Thank you for your time and consideration in supporting this campaign.  I will be adding more content and progress reports as it all evolves.

In love + gratitude,

Danielle

My Story


 

What We Need & What You Get

This project is a huge undertaking.  So far it has been completely self-funded. However, if it weren’t for Mobile App Hero believing in me and my mission, the price tag for this project would have been much, much, higher.

  • The funding I am asking for is going straight to the price of the app, the website creation, and branding. 
  • This does not include the price to go into a professional recording studio to have the sound healing music produced, recorded, or mastered. Any donation past the set amount will go towards the music production and mastering costs.
  • Whether or not I receive full funding, all funds from this campaign will go straight into creating this app.  You will continue to receive updates on its progress and all perk promises will be delivered no later than beginning of December.

PERKS

I am so incredibly thankful for the support of the small business owners who are supporting this campaign. Your support to this campaign is also supporting small businesses.

Please note that the donation suggestions are not a representation of the cost for the perk gifts. The perks are just that; a perk, or gift for your generosity to this campaign.

Here is a little more information about the perk gifts attached to your donation:

Wild at Heart Ritual Essential Oils:  IG  Wild_at_Heart_Ritual 
Butterfly Essential Oil Blend 7.5ml
This blend is intended to bring about feelings of "lightness" and "cheerfulness". Connecting with the spirit of the Butterfly.

Ingredients: Organic Coconut oil, Bergamot, Lavender, Lemon & Clary Sage 

Yo Soy Candles:  https://www.yosoycandles.com/
I AM LIGHT 4oz Candle

This fragrance is a soft, well-balanced blend of tea, spices and musk that helps to provoke a sense of comfort and confidence in oneself to move forward in goals and aspirations.

All candles are hand poured in small batches using 100% US grown soy wax, cotton wick, essential oil and fine fragrance blends. Our products are free of phthalates, dyes, lead and parabens. Made in Portland, Oregon.

Burn time: 
4oz 15-20 hrs- smaller rooms (bath, office)

Element of Sri: https://www.etsy.com/shop/elementofsri
Mala Bracelet (6in) or Mala Necklace (19in)
Materials: Amethethyst, wood, tassel
Each “eos intentions” tassel is handmade with 108 strands bound 8 times. The tassel represents enlightenment as all strands come together they signify the connection between all – the culmination of our prana and consciousness.

We are often asked what is the significance to the 108 beads. Some believe the significance ties to the 108 desires in mortals or the 108 lies that humans tell; some relate it to the 108 stages of the human soul, possibly that the path to enlightenment is attainable through taking only 108 breaths in a day while in deep meditation; others believe 1 is god/higher truth, 0 is emptiness or completeness, and 8 is eternity – the truth is both empty and complete for eternity. When meditating on your mala it is believed to be complete once you have devoted 100 mindful intentions allowing 8 exceptions for errors or distracted intentions. Element of Sri believes a mala is a very personal and sometimes even spiritual symbol which means you will be provided a differing response depending on who you ask – look within and search for your meaning. Each bead is threaded on 4 strands of cord for strength and longevity to give you plenty of time to find your truth.

Immodesta Tea:  https://immodestea.com

Immodestea is the collaboration of an Engineer and a Tea Master who want to see a more connected world. With dedication to 3 major values, Quality, Education and Community, we work to connect the world through immersive events and healthy, intelligent products. 

Our tea subscriptions are the best way to bring the rejuvenating practice of gong-fu style tea into your own life, a practice designed to enrich your body and your relationships and you please. We often pair tea ceremony with live Sound Healing events; together let's bring the holistic experience into your own home.

From this campaign, you would receive a flight of one style of tea all the information you need to brew and recount the history of that tea.  Please note that this package only contains the tea.  Not the essentials for brewing. 

The Impact

Americans are under so much stress it's now registering on the American Psychological Association's anxiety meter. The APA has recognized that up to 90% of illnesses and Dr. visits are due to the nature of stress.  (1) 

The CDC has called chronic disease “the public health challenge of the 21st century.”  Studies have found many health problems are related to stress. Stress seems to worsen or increase the risk of conditions like obesity, heart disease, Alzheimer's disease, diabetes, depression, gastrointestinal problems, and asthma.  (2)

One out of three Americans will die prematurely from a condition that’s mostly related to lifestyle, habit, or circumstance. These are conditions that pills and procedures can control but not fix. (2)

Your contribution will support the creation of a powerful tool that will support many people in relieving stress and the chronic symptoms it manifests.

Soundembrace Health uses psychoacoustics, binaural beats, and Epigenetic research to help clients improve their health and reduce their risk of chronic disease by relieving stress, and reducing pain through sound healing therapy.  Although we cannot say we can heal, we can say that we create the environment for the body to go into its own natural healing state, being a catalyst for positive change in ones health and wellbeing. 

Bruce Lipton:
“When you receive music such as sound healing music that has a nice flow and harmonic resonance to it, it entrains you, it causes the mind to stop all the stress, and calm down, and work to become more harmonious and more flowing.  If you can just do that, it would be a primary incentive for the body to heal itself. The body heals itself when you stop your stress.  This is why the nature of sleep is so important.  Sleep says, “SHUT OFF THAT MIND!  The mind is interfering with the system.

When you go to sleep, all the stresses shut off and that’s when the body says,  ‘Great!  This is our opportunity to heal!’  But why wait until nighttime?

Energy healing is rising in our civilization because of Quantum Physics and new technology to measure the effects of Energy Medicine.”

In terms of physical well-being, sound and music therapy can help with the following:

  • Higher levels of energy
  • Sense of balance & direction improved
  • Fewer headaches
  • Lessening of sensitivity to particular sounds
  • Relief from chronic tiredness
  • Relieve the sensation of shortness of breath or tightness in the chest
  • Lower cortisol, blood pressure, reduced heart rate, relaxed muscle tension, and reducing stress

Emotional benefits include:

  • Relief from anxiety
  • More confidence
  • Less frustration
  • Improved ability to relax
  • Improvement in overall “mood”
  • Improved patience
  • Better ability to communicate and interact with others
  • Improved ability to express emotions

Mental benefits include:

  • Brain “fog” dissipates
  • More motivated in life
  • Improved ability to listen to new ideas with an open mind
  • Better organization skills
  • Improvement in attention span
  • Less likely to become irritable

Functions of the App:

Soundembrace Health mobile application will:

1. Make sound healing accessible all over the world

2. Collect opt-in/anonymous research to support the validity and credibility of Sound Healing

3. Sound Practitioner and Coaching platform network to support coaches with a client dashboard supporting clients in their health and wellness journey.

How?

1. Make sound healing accessible

+ All sound sessions on the app are recorded in a professional studio with an engineer who knows how to mic and record these types of high vibrational instruments that produce a wide range of harmonics.

+ All sound sessions will be sent to a mastering engineer to maintain the integrity of the sound across many platforms.

+ After a 1 week free trial, the price to use the app will only be $8 a month, or $80 for the year.

+The app connects with your apple and android devices so you can track your stress and pain levels over time, as well as your food and physical activity.

+The dashboard will show an overall view of your health. You will be able to take pictures of your food to track what you are consuming, you will be able to make journal entries to track your mental and emotional states, the app will connect to your fitness apps to import data on your activity, and it will track your relaxation and stress reduction time with the sound healing sessions.  All of this to show an areal view of your health and wellness story so you can become aware of where you may need to make adjustments so you can empower yourself to make change and live a life you love.

+Users will also have the option to connect with a Sound Healing Practitioner, or coach to deepen their practice, or gain support for their goals for an added coaches fee.

2. Collect opt-in/anonymous research to support the validity and credibility of Sound Healing

+ All users will be required to fill out a short health assessment to use the app.  This will ensure that the app is appropriate for them to use as well as support their goals through algorithms in future iterations of the app.  If they opt-in, information such as age, reason for being on the app, ethnicity, and the data collected from their device  will be used to paint a picture of how sound healing is assisting users in stress reduction, pain relief, and deepening their meditation practice.

+Over time, this data will be used to write research papers for submission to medical journals and institutions, if the user has opt in to this anonymous research.

+This data will also be used in future iteration of the app to tailor the experience of users by creating more sound healing music for specific ailments that we see over and over through the app.

3. Sound Practitioner and Coaching platform network to support coaches with a client dashboard.

+Client users will be able to hire a sound healer or coach from the app to support them in their health and wellness goals.

+ Sound Practitioners and Coaches can set up a Coach Account where they can add their clients and track their progress.   This gives their clients access to the app for $5 per month instead of $8 for the duration they are a client of the Coach.  The coach will have access to client sessions dashboard to support them on their goals.

Risks & Challenges

A new paradigm in health is surfacing and it requires technological innovation. Innovations that supports and empowers individuals in their health journey.

Sound healing is a non-invasive healing modality that faces the same challenges as acupuncture and chiropractic services did before becoming “mainstream”. Sound Healing Therapy is not widely known, it is considered esoteric, there are many sound healing practitioners doing this work all over the country but many are not educated in how sound affects the body.  There are also many great sound healing practitioners but they know how to market their services to make a career and living out of it.  

My plan to remedy this is to collect the opt-in users data to submit research papers that support the credibility and validity of the field, through branding, strategic marketing and collaborations I will present Sound Healing Therapy as accessible and fun thus changing the perspective of the industry, Soundembrace will be offering Sound Healing Classes in 2018 to educate Sound Healing Practitioners and those who are curious about the therapeutic power of sound, and the app will support and promote sound healers and coaches who use the app.

Other Ways You Can Help


Some of you may not be able to contribute. I get that!  Below are a few ways you can still help.

Ways you can support!
1. Donate to this crowdfunding page.
Here is the short link:  https://igg.me/at/SounsembraceApp​

2. Share the crowdfunding link through email, text, by a phone call to family and friends, share on Facebook, Instagram, and any other social media platform you enjoy.  Make it personal! Share how sound healing has helped you, how I have inspired you, and/or why you support this campaign.

You can even copy and paste the below text: 
"Sound Healing is a powerful tool for transformation relieving stress and reducing pain.  Join me in supporting my friend Danielle Hall in making sound healing accessible through her app! Its helped me, and I know it will help so many others!"

3.  Share the link to my upcoming events with your friends and family so they can experience it for them self!  In the month of September I have events in Atlanta, Philadelphia, San Francisco, San Rafael, Petaluma, and Los Angeles.    www.Soundembrace.com/Events

Other:

Sites:

  1. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-02-15/americans-just-broke-the-psychologists-stress-record
  2.  https://www.cdc.gov/chronicdisease/pdf/2009-power-of-prevention.pdf

Research Studies:
A study by NCBI,  has shown the effectiveness of recorded, and in-person Vibroacoustic Therapy sessions (aka Sound Healing Therapy) with sound healing instruments on emotional health)

The National Institute of Health, Government of USA researched Vibroacoustic music (VAM) offered to hospitalized patients. The results indicate over 50% reduction of pain and symptoms.

Neuroscientist Jessica Grahn of the University of Western Ontario studies how music and rhythm can entrain muscles, providing external timing to help the brain compensate. Her research adds to growing evidence for music as a therapy for Parkinson’s symptoms.

In 2008, the journal Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine published a review of 20 studies of brain-wave entrainment and patient outcomes. The conclusion was that brain-wave entrainment is an effective tool to use on cognitive functioning deficits, stress, pain, headaches, and premenstrual syndrome.

Cymatics is a word coined by Dr. Hans Jenny, a Swiss medical doctor, who investigated the power of sound to create form. His Cymatic experiments show the effects of sound waves upon many different types of material, including water, pastes, liquids and plastics. Dr. Jenny’s work demonstrates positive proof of the amazing power of sound to create form.

Japanese researcher Mr. Masaru Emoto work provides factual evidence that human vibrational energy, thoughts, words, ideas and sound affect the molecular structure of water.

Dr. Mitchel Gaynor links sound healing to music therapy. In "The Healing Power of Sound" he cites studies indicating that music can lower blood pressure, reduce cardiac complications among patients who have recently suffered heart attacks, reduce stress hormones during medical testing and boost natural opiates.

Alfred A. Tomatis was an internationally known otolaryngologist, and inventor. He discovered that you don’t normally make frequencies with the voice that you don’t hear. 


Testimonials:


“Before meeting Danielle I had never heard of a sound bath, and now I’m obsessed. It feels hard to explain one until you’ve experienced it, but I would describe it some sort of magical combination between the best meditation session, nap and orgasm you’ve ever had. It’s a full body, transcendent experience and release like nothing else I’ve experienced. Things that I didn’t even know were blocked and stuck in my body started shifting and releasing and I felt so much freer afterwards. Danielle is amazing and her passion, talent and wisdom make this experience so special.”  — Julia W.


“Through working with Danielle with Soundembrace I have gained tremendous health improvement in a very short time. I am continually learning and expanding my knowledge of the many methods available to eliminate painful and uncomfortable digestive problems as well as I have tried any number of ways to obtain greater clarity and concentration in my personal and work life. Daily fatigue has increased over the past several years and my energy level has reduced greatly as a result of health issues. These sessions with Danielle have provided the greatest results of anything I have tried or the numerous professionals I have worked with towards eliminating the pain and discomfort from poor digestion. After only three visits I noticed a huge difference and after two weeks using the take home program I have more energy, virtually little to no pain or discomfort with digestion and have become clearer in my thinking thus able to successfully reduce stress and “cloudy thinking.” It is with confidence I recommend this method of healing and more specifically recommend working with Danielle. It is obvious to me that she has chosen a career well suited to her… and there is no doubt she will change the lives of many people.” — Sharon K.


“Both as a participant of Danielle’s Sound Bath, and of her individual sessions, I have to say that everything from her bedside manner (it’s almost a pun) to her techniques and the effectiveness of the sessions is fantastic. I’m solidly a fan of what she does, and excited to be able to benefit from the skills she has. Her awareness, and realism combined with fantastic enthusiasm make for enriching discussions and sessions leading to discovery, acceptance, and what feels like genuine growth.

As someone who has experienced a great deal of their life fighting illness, constant nutritional challenges, and wondering if I was supposed to be sick all the time, it has been great to be able to learn from her own experiences in this regard.

If you respond well to energy and sound work, she expresses and practices fantastically in both, in an almost effortless way, I definitely recommend her.” — Dave E.


“My session with Danielle was nothing short of amazing. The insights we both received during the session were profound and Danielle really took the time to make sure that I felt grounded and complete before we finished. I will definitely be booking another session the next time I’m in San Francisco! Thank you” — Abby M.


“I am 64 years old, and had been in daily pain since my motorcycle accident in 1976. (… I had a broken neck, I believe C5, as well as other injuries and nerve damage… Spent 1 year in a “circle bed”, another 6 months in Crutchfield Tongs, then a 4 poster collar for 4 months, on to re-hab for 3 months where I learned to walk again.) After the awful experience with my recovery, I was DONE with doctors and did not attend my physical therapy sessions.

I sought help (38 years later!) because I had been living in pain since the accident. The pain had become more and more difficult to manage. I was so amazed at how I felt after just 1 session with Danielle I continued sessions almost every week for a year. In that year, I had 3-4 in person sessions a month while also playing the daily take home program on my legs. I am now living pain free! No more restless leg syndrome, I have feeling back in my feet (!), and I sleep better than ever before. I am so glad I gave sound therapy a try. I highly recommend it!” — Charley H.


“I tried a session with Danielle not knowing what to expect and am so glad I did! It was SO relaxing, and my tight shoulders and back really needed that kind of deep release. I’m an active person – I run, dance, and do lots of yoga – but sometimes my muscles are so tight that I hold back because I’m afraid I’ll overdo it and strain myself. I know my tension comes mostly from stress and too much time in front of my computer, so giving myself the time to relax so deeply (I felt like I dropped into another world inside of myself for a while) was exactly what I needed to go back out into my week and ride the waves without getting overwhelmed. Not only had my body let go, but my mind felt way more at ease, grounded, and flexible too. Amazing medicine. Thank you, Danielle!”— Alex M


“I didn’t know much about sound therapy when I began Soundembrace sessions with Danielle. I had been dealing with autonomic dysfunction and peripheral neuropathy for several months. I found Danielle’s mix of methodologies to be really relaxing and impactful. Our sessions would start with my feet placed on a Cyma machine that would send sound frequencies up through my feet for the duration of the session. Danielle would then open the session with a blessing or chant and begin playing the crystal bowl. The crystal bowl is an amazing instrument. It is very penetrative and put me into a theta brain wave state very quickly. For the second half of the session, Danielle would stop playing the crystal bowl and give me a reiki treatment. I found this to be really powerful as well. Over the course of a few weeks of treatment, the began having normal sensation return to my feet (I hadn’t been able to feel them for two months). I found the sessions to be very meditative and through that meditation, I was able to dissolve a lot of anger I was holding toward certain doctors that dismissed my symptoms. In the weeks to follow, I received a genetic diagnosis and am now undergoing physical rehabilitation. I am very grateful to Danielle for helping me cope with a very difficult time of uncertainty. After every session I felt relaxed and rejuvenated, as if waking from a good night’s sleep. I highly recommend Danielle’s unique method of sound healing for anyone struggling with a health or emotional issue. ”— Robynne W.


“I just want to say thank you to Danielle for introducing me to this alternative form of healing. I live an active lifestyle, so I have accumulated wear and tear on my knees over time.

Most recently, I had a minor tear in my meniscus. My options were knee arthroscopy (2 week healing time) or rest and relaxation (2-3 months). I will only consider surgery as LAST and ONLY option. So, I opted to rest and let it heal. After talking with Danielle, she mentioned her sound therapy technique and how it can accelerate healing times.

I used the sound therapy program 1-3 times per day for about 3.5 weeks. There were no noticeable differences until the 3rd week. I had better movement and my knee was no longer locking on me. I was back in the gym going about 70% capacity of my limits shortly thereafter. The sound therapy has allowed my nagging injury to heal quicker so I can get back to the gym sooner.

If you are receiving another form of treatment, sound therapy can be a great compliment to expedite your recovery. Although, not at 100%, I was back in the gym less than 5 weeks after my injury. I strongly recommend this program! Thanks Dani!” — Greg K.


“I was blessed to be a part of the “sound bath” that Danielle facilitated at a recent WOW event. During the experience, I found myself deeply relaxed and then taken into an altered state of consciousness. I saw images and received insights, but most importantly felt completely safe and surrounded by love. It felt as if many energies that were not serving me were stirred up and released. A lot of the negativity came out as a head cold which moved through in a couple of days. When I came out the other side I felt light, joyful and like I was vibrating at the “right” frequency.” — Bethany M.


“Dearest Danielle, Thank you for a truly beautiful experience this past Thursday. It was deeply nourishing and I felt a level of peace and true relaxation like never before. Really grateful for you and your band of healers.”— Megan R.


“Danielle has been my guide in adventures through sound, helping me to lead to full health both physically and mentally. I am still on my journey to full health, but after one session I became more aware and in tune with my thought patterns that were causing stress – which my body was physically reacting to.

In the session, she carefully listened to my words and described her suggested treatment with details of what it would entail. My treatment happened to be a combination of binaural beats to reach theta brain waves for relaxation while Danielle used reiki techniques and crystals to release any blocked energy. We ended the session by discussing my experiences and her observations, and she sent me home with some tips and mental exercises to think about. While new to healing sessions, her calmness and clear explanation took away any anxiety I may have had with a new experience.

I have been able to sleep deeper as an immediate result to the session. She has followed up with me to see how my healing process has been. I feel a good amount of progress just from my first session, and can’t wait to return to keep the healing process moving forward. Thanks, Danielle!”
— Mari I.
