story_txt:
Welcome to Soundembrace Health!I see something that the rest of the world doesn't see. Another way. What would life look like, what would it feel like if you no longer had to deal with pain? My name is Danielle Hall and I am the founder and lead practitioner at Soundembrace, LLC. I have a healthy discontent with the status quo and my mission is to bend and reshape your view on what life can actually be like. What it should be like. Pain free and filled with so much joy!I am here today because I am asking you to see what I see. This vision is bigger than me and I need your help.I help people live a life they love waking up to. I accomplish this by creating sound experiences that relieve stress, reduce pain, increase mental clarity, create ease and balance within emotions, and connect to the depth of your soul being. Soundembrace Health is more than an app. This is a tool for transformation on a grand scale. Through my sound healing 1 on 1 practice, I have had the opportunity to support the healing journey of so many. People with PTSD, insomnia, anxiety, people who have dealt with varying degrees of trauma, self worth issues, and life transitions. Relieving stress. Reducing pain.As you will learn below, the features of the app go beyond simply sharing the power of sound healing music.  It takes into consideration that we are scientifically proven to be unique. Not one of us are the same.  Who we are, the state of our body and our mind, is a reflection, and is influenced by our genes, and the things that influence the expression (or activation) of those genes, or switch them on and off.   (This is called Epigenetic factors.)By taking into consideration these Epigenetic factors, we will give you an areal view of your health and wellness story.  All of this so you can gain new perspective and awareness surrounding your goals for your health and wellbeing. Awareness provides the opportunity for choice, and it is through your choices that you have the opportunity to change the trajectory of your life.Awareness = Empowered Choice = Opportunity for Profound ChangeA new paradigm in health is surfacing and it requires technological innovation. Innovations that supports and empowers individuals in their health journey.  In person Sound Healing sessions are helping so many!  Just think about the potential to help so many more with this app.Donating will not only support the efforts to make this tool for transformation a reality, it will support the transformation that occurs when someone finally feels that sense of relief and hope they have been longing for. Something I had the opportunity to experience in my own wellness story. (Check out "My Story" below)Thank you for your time and consideration in supporting this campaign.  I will be adding more content and progress reports as it all evolves.In love + gratitude,DanielleMy Story
 What We Need & What You GetThis project is a huge undertaking.  So far it has been completely self-funded. However, if it weren’t for Mobile App Hero believing in me and my mission, the price tag for this project would have been much, much, higher.
The funding I am asking for is going straight to the price of the app, the website creation, and branding. 
This does not include the price to go into a professional recording studio to have the sound healing music produced, recorded, or mastered. Any donation past the set amount will go towards the music production and mastering costs.
Whether or not I receive full funding, all funds from this campaign will go straight into creating this app.  You will continue to receive updates on its progress and all perk promises will be delivered no later than beginning of December.
PERKSI am so incredibly thankful for the support of the small business owners who are supporting this campaign. Your support to this campaign is also supporting small businesses.Please note that the donation suggestions are not a representation of the cost for the perk gifts. The perks are just that; a perk, or gift for your generosity to this campaign.Here is a little more information about the perk gifts attached to your donation:Wild at Heart Ritual Essential Oils:  IG  Wild_at_Heart_Ritual Butterfly Essential Oil Blend 7.5mlThis blend is intended to bring about feelings of "lightness" and "cheerfulness". Connecting with the spirit of the Butterfly.Ingredients: Organic Coconut oil, Bergamot, Lavender, Lemon & Clary Sage Yo Soy Candles:  https://www.yosoycandles.com/I AM LIGHT 4oz CandleThis fragrance is a soft, well-balanced blend of tea, spices and musk that helps to provoke a sense of comfort and confidence in oneself to move forward in goals and aspirations.All candles are hand poured in small batches using 100% US grown soy wax, cotton wick, essential oil and fine fragrance blends. Our products are free of phthalates, dyes, lead and parabens. Made in Portland, Oregon.Burn time: 4oz 15-20 hrs- smaller rooms (bath, office)Element of Sri: https://www.etsy.com/shop/elementofsriMala Bracelet (6in) or Mala Necklace (19in)Materials: Amethethyst, wood, tasselEach “eos intentions” tassel is handmade with 108 strands bound 8 times. The tassel represents enlightenment as all strands come together they signify the connection between all – the culmination of our prana and consciousness.We are often asked what is the significance to the 108 beads. Some believe the significance ties to the 108 desires in mortals or the 108 lies that humans tell; some relate it to the 108 stages of the human soul, possibly that the path to enlightenment is attainable through taking only 108 breaths in a day while in deep meditation; others believe 1 is god/higher truth, 0 is emptiness or completeness, and 8 is eternity – the truth is both empty and complete for eternity. When meditating on your mala it is believed to be complete once you have devoted 100 mindful intentions allowing 8 exceptions for errors or distracted intentions. Element of Sri believes a mala is a very personal and sometimes even spiritual symbol which means you will be provided a differing response depending on who you ask – look within and search for your meaning. Each bead is threaded on 4 strands of cord for strength and longevity to give you plenty of time to find your truth.Immodesta Tea:  https://immodestea.comImmodestea is the collaboration of an Engineer and a Tea Master who want to see a more connected world. With dedication to 3 major values, Quality, Education and Community, we work to connect the world through immersive events and healthy, intelligent products. Our tea subscriptions are the best way to bring the rejuvenating practice of gong-fu style tea into your own life, a practice designed to enrich your body and your relationships and you please. We often pair tea ceremony with live Sound Healing events; together let's bring the holistic experience into your own home.From this campaign, you would receive a flight of one style of tea all the information you need to brew and recount the history of that tea.  Please note that this package only contains the tea.  Not the essentials for brewing. The ImpactAmericans are under so much stress it's now registering on the American Psychological Association's anxiety meter. The APA has recognized that up to 90% of illnesses and Dr. visits are due to the nature of stress.  (1) The CDC has called chronic disease “the public health challenge of the 21st century.”  Studies have found many health problems are related to stress. Stress seems to worsen or increase the risk of conditions like obesity, heart disease, Alzheimer's disease, diabetes, depression, gastrointestinal problems, and asthma.  (2)One out of three Americans will die prematurely from a condition that’s mostly related to lifestyle, habit, or circumstance. These are conditions that pills and procedures can control but not fix. (2)Your contribution will support the creation of a powerful tool that will support many people in relieving stress and the chronic symptoms it manifests.Soundembrace Health uses psychoacoustics, binaural beats, and Epigenetic research to help clients improve their health and reduce their risk of chronic disease by relieving stress, and reducing pain through sound healing therapy.  Although we cannot say we can heal, we can say that we create the environment for the body to go into its own natural healing state, being a catalyst for positive change in ones health and wellbeing. Bruce Lipton:“When you receive music such as sound healing music that has a nice flow and harmonic resonance to it, it entrains you, it causes the mind to stop all the stress, and calm down, and work to become more harmonious and more flowing.  If you can just do that, it would be a primary incentive for the body to heal itself. The body heals itself when you stop your stress.  This is why the nature of sleep is so important.  Sleep says, “SHUT OFF THAT MIND!  The mind is interfering with the system.When you go to sleep, all the stresses shut off and that’s when the body says,  ‘Great!  This is our opportunity to heal!’  But why wait until nighttime?Energy healing is rising in our civilization because of Quantum Physics and new technology to measure the effects of Energy Medicine.”In terms of physical well-being, sound and music therapy can help with the following:
Higher levels of energy
Sense of balance & direction improved
Fewer headaches
Lessening of sensitivity to particular sounds
Relief from chronic tiredness
Relieve the sensation of shortness of breath or tightness in the chest
Lower cortisol, blood pressure, reduced heart rate, relaxed muscle tension, and reducing stress
Emotional benefits include:
Relief from anxiety
More confidence
Less frustration
Improved ability to relax

Mental benefits include:
Brain “fog” dissipates
More motivated in life

Innovations that supports and empowers individuals in their health journey.Sound healing is a non-invasive healing modality that faces the same challenges as acupuncture and chiropractic services did before becoming “mainstream”. Sound Healing Therapy is not widely known, it is considered esoteric, there are many sound healing practitioners doing this work all over the country but many are not educated in how sound affects the body.  There are also many great sound healing practitioners but they know how to market their services to make a career and living out of it.  My plan to remedy this is to collect the opt-in users data to submit research papers that support the credibility and validity of the field, through branding, strategic marketing and collaborations I will present Sound Healing Therapy as accessible and fun thus changing the perspective of the industry, Soundembrace will be offering Sound Healing Classes in 2018 to educate Sound Healing Practitioners and those who are curious about the therapeutic power of sound, and the app will support and promote sound healers and coaches who use the app.Other Ways You Can HelpSome of you may not be able to contribute. I get that!  Below are a few ways you can still help.Ways you can support!1. Donate to this crowdfunding page.Here is the short link:  https://igg.me/at/SounsembraceApp​2. Share the crowdfunding link through email, text, by a phone call to family and friends, share on Facebook, Instagram, and any other social media platform you enjoy.  Make it personal! Share how sound healing has helped you, how I have inspired you, and/or why you support this campaign.You can even copy and paste the below text: "Sound Healing is a powerful tool for transformation relieving stress and reducing pain.  Join me in supporting my friend Danielle Hall in making sound healing accessible through her app! Its helped me, and I know it will help so many others!"3.  Share the link to my upcoming events with your friends and family so they can experience it for them self!  In the month of September I have events in Atlanta, Philadelphia, San Francisco, San Rafael, Petaluma, and Los Angeles.    www.Soundembrace.com/EventsOther:Sites:
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2017-02-15/americans-just-broke-the-psychologists-stress-record
 https://www.cdc.gov/chronicdisease/pdf/2009-power-of-prevention.pdf

Research Studies:A study by NCBI,  has shown the effectiveness of recorded, and in-person Vibroacoustic Therapy sessions (aka Sound Healing Therapy) with sound healing instruments on emotional health)The National Institute of Health, Government of USA researched Vibroacoustic music (VAM) offered to hospitalized patients. The results indicate over 50% reduction of pain and symptoms.Neuroscientist Jessica Grahn of the University of Western Ontario studies how music and rhythm can entrain muscles, providing external timing to help the brain compensate. Her research adds to growing evidence for music as a therapy for Parkinson’s symptoms.In 2008, the journal Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine published a review of 20 studies of brain-wave entrainment and patient outcomes. The conclusion was that brain-wave entrainment is an effective tool to use on cognitive functioning deficits, stress, pain, headaches, and premenstrual syndrome.Cymatics is a word coined by Dr. Hans Jenny, a Swiss medical doctor, who investigated the power of sound to create form. His Cymatic experiments show the effects of sound waves upon many different types of material, including water, pastes, liquids and plastics. Dr. Jenny’s work demonstrates positive proof of the amazing power of sound to create form.Japanese researcher Mr. Masaru Emoto work provides factual evidence that human vibrational energy, thoughts, words, ideas and sound affect the molecular structure of water.Dr. Mitchel Gaynor links sound healing to music therapy. In "The Healing Power of Sound" he cites studies indicating that music can lower blood pressure, reduce cardiac complications among patients who have recently suffered heart attacks, reduce stress hormones during medical testing and boost natural opiates.Alfred A. Tomatis was an internationally known otolaryngologist, and inventor. He discovered that you don’t normally make frequencies with the voice that you don’t hear. Testimonials:“Before meeting Danielle I had never heard of a sound bath, and now I’m obsessed. It feels hard to explain one until you’ve experienced it, but I would describe it some sort of magical combination between the best meditation session, nap and orgasm you’ve ever had. It’s a full body, transcendent experience and release like nothing else I’ve experienced. Things that I didn’t even know were blocked and stuck in my body started shifting and releasing and I felt so much freer afterwards. Danielle is amazing and her passion, talent and wisdom make this experience so special.”  — Julia W.“Through working with Danielle with Soundembrace I have gained tremendous health improvement in a very short time. I am continually learning and expanding my knowledge of the many methods available to eliminate painful and uncomfortable digestive problems as well as I have tried any number of ways to obtain greater clarity and concentration in my personal and work life. Daily fatigue has increased over the past several years and my energy level has reduced greatly as a result of health issues. These sessions with Danielle have provided the greatest results of anything I have tried or the numerous professionals I have worked with towards eliminating the pain and discomfort from poor digestion. After only three visits I noticed a huge difference and after two weeks using the take home program I have more energy, virtually little to no pain or discomfort with digestion and have become clearer in my thinking thus able to successfully reduce stress and “cloudy thinking.” It is with confidence I recommend this method of healing and more specifically recommend working with Danielle. It is obvious to me that she has chosen a career well suited to her… and there is no doubt she will change the lives of many people.” — Sharon K.“Both as a participant of Danielle’s Sound Bath, and of her individual sessions, I have to say that everything from her bedside manner (it’s almost a pun) to her techniques and the effectiveness of the sessions is fantastic. I’m solidly a fan of what she does, and excited to be able to benefit from the skills she has. Her awareness, and realism combined with fantastic enthusiasm make for enriching discussions and sessions leading to discovery, acceptance, and what feels like genuine growth.As someone who has experienced a great deal of their life fighting illness, constant nutritional challenges, and wondering if I was supposed to be sick all the time, it has been great to be able to learn from her own experiences in this regard.If you respond well to energy and sound work, she expresses and practices fantastically in both, in an almost effortless way, I definitely recommend her.” — Dave E.“My session with Danielle was nothing short of amazing. The insights we both received during the session were profound and Danielle really took the time to make sure that I felt grounded and complete before we finished. I will definitely be booking another session the next time I’m in San Francisco! Thank you” — Abby M.“I am 64 years old, and had been in daily pain since my motorcycle accident in 1976. (… I had a broken neck, I believe C5, as well as other injuries and nerve damage… Spent 1 year in a “circle bed”, another 6 months in Crutchfield Tongs, then a 4 poster collar for 4 months, on to re-hab for 3 months where I learned to walk again.) After the awful experience with my recovery, I was DONE with doctors and did not attend my physical therapy sessions.I sought help (38 years later!) because I had been living in pain since the accident. The pain had become more and more difficult to manage. I was so amazed at how I felt after just 1 session with Danielle I continued sessions almost every week for a year. In that year, I had 3-4 in person sessions a month while also playing the daily take home program on my legs. I am now living pain free! No more restless leg syndrome, I have feeling back in my feet (!), and I sleep better than ever before. I am so glad I gave sound therapy a try. I highly recommend it!” — Charley H.“I tried a session with Danielle not knowing what to expect and am so glad I did! It was SO relaxing, and my tight shoulders and back really needed that kind of deep release. I’m an active person – I run, dance, and do lots of yoga – but sometimes my muscles are so tight that I hold back because I’m afraid I’ll overdo it and strain myself. I know my tension comes mostly from stress and too much time in front of my computer, so giving myself the time to relax so deeply (I felt like I dropped into another world inside of myself for a while) was exactly what I needed to go back out into my week and ride the waves without getting overwhelmed. Not only had my body let go, but my mind felt way more at ease, grounded, and flexible too. Amazing medicine. Thank you, Danielle!”— Alex M“I didn’t know much about sound therapy when I began Soundembrace sessions with Danielle. I had been dealing with autonomic dysfunction and peripheral neuropathy for several months. I found Danielle’s mix of methodologies to be really relaxing and impactful. Our sessions would start with my feet placed on a Cyma machine that would send sound frequencies up through my feet for the duration of the session. Danielle would then open the session with a blessing or chant and begin playing the crystal bowl. The crystal bowl is an amazing instrument. It is very penetrative and put me into a theta brain wave state very quickly. For the second half of the session, Danielle would stop playing the crystal bowl and give me a reiki treatment. I found this to be really powerful as well. Over the course of a few weeks of treatment, the began having normal sensation return to my feet (I hadn’t been able to feel them for two months). I found the sessions to be very meditative and through that meditation, I was able to dissolve a lot of anger I was holding toward certain doctors that dismissed my symptoms. In the weeks to follow, I received a genetic diagnosis and am now undergoing physical rehabilitation. I am very grateful to Danielle for helping me cope with a very difficult time of uncertainty. After every session I felt relaxed and rejuvenated, as if waking from a good night’s sleep. I highly recommend Danielle’s unique method of sound healing for anyone struggling with a health or emotional issue. ”— Robynne W.“I just want to say thank you to Danielle for introducing me to this alternative form of healing. I live an active lifestyle, so I have accumulated wear and tear on my knees over time.Most recently, I had a minor tear in my meniscus. My options were knee arthroscopy (2 week healing time) or rest and relaxation (2-3 months). I will only consider surgery as LAST and ONLY option. So, I opted to rest and let it heal. After talking with Danielle, she mentioned her sound therapy technique and how it can accelerate healing times.I used the sound therapy program 1-3 times per day for about 3.5 weeks. There were no noticeable differences until the 3rd week. I had better movement and my knee was no longer locking on me. I was back in the gym going about 70% capacity of my limits shortly thereafter. The sound therapy has allowed my nagging injury to heal quicker so I can get back to the gym sooner.If you are receiving another form of treatment, sound therapy can be a great compliment to expedite your recovery. Although, not at 100%, I was back in the gym less than 5 weeks after my injury. I strongly recommend this program! Thanks Dani!” — Greg K.“I was blessed to be a part of the “sound bath” that Danielle facilitated at a recent WOW event. During the experience, I found myself deeply relaxed and then taken into an altered state of consciousness. I saw images and received insights, but most importantly felt completely safe and surrounded by love. It felt as if many energies that were not serving me were stirred up and released. A lot of the negativity came out as a head cold which moved through in a couple of days. When I came out the other side I felt light, joyful and like I was vibrating at the “right” frequency.” — Bethany M.“Dearest Danielle, Thank you for a truly beautiful experience this past Thursday. It was deeply nourishing and I felt a level of peace and true relaxation like never before. Really grateful for you and your band of healers.”— Megan R.“Danielle has been my guide in adventures through sound, helping me to lead to full health both physically and mentally. I am still on my journey to full health, but after one session I became more aware and in tune with my thought patterns that were causing stress – which my body was physically reacting to.In the session, she carefully listened to my words and described her suggested treatment with details of what it would entail. My treatment happened to be a combination of binaural beats to reach theta brain waves for relaxation while Danielle used reiki techniques and crystals to release any blocked energy. We ended the session by discussing my experiences and her observations, and she sent me home with some tips and mental exercises to think about. While new to healing sessions, her calmness and clear explanation took away any anxiety I may have had with a new experience.I have been able to sleep deeper as an immediate result to the session. She has followed up with me to see how my healing process has been. I feel a good amount of progress just from my first session, and can’t wait to return to keep the healing process moving forward. Thanks, Danielle!”— Mari I.Achievements:2017 (up to October)Sound Experience for the LumiSummitFeel The Vibration:Weekend RetreatDirty South Yoga FestClosing CeremonyLive the FifthInterviewed on The Lighter Side NetworkInterviewed on Ms Alle LiveThe Center for Love and Light :monthly sound baths 2016Paradigm Therapy Center :Weekly sound healing for children dealing withvarious degrees of trauma WeWork:Granted a free office space for a year through theirMission Possible Program. A program for mission driven businesses The International Sound Therapy Association:Taught DrummingCorePower Yoga:Sound Bath Series  (On going)Retreat in SerenbeHealing For the People:Fundraising Yoga + Sound BathCentering Youth:Fundraising Yoga + Sound BathChik fil a:Corporate Wellness Program Lululemon :Here To Be Program at Cumberland CavernsOver 300 guests Lululemon :Private store eventsChantlanta :Teaching Toning withThe International Sound Therapy Accosiation Ecstatic Festival:Provided Sound Bath experienceand taught a meditation class2015Soundembrace:Mentoring Sound Healers and Hiring themArt In Nature:Provided Sound ExperienceWix.com:Monthly Sound Baths  (On going)Refuge :Somehow found time to be in a movieStrong Body Love Retreats + Events(On going)2014Cymatics Conference, Atlanta:SpeakerLinkedIN:Corporate Wellness ProgramSpirit Junkie Masterclass:Pre event meditationAthleta:Store eventStudiomix:Monthly Sound Baths (On going)Co Founded Women of Wellness San Francisco (ended 2016)Sustainable Health Seminar Series Sponsored by Whole FoodsBulletproof Conference CrewIdea WorldInterviewed on the Pathfinder Series2013Opened Sound Healing StudioCyma Practitioner CertificationReiki Master CertificationGraduated from the Sound and Conciseness Institute        for Sound Healing Therapy

story:
My names are Desiree Chinwe Opara. As much as am ashamed to do this online, i have no choice. You either mock me, pity me or help me but i rather voice it out than keep quite while i suffer in penury.

Am unfortunate to come from a family who are selfish, greedy and cruel. Many times i wonder how i end up with such family. I know most of you reading this has that kind of relations but i think my own relations are worst both from my father and mother's side.


Things got worse when my dearest loving mother got seriously ill, i and my little sister was the ones constantly taking care of her while other family members are busy giving foolish excuses for lack of funds.

Late February, i rushed my mum to the hospital and stood by her side for 5 weeks before she gave up the ghost. I spent everything that i have, sold my property to pay my mum hospital bills while most of my family members kept on lying they don't have money. The worst of them all was my father who left us to start another family with another woman. He refused to spend a dime. We called him severally only for him to push the entire responsibility to us claiming he has retired and not working. 


All these made me to question my mum that why do bad thing happen to good people, because my mum is the nicest person on earth, she is tolerant, forgiving and down to earth. She carried everybody, nurtured her children and grandchildren and was a good wife to my dad, and yet she wasn't showed love in return. My mum answered me by saying, "That if our Lord Jesus was persecuted and killed, then who is she, that we should all bear our own cross to attain salvation". 


After my mum's death, to my astonishment, everyone started flaunting money for the burial including my father, all of a sudden, money started coming out of their pockets. They did all that to prove to the community that they can perform a befitting burial ceremony for their own. I became so angry and at the funeral, I took the microphone and I narrated everything and how my mum suffered in the hands of my dad, how my dad used to beat her up when we were kids, I angrily exposed all of them to all visitors that came for the burial. And I said it that they will all get their reward someday for their wickedness, but because of my mother's teaching about forgiveness and for that fact I have forgiven them with all my heart for what they did to my mother. People were amazed, many came to applaud me and encourage me to be strong while my family members all put their head in shame, some of them came to defend themselves to me trying to soothe their conscience. 


Now after my mother's burial, my landlord sent me out for owing rent for more than a year because I used all the money for hospital bills, I was also forced to shut down my business for the same reason. I had no choice than to take my son and my little sister down to another city to squat at my elder sister's house. Just two months of staying at her place, yesterday she and her husband told me that they are giving me till end of this month July to move out of their house with my son and sister. I wasn't surprised, I was expecting something like that to happen because I know the kind of family members I have; but my own blood elder sister to treat us like that was just too much to bear knowing fully well that the reason am in this condition is because I was spending all my resources on our mum's hospital bills and drugs. I called my dad and told him what happened, my dad became angry, then called them and ask them to give me till August ending. They accepted. 


They don't even feed I and my son and sister, am the one who runs around to give my little ones food. 


My mother always believed in me, she says am different and she believes that I will become a great person someday, she always encourage me to believe in myself. Even my father always say he has high hopes for me because am his favorite. Even when I became a single mom, my mother never gave up on me, she even nurtured my son all to herself, my dad was disappointed and kept his distance for awhile. 



The only pain I felt each day is that maybe just maybe I didn't do my 100% best to save my mum. I think the reason my mum gave up the ghost is because she wanted to kind of free me because my mom saw how I was running up and down with hospital bills with little or no help from family members, I just came back from selling my laptop and was chatting with my little sister when we noticed my mother has quietly left. She wasn't breathing again. We called the doctor and he confirmed her dead.

For 5weeks I slept at the hospital at my mother's bedside, never leaving her side except to go and look for money, and it was times like that I went to cook for her that I came back to witness that my mum suffered stroke and went into coma. Till date, I can't bring myself to forgive myself, maybe if I haven't left to go and cook, maybe she wouldn't have suffered stroke because she was all alone and I don't trust the doctors and nurses. Since my mum went into stroke and coma, when she finally woke up, she became paralyzed from her arms to leg, she can only hear me but she couldn't speak to me or see me even though I noticed she was trying hard to say something to me, I needed for her to tell me what happened just few minutes I left her alone to go home and cook. Unfortunately my mum never got to tell me that until she died. I feel so guilty and the pain is draining me that I didn't do my best for my mum. 

My mum before she fell sick


Am not telling this story because I want your pity or sympathy. Am not asking you all to carry my burden. I believe very soon I will get back on my feet and all this will seem like a bad dream. 

All am asking is for the sake of my son and my little sister, I need help with feeding money to be able to feed them properly. My son is just 3years and this is the age they need to feed well. We have been feeding by the grace of God. 


Please if am certain of their feeding, then I can have peace of mind to go out there and hustle for money to get back on my feet and to be able to provide a place to live. I can't be able to do that if I have to worry about their feeding every minute.


Please if it touches you to help me my friends, please kindly contribute, even a dollar can make a difference. All I want is just $1000 to be able to purchase food stocks for my son and little sister while I go out to hustle for a best livelihood. 

Am sorry, there are no Perks. I have nothing to offer except my sincere gratitude. 


Thank you and God bless.

story:
Short Summary

Our official website : www.GingerBlaast.com

Ginger is a secular root yet very difficult to include in everyday nutrition by making it fully accessible to all.  When you participate to this campaign, you will donate to make humans health a priority because when we consume Natural Foods, we all gain a better health.

Ginger is one of the most important food plant that has been created and is also used in herbal medicine. The cultivation of this plant extends so far back in human history that specific origins are hard to trace.

Our family has engineered a process to stabilize Ginger Juice and turn it to a daily beverage.  Having completed the FDA compliance process from our kitchen, we launched the prototype and the response was overwhelming: 98% of our testers recommended we sell the product but we had no  access on financing for this new product. Making it in our kitchen cannot fulfill their recommendation, that is the reason why we bring it to you so you help Natural Ginger Drink launch by prepaying the first brew! Our first brew is due 90 days after this campaign closure, time necessary to purchase and instal our new Ginger juice extraction equipment already engineered and ready to ship from plant in China

 Composition of this drink is all natural , a savvy mixture of Ginger milk freshly extracted from roots  with flavors and cane sugar, manufactured under appropriate heat and pressure guarantee the fresh taste of true Ginger and the long life conservation of our product.

GINGER BENEFITS

It is proven scientifically that ginger help cleanse our liver. http://www.lifescript.com/health/centers/osteoarthritis/alternative_treatments/ginger_articles/ginger_root_and_your_health.aspx

 What we need:

We need to acquirer a small $40000 property and install our artisan production plant. There you will find 3 ginger juice extractors worth $12000 and able to squeeze 500kg of raw Ginger a day;  two years ago we used all our $14000 savings to engineer and acquire one 100L pressure cooker delivered to us from China and we are going to use it in our small artisan production plant finally. Then we'll set up a small linear bottling and packaging line worth $50000. The remaining of your funding, $48000 will help us acquire inputs and raw material as we can only buy Ginger in shipping container. Once we accomplish this plan things will go faster.


Impact of your pre-orders /contribution:

Your funds will serve to order the equipment described above and install them to start our artisan production line. 20 employees will be recruited to work every day to the plant and this is an amazing contribution to bring back jobs in the US; It is also a major contribution to the world economy because you will allow the small farm cultivator in Africa, Vietnam, China or India to earn a batter living by selling his ginger roots to us. Your third big contribution is to empower lives with no sickness to multiple as they learn to consume natural products brought to their daily life


What you get:

Please chose your perk and you will be receiving your First Brew of Natural Ginger Drink before Christmas, you will share it among friends and you will certainly never spend another Christmas without you Ginger drink from us. For 3 years if you place one order, you will receive your shipping free of charge and that is why we are ready to create a network of contributors.

  As you see on the picture, Ginger Natural Drink is delivered in glass bottle only and you can keep as long as you want. However once you open it, please keep it cool and use it the next 7 days.

 The best part for you is to know the virtues of Ginger roots, the internet is telling more and the people are confirming the stories. We suggest some links though to increase your love for Ginger root drinks.

www.lifescript.com/health/centers/osteoarthritis/alternative_treatments/ginger_articles/enjoy_the_health_benefits_of_ginger.aspx

As we begin this campaign, we trust that many will help either by pre-ordering or by spreading the word to their friends. One think for sure is that drinking one glass or tea cup of our Natural Ginger drink everyday guarantees that your liver will function better and will improve elimination of unwanted things from you body.
Please do not hesitate to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Our Story

Thank you for visiting our Indiegogo page! We are just an ordinary married couple with a passion for non-invasive, alternative forms of therapy.  Evanston Float Center is a flotation and massage therapy center located in Evanston, IL.  We put a lot of thought into opening up a float therapy and massage spa with the intentions of helping people relax and heal. It came about one day when Marlon, who is a licensed massage therapist, had mentioned how great it would be if we had our own massage center that had Epsom salt baths available. Clients could soak right after getting a massage and receive the additional health benefits the salts can provide by helping with soreness and acting as a natural muscle relaxer.  One week later, fate introduced us to floating. We loved it so much and received immediate benefits from floating, we couldn't stop talking about how great it would be if we could open a massage and float center. Then we took that leap of faith. With a lot of help from family and friends and a ton of hard work and passion, we are making our dreams come to fruition. We want everyone to experience the awesome benefits as we have! 

We all experience the aches and pains created from stress, school, sports, physical labor and work. We all experience the constant noise and distractions from the internet and cell phones. We want to provide a unique place for people to get away from the daily distractions, where your mind and body can truly relax, rest, and rejuvenate.  

                       

What We Need & What You Get

We are on track to open our doors this fall 2015, however we need a little help from you.  We want everyone to be able to experience massage and floating, and all the great benefits it provides. We already have two massage therapy rooms and one float room. 

                  

We have had such a huge response and the demand for massage and floating is on the rise. We believe that most first time floaters would like to bring a friend to enjoy the experience with (in a separate room of course!.... because that would be weird). So, we need your help to raise $25,000 so we can add a second float room to our space to compliment the second massage room. We will be giving great deals on floats and massages as perks to help us.   Money will be used to purchase a second spa, plus materials to build and soundproof the room, and install a shower.

The Benefits of Floating

Some people describe floating as "relaxing in your own, private Dead Sea." It's over 800 pounds of Epsom salts dissolved in a tub of 10 inches of water, that has been heated to your skin temperature.  As you lay back in the water, you will float, just as if you were at the Dead Sea. The tub is completely sound and lightproof, providing the ultimate conditions for your mind and body to relax. Since there is no sensory stimulus for your brain to process, the parasympathetic nervous system (Rest and Digest) activates, which is associated with promoting healing, regeneration and nourishment,  and up-regulating the immune system of the body. 

During the experience of floating, the Epsom salt alone helps to reduce inflammation, improves skin problems, increases blood flow and soothes the muscles and aching limbs. 


Risks & Challenges

We have already experienced some challenges with our business, deciding on going with a different float tank manufacturer at the last minute and then having to change the build out plans has delayed us in our schedule for opening the center. But nothing has stopped us from continuing in this blessing of a venture. With your help, we won't have to close the business in the future to add the second float room and we can open the float center that we have been dreaming and planning for. Don't forget to check out all the awesome perks on the right side of the page!

Other Ways You Can Help

We thank you for your support in our journey!! Please help us get the word out about our business and don't forget to use the SHARE tools!!

story:
For as long as I can remember, my body has felt like a mask that was concealing who I actually was. I wasn't fond of the shape, the way I was expected to wear it, or how very permanent it was. It took me over 30 years to come to the conclusion that it isn't so permanent, if I only found the strength to confront the problem.

I have been under medical care for a year to confront my gender dysphoria, and the next step is about to be taken, with a little help. I need a mastectomy from a reputable doctor, so I can live the life I want to live. I have found a surgeon, had a consultation, and am in the process of booking the surgery date. This is where you come in: I'm asking my friends, family, and community for any help they can offer, be it through donation or simply sharing my campaign.

Not sure what to think? Read the blog I wrote when I first came out. It may help you understand:

http://roomwithaq.blogspot.com/2014/10/i-said-t...

story:
Our story began at 2am on June 23, 2011 when a 4 yr old male came into
our Critical Access Emergency Department in acute respiratory
distress. His seal bark cough and high pitched stridor had him in a
panic. His room air oxygen saturation was 83%. He fought Paula's efforts to place a
pediatric oxygen mask on him so she relented and gave him blow by oxygen
while Melissa summoned the ED doctor and set up the first nebulizer for
the child.
Once his airway opened up and he was sleeping we regrouped at
the nurse's station to discuss the case. It was during that conversation that we passionately agreed that there must be a way to deliver chilled mist to a swollen airway via nebulizer.
We took the concept of chilled mist reducing airway edema home to our
kitchens and the first homemade prototypes of ChillyNeb were made.
Within 10 days we consulted a patent attorney and thus our journey
began.
Over the past four years we have worked quietly and diligently to improve the design, tested multiple cooling materials, continued with the patent process
and are patent pending. The idea of ChillyNeb was expanded to animals with the
addition of the ChillyNeb pet mask. 
We are excited and proud of this simple little device. We know
it works and we want to share it with everyone.

What's next for ChillyNeb?  Well the truth is we need your help to reach our goal of $65,000.00 The next steps for ChillyNeb are an engineered prototype, international patent application and further research and development.
Together we can bring ChillyNeb to the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Let's create a flurry!
  • Post to your Facebook, blog about it, share with your peers!
  • It's easy - use the Indiegogo share tools!

PERKS

Check out our cool perks. We have something for every one of our backers. 

 

                                                       FAQ:

                                                        

What is a nebulizer?

In healthcare, a nebulizer is a drug delivery system used to administer medication or solution in the form of a mist inhaled into the lungs.

Nebulizers are commonly used for the treatment of asthma, COPD, cystic fibrosis and other respiratory diseases.

Nebulizers use oxygen, compressed air or ultrasonic power to break up medical solutions and suspensions into small aerosol droplets (mist) that can be directly inhaled from the mouthpiece of the device.


What are the snowflakes made of?

The snowflakes are made from an evaporative fabric.


Why did you choose the snowflakes as a cooling material?

Several reasons actually.

1-The snowflakes are light weight when dry and can be stored within the container of ChillyNeb until used.

2-After the snowflakes are wet and shaken cooling is activated and then simple evaporation continues the cooling process. If the snowflakes get dry just add enough water to moisten and shake and the cooling process will continue.

3- When you combine the factors of both 1 & 2 you have the perfect material for use in any environment where there is no ice, i.e. desert, under developed areas and pre-hospital care to list just a few.

4- The snowflakes are as aesthetically pleasing as they are functional.


How cold does ChillyNeb get?

In a controlled environment this device predictably chilled nebulized mist to a Celsius temperature significantly less than ambient temperature for one hour. This graph compares four types of Thermal medium for cooling liquid that is nebulized to chilled mist. Four of the five configurations tested remained consistently under 10 degrees Celsius at the eight minute mark until termination of testing. The fifth configuration remained under 13 degrees Celsius from the five minute mark until termination of testing. All configurations indicate a slight increase in temperature when additional fluid was added to continue adequate mist production. The optional disposable insulator is a foil backed bubble warp chosen for its lightweight yet effective insulating properties.  Testing was terminated at one hour as this best reflects the longest expected transport time for the patient to a hospital or Medical Center. 


Can ChillyNeb be used on Adults?

Yes. The concept of ChillyNeb was designed with patients of all ages and species in mind.


Why would an animal need ChillyNeb?

Well interestingly enough animals can and do have respiratory illness just like humans. In the hands of a firefighter, EMT, paramedic or veterinarian ChillyNeb could take the concept of delivering chilled mist along with oxygen to the heat and smoke irritated airway of the rescued pet using the specially designed pet mask.


What else can ChillyNeb treat?

The concept of ChillyNeb was designed based on treating the viral illness of Croup. The goal of ChillyNeb is to deliver chilled mist to a swollen airway. There are many possible causes of swollen airway such as smoke inhalation, allergic reactions, and infections in the upper airway just to name a few.

story: Be a part of helping cannabis reach its full potential with this dedicated organization. Circle has been treating patients and increasing access to medical cannabis for 25 years and with legalization, is moving into major research and development.  We are building cannabis focused care and research facilities in WA state. All the cannabis for care and research is donated by WA State recreational operations. All prescriptions are free. All research is based on health and our sustainable future. Your contributions will provide this incredible medicine to those who need it to live and further discoveries into natural healing and natural, renewable industries.

story:
Team Work & Effective communication

We always hear about team work and effective communication in every organization! Both are very much needed to be successful in any organization and in our daily life. We have thousand tools and trainings to do it! "In reality  are they effective?"

Being a leader for many projects myself, I asked these questions several times. Do my team members purposely don’t want to collaborate to complete a task nor do they miss it for not being able to do an adequate follow up?

That question ended up me to designing an effective communication tool. The idea "meetingmate” was born in 2011 and it took time to shape it to see in a simplified way.  Once anyone starts using meetingmate, won't struggle to catch up the tasks and pending to complete on time. Because they won't be wasting time by sinking in thousands of e-mails or meeting minutes to find out what to do and when, then try to delegate it or doing it. By using meetingmate, the actions can be accessed from anywhere, delegating it in real time and everything remains in one place.

The task, a responsible, a target date and finally the status, that's all we need to be successful in team work. But the real question is how do you communicate the action plan effectively and how do you follow up that every day, when everyone need to go to hundreds of meetings and to perform thousands of actions every year? 

Meeting mate will simplify the daily life for you!

Expenses meeting Expectations

  • We are looking for 500,000 USD as a first round of funding to create the full time equipped office, with all infrastructure needed and also to hire services and talented professionals like software integrators, web- graphic designers, supporting engineers & marketing professionals to support the further development globally
  • We offer our contributors, licensed software usage – Please see the rewards section for further details!
  • The amount collected through this funding will be used to the development of meeting mate to make people’s life easy. And 10% of the collected amount will be used for education of children in need.
  • We have experience in creating web based systems & communities. Please check www.toolinghub.com a community for tooling experts around the world.

Stress free management of daily tasks and assignments

Most of the people are responsible and want to accomplish their assignments or tasks on time, but that’s not possible in our traditional way how we address it.

I am sure most of you are in a situation today, when hundred things to be done and all are priorities,  and the requests are coming from thousand directions. The way of lean culture requires us to be more efficient in multi-tasking. There is nothing wrong in hiring people with that capability. But all industries cannot afford to pay the cost of such professionals. But actually they don’t need to. Because “meetingmate” simplifies the multi-tasking needs and create a stress free working environment. 

I had the honor to work with many teams to make million dollar savings projects, and believe me, I have seen people trying to do everything possible, even myself, to track the tasks and accomplish it, on time. As a leader of, sometimes, up to 30+ projects I wished if all my tasks were in same place so I could track progress of everything, delegate work and see the progress in same place. Meetingmate will perfectly blends that need.

Meetinmate will also help you when, one of your key members leaving the organization in the middle of a key project. All pending tasks and information will be on "meetingmate" to ensure s smooth transition not he project when this kind of thing happens"

Risks & Challenges

  • Making this meeting administration simple for the end user need a lot of complex web architecture behind the screens and we are working with renowned developers
  • Our site is hosted with biggest players like Yahoo to support the challenges in today’s internet scenario.
  • To reach the audiences of allover the world we will be using marketing tools of all social media and a dedicated marketing team.

Why we are looking for your support

We have already started! You can login and see the site basic functions at www.meetingmate.org . But we have long way to go to make it fully functional & create apps to launch meetingmate with mobile phones and tablets. We really need your helping hands to bring meetingmate quicker to a wide audience. Your support will cover the cost of the software development, certifications and app developments.

We chose Indiegogo to introduce meetingmate, because it has the best community who like to support the real entrepreneur’s dreams to make it reality. Also it gives us the opportunity to hear your thoughts and ideas on how we can improve meetingmate to become the best option for everyone.

By supporting us, you can:

  • Be the first to use meetingmate for your company or personal meetings for best results.
  • Helping people to make their life easy by having meetingmate to administrate their “what to do today?”
  • Discover what’s going on with your direct reports or even your personal goals at a glance
  • Review the work load of each member of your team and balance it.
  • Use real-time information from all the meetings going on your department or company to measure effectiveness.
  • Be a part of “saving trees- culture” as people will stop using printed assistance list, post-it, personal agendas etc.
  • Help people to create & document agreements faster without accessing todays conventional software.

Keep reading http://www.meetingmate.org/blog/

long way to go to make it fully functional & create apps to launch meetingmate
with mobile phones and tablets. We really need your helping hands to bring
meetingmate quicker to a wide audience. Your support will cover the cost of the
software development, certifications and app developments.
We chose Indiegogo to introduce meetingmate, because it has the best
community who like to support the real entrepreneur’s dreams to make it reality.
Also it gives us the opportunity to hear your thoughts and ideas on how we can
improve meetingmate to become the best option for everyone.
By
supporting us, you can:

Be the first to use meetingmate for your
     company or personal meetings for best results.
Helping people to make their life easy by
     having meetingmate to administrate their “what to do today?”
Discover what’s going on with your direct
     reports or even your personal goals at a glance
Review the work load of each member of your
     team and balance it.
Use real-time information from all the
     meetings going on your department or company to measure effectiveness.
Be a part of “saving trees- culture” as people
     will stop using printed assistance list, post-it, personal agendas etc. 
Help people to create & document
     agreements faster without accessing todays conventional software.
Keep reading http://www.meetingmate.org/blog/

story:
GET

THE MISSION:

We are committed to improving skin health, increasing earth friendly awareness, and promoting self-love for ALL. The Dirtea™ brand is a leading proprietary combination of organic tea powders, healing essential oils, and fine minerals. Get Dirtea™ with a one-of-a-kind topical tea treatment for your skin. With the help of your contributions we can bring this revolutionary concept to the world and help others realize their true inner beauty with the power of this wonderful plant.  

WHY WE'RE RAISING MONEY:

We have exhausted nearly all of our inventory trying to keep up with demand and now we are currently out of stock on our website. The money raised from this campaign will go towards fulfilling orders/perks, ordering new sustainable packaging, and improving production equipment. You will receive our NEW products fast - by April 2016! This is also in preparation for upcoming deals with 3 large retailers who have expressed interest in our products (Wholefoods, Boots, Walgreens) however, we cannot fulfill their large quantity requests for the first round of production. Our main purpose and driving motivation behind this brand is not only skin health but earth health. Many large beauty corporations still test on animals, pollute oceans with micro-beads, and contain harmful chemical ingredients. By ordering our products you support a better future for the health/beauty industry.

MY STORY:

Hi my name is Griffin Black, I am the founder & CEO of Dirtea. I attended Hunter College in Manhattan with a keen interest in nursing/healthcare but soon realized that my passion was in starting my own business. I happened to fall in the love with a girl I met in school and we eventually moved into our own apartment in Brooklyn. She introduced me to the world of tea and then I fell in love again, this time with tea. My passion turned into an obsession and I began connecting with tea vendors around the world. I began selling loose leaf tea on eBay but eventually came up with this new concept. I tested many formulations and researched the benefits of topical tea for your skin for more than 6 months and continue to test and perfect our formulations as we plan to get clinical trials done within this year. It is my dream to cultivate my own tea farm here in America one day and I am truly grateful for the two years of support my friends/family/followers have provided me with for this endeavor. 
Connect with me! AMA. 
www.facebook.com/griffinxblack
www.twitter.com/griffinxblack
www.instagram.com/griffinxblack
www.linkedin.com/in/griffinxblack 
www.snapchat.com/add/griffinxblack 

PERKS:

How will this product will help you? 
These products are for two types of people. Those who have skin conditions such as acne, eczema, psoriasis, scarring, cellulite, and stretch marks who want to naturally heal their skin and bring it back to a normal complexion through weekly exfoliation. And for those who simply want to have a spa day in the comfort of their own home, to relax and enjoy the delicious aromas we have blended. 

- Love $5
If you would like to donate to our budding operation without purchasing a product, we offer our undying gratitude and appreciation for your kindness. You will receive a personal thank you from our team, and of course, good karma! We love you guys!


- Original Green Tea Scrub $25
1 month supply of topical tea treatment. (7fl oz) Ingredients: Organic Moroccan Mint Green Tea (Freshly Ground Fine Powder)*, Cold Pressed Sweet Almond Oil (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis), Pink Himalayan Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride + Minerals), Organic Cane Sugar (Sucrose)*, Therapeutic Grade Essential Peppermint Oil (Mentha Piperita), Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate). *Certified USDA Organic


- Coconut Black Tea Scrub $25

1 month supply of topical tea treatment. (7fl oz) Ingredients: Organic Masala Chai Black Tea (Freshly Ground Fine Powder)*, Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil (Cocos Nucifera)*, Pink Himalayan Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride + Minerals), Organic Cane Sugar (Sucrose)*, Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate). *Certified USDA Organic 



- Diamond White Tea Scrub $25
1 month supply of topical tea treatment. (7fl oz) Ingredients: Organic Pai Mu Tan White Pina Colada Tea (Freshly Ground Fine Powder)*, Grapeseed Oil (Vitis Vinifera), Activated Charcoal Powder (Carbo Activatus), Therapeutic Grade Lemon Essential Oil (Citrus x Limon), Pink Himalayan Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride + Minerals), Organic Cane Sugar (Sucrose)*, Vitamin E (Tocopheryl Acetate). *Certified USDA Organic


- Dirtea Bundle $60
Grab all 3 products and save $15! You'll receive the original peppermint x coconut chai x diamond charcoal body scrubs at a discounted rate. Don't know which scent to try? This is the perfect perk for you :)
- Ambassador Package $499
You will receive 50 products and your own unique coupon code that you can share with friends/family/followers for a special discount and commission on orders! Make your own Dirtea money by reselling and promoting the brand.

- Retail Package $999

You will receive 100 containers of Dirtea body scrubs, individually boxed. This kit is for the shops, spas, and eBay ninjas out there who would like to offer Dirtea skincare for sale to their customers, and make money doing it. Email us at hello@getdirtea.com for custom order inquiries. Contact us for international shipping rates. FREE REFUND POLICY: We'll refund you for any containers you choose not to sell. 

- Exclusive Dirtea Party $9,999
You will receive a years worth of product. You will be the VIP of an exclusive Dirtea party where you'll get to meet the team and celebrities. There will be music, models, tea, and enormous amounts of fun. AND you will be able to create your own limited edition tea product with us! Flight arrangements can be made.


GIVING BACK:

Portion of profits will go to peta.org / greenpeace.org / water.org * 
2% Original - Green Peace
2% Coconut - Ethical Treatment of Animals 
2% Diamond - Clean Water
*Once campaign is completed. 

INGREDIENTS: 

USDA Certified Organic Moroccan Mint Green Tea Powder – Fine granules of this powerful green tea gently exfoliate dead skin while its antioxidant rich properties penetrate deep to help fight acne, reduce sun damage, and diminish wrinkles. 

USDA Certified Organic Masala Chai Black Tea Powder – Tiny black tea grains deeply nourish and exfoliate skin. Potent caffeine content helps tighten and firm while keeping skin blemish free. Black tea also helps in reducing wrinkles and preventing pimples. 

 

USDA Certified Organic Bai Mudan White Pina Colada Tea Powder – This white tea has one of the greatest levels of antioxidant activity which is super beneficial for tired, dull skin. Effectively nourish, exfoliate, and energize even the most sensitive skin.

USDA Certified Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil – Provides powerful hydration for a silky smooth, glowing complexion. Heal and soothe dry skin with ease. One of the most effective, natural oils on earth. 


Activated Charcoal – Created for medicinal use only, this mineral is estimated to reduce absorption of poisonous substances up to 60%. Leading the detox market is our Diamond scrub product. It works by absorbing toxins and harmful chemicals from your body that you encounter on a daily basis.

Grape Seed Oil – Removes oil and dirt from pores. Restores, repairs, and moisturizes skin. Prevents damage from sun burn and keeps your skin from prematurely ageing.

Cold Pressed Sweet Almond Oil – Moisturizes and absorbs quickly into the skin leaving it soft and smooth without leaving you feeling greasy. Effectively reduces the appearance of stretch marks and cellulite. 

Therapeutic Grade Essential Peppermint Oil – Helps prevent further acne, provides relief against stress and mental exhaustion, powerfully affects and improves blood circulation, and relieves sore muscles. 

Pink Himalayan Sea Salt – Enhances skin tone, retains fluid from your skin keeping it supple, firm and youthful. Full of vitamins and mineralsproviding proper nourishment to skin cells. Works as a natural exfoliant to cleanse and unclog pores. Soothes and relieves psoriasis and eczema. 

USDA Certified Organic Cane Sugar – Sweetness for your skin, sugar helps maintain the balance of oil in your skin so you’re not too oily or too dry. Aids in the protection against toxins as well as slowing the ageing process of your skin.  

Vitamin E– This potent nutrient is proven to improve skin hydration, prevent many signs of ageing, and reduce the risk of skin cancer. Works to retain elasticity in skin and heals scarring. 

Recent Reviews/Results: 

Before & After Results: 

"INSANE. Was so sooo skeptical to try a new scrub due to the fact Frank® coffee body scrub irritated my skin like crazy, but incredibly glad I did. Results after just over a week of using Dirtea for 28 days. The picture on the left is before my first scrub and the picture on the right is after my scrub today, foundation and concealer free and just wearing bronzer. I'd never thought I'd be confident enough to go foundation free, but this scrub has almost completely cleared my skin and acne scars and completely brightened my complexion. IF YOU'RE STRUGGLING WITH ACNE PLEASE TRY THIS."

More Customer Reviews:  

"Hi!! Just wanted to let you know I've been struggling with acne for over 10 years. I have tried everything from creams to antibiotics to numerous different washes to get my breakouts under control. After hearing about you through IG, I decided to give Dirtea a try and I am so glad I did!! In less than a week I can see huge improvements. My skin is so clear and smooth!! Thanks so much!" - Victoria - UK 

"I loved getting Dirtea! The smell of chai tea was heavenly and very relaxing, the texture felt gentle but still exfoliated very well, and my skin came out silky smooth!" - Bretanna - NJ

"I really like that all these products are organic and chemical free because I hate that feeling of blasting my face with chemicals in order to clear it up and make my skin healthier." - Elle - LA

"I LOVE to GET DIRTEA. I love that my order was shipped the same day. I love that they were able to answer my questions in less than an hour. I love that the pricing was ridiculously affordable. I love that my order came in 2 days! I love DIRTEA!" - Olivia - UK

"I love businesses with amazing customer service. They answered all my questions and I received my order so quickly. The actual products were so unique and lovely. I could get used to this. Love you guys!" - Marie K. - OR

"My acne disappeared the next morning! Compared to Frank Coffee Scrub®, Dirtea scrub smells sooo much better and is not as rough on my skin. And unlike Frank, this was really easy to apply. I found Frank really rough. Getting Dirtea doesn't feel like you're rubbing off your skin. Also, I had acne the size of the Himalayas and after using Dirtea it went red for an hour and then just disappeared when I woke up in the morning which is pretty darn amazing!" - Maz - AUS

"Hey! Thank you so much for making this product. My psoriasis feels much better and it really does reduce inflammation and redness. Can't say that it got rid of my psoriasis forever but I prefer this natural treatment over any chemical cream anyday. I will be ordering more :)" - Melinda - AUS

"Right before going to sleep once a week I use Dirtea face/body scrub, it's amazing! I tend to get minor break outs at the first sign of stress so this helps prevent it by nourishing my skin :) Night night IG." - Cynthia Chavez - LA

"Sunday is always a "wellness" day for me, I always do some cosmetics procedures to keep my skin and hair beautiful and healthy and today I got an opportunity to try the chai + coconut face and body scrub from @getdirtea ️after applying this scrub, my face is really baby soft." - Romy - Austria 

 

UPDATE COMING SOON 
WITH NEW PRODUCT PHOTOS.

Video review with old packaging: 


BUDGET BREAKDOWN: 
$5,000 GOAL 
- $500 INVENTORY (TEA, OILS, MINERALS)
- $1,000 EQUIPMENT (AUTOMATIC DISPENSER) 
- $1,000 LEGAL FEES (FURTHER CERTIFICATIONS) 
- $1,500 PACKAGING (CONTAINERS, SPOONS, SHIPPING BOXES)
-$1,000 MISC. (OVERHEAD, LABELING, INK, SHOPIFY) 

$10,000 STRETCH GOAL* 

- Branded clothing, towels, hair ties will be included if we reach this goal. 

FAQ:

How do I get Dirtea? 

Dirtea should be used to exfoliate 2-3 times per week. When starting on your course try to leave the scrub on your skin for at least 5 minutes. Ideally the longer you leave the scrub on the better it works. 

Why is green tea good for my skin?

Numerous credible independent studies show topical green tea formulations protect skin from cancer and reduce sun damage.There is well documented evidence that green tea has powerful antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties that help clear acne, inflammation, scarring and signs of aging. Green tea polyphenols are oxidized and lose their activity when exposed to air & light, so we pack our containers fresh and seal our scrub at source to help retain activity. 

Why is white tea good for my skin?

Dr. Camouse and colleagues from University Hospitals, Cleveland, Ohio, compared UV-protection effects of topical green and white tea and found them to be roughly equivalent (Experimental Dermatology, June 2009). However, there is promising data that white tea may even be the most superior rejuvenation agent - compared with 21 other plant extracts it showed the highest level of activity as an antioxidant.

Why is sweet almond oil good for my skin?

Sweet almond oil is one of the best known natural oil remedies for stretch marks. It's also packed with essential vitamins and minerals such as calcium, potassium, magnesium, vitamins E and D which are great for dry skin and dark spots too! 

Why is coconut oil good for my skin?

Coconut oil is popular for a reason. Haven't you heard? Besides being one of the best ingredients to hydrate your skin on the market it has antibacterial and antifungal properties so you don't turn into a mushroom. Seriously though, it's amazing.

Why is black tea good for my skin?

CAFFEINE! BLACK TEA IS FULL OF CAFFEINE! CAFFEINE ENERGIZES NOT JUST YOU BUT YOUR SKIN. THE BENEFITS OF BLACK TEA FOR YOUR SKIN ARE POWERFUL (THINK BETTER BLOOD CIRCULATION & LESS WRINKLY). BUT I THINK I'VE HAD A LITTLE TOO MUCH. 

Why is pink himalyan sea salt good for my skin?

If you can't take a trip to the Dead Sea then this is the next best thing. It's an ideal natural treatment for psoriasis and eczema because, for many, it has the best results compared to other therapies. It's been proven to lengthen the remission duration after weekly use. 

Is Dirtea tested on animals?

No, we have never tested on animals and we never will. However, we do test and get Dirtea ourselves on a weekly basis because it's awesome. Sometimes I feel like an animal though.

Is Dirtea vegan?

Yes, there are no animal bi-products in our scrub. 

How long before I see results?

Immediately. No we're not kidding, your skin will feel incredibly smooth right after using this scrub and a lovely scent will linger. Apply 2-3 times a week and you will see results or your money back. 

Is getting Dirtea good for sensitive skin?

Yes, try patch testing first before you rub it all over just to make sure you don't irritate your sensitive side. The majority will have no problem with this scrub but be extra gentle on your face. 

Is getting Dirtea good for oily skin?

Yes again, oil absorbs oil. Woah that's pretty darn cool. Use a body wash to rinse off any excess oil and you'll be good to go!

Is getting Dirtea good for combination skin?

Yes already! Getting Dirtea will take care of your whole body, no matter what skin type you are. There's no discrimination here. We still recommend patch testing your first application. And remember kids, don't eat anything Dirtea and don't get anything Dirtea in your eyes.

How Dirtea should I get?

As Dirtea as you want! Each container holds 7fl oz of body scrub good for an entire months worth use. 

How often should I get Dirtea?

We recommend 2-3 scrubs a week. Getting Dirtea is better in moderation.

Should I get Dirtea wet or dry?

We like damp skin - a happy medium. However if you would like a more intense treatment, Dirtea works well on dry skin too.

How long do I stay Dirtea before rinsing?

The key is to leave the scrub on for 5-10 minutes each time, this way the caffeine and antioxidants can be better absorbed into your skin.

Why is Dirtea dry?

Dirtea isn't like the other scrubs you might be used to. It's a dry scrub. If you prefer a wet scrub just add water.

Will getting Dirtea clog my drain?

Nope, the scrub is fine enough to wash down the drain. It's going to get a little messy though. It's good to get things Dirtea sometimes.

Which scrub is better?

We recommend getting the bundle if you can't decide! ;)  

What payment methods are accepted?

Visa. Mastercard. PayPal. American Express. Discover. 

How long does shipping take?

We ship USPS first class mail. Usually 3-4 days. And tracking information is provided. Worlwide shipping takes a little longer depending on customs but usually within a week. 

Will getting Dirtea stain my skin?

No. Your skin may look a little green or brown while you use it but the color will wash off right away. That fresh mint, coconut, or lemon scent (whichever scrub you choose) will linger.

What if I get Dirtea in my eyes?

Wash it out babe. Keep this scrub out of your eyes. If this occurs rinse thoroughly. If irritation occurs, discontinue use and seek medical assistance. Unlikely so hey, stay positive. 

Can I get Dirtea on my face?

If you have sensitive skin, be gentle. Dirtea can be a coarse exfoliator for some and the skin on your face is delicate. If you want to use it on your face, test first, and use a soap free cleanser to wash off any excess oil.

I'm pregnant, can I still get Dirtea?

Hey beautiful mamma to be. As much as we want to get Dirtea with you, we recommend you consult your doctor before you start using our scrub. Dirtea does have a high caffeine content as well as peppermint oil, so some ladies choose to wait and use Dirtea after they have their babe. However, if you are still drinking tea/coffee it shouldn't be an issue.

How long will getting Dirtea last?

Dirtea scrubs have a shelf life of nine months. 

Please SHARE :) 

If you cannot contribute right now you can still help us tremendously by sharing this campaign using the icons on the top left of this page. So please feel free to share the link to this project in emails or messages. Show your friends, tell your colleagues, post about us on Facebook, Tweet about the project - it would truly mean the world to me and the team! Thank you <3 

TEAM INTRO:

April Schuppel - Manufacturing Engineer 

Taylor Melchionna - Production Consultant  

Jon Sweet - Independent Data Analyst 

And of course, the team wouldn't be complete without all the friends and family that have helped us along the way. We love you!

OUR PRODUCTS ARE SAFE FOR ALL AGES & ALL SKIN TYPES

Be sure to ask your doctor before using our products if you are pregnant. 

HYPOALLERGENIC: contains no yeast, dairy, egg, gluten, corn, soy, or wheat.

Contains no starch, preservatives, artificial color, flavor, or fragrance. 

Disclaimer: The vast majority Dirtea users won't feel any side effects from our ingredients. But, since humans come in many different skin types we cannot guarantee that EVERYONE on planet earth will have a positive experience. If you do sense any ill side effects, then don't worry they’re not life threatening and you can stop getting Dirtea immediately. We offer a 30 day money back guarantee if you don't absolutely love your skin. Statements contained herein have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. 

Investors interested in further agricultural/infrastructural development please email: hello@getdirtea.com * Future plans to farm our own tea and grow our own herbs (for essential oils). 

XO

FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM 
WWW.INSTAGRAM.COM/GETDIRTEA

Also, I had acne the size of the Himalayas and after using Dirtea it went red for an hour and then just disappeared when I woke up in the morning which is pretty darn amazing!" - Maz - AUS
