story:
About Us

Our aim is to be your outlet for fitness. Our foundational idea is that fitness can be done at any-time, and anywhere. Our plan is to make fitness more relatable and to guide persons on how fitness can fit into any lifestyle. 

Where we are now
The current site[ relentlessfitnesspursuits.trainerize.com] is the first tier, and features online training with options for building strength, losing weight and sculpting muscles. To this, Relentless Fitness Pursuits seeks to add more options; like sport specific fitness, pregnancy plans and injury rehabilitation training. We ultimately want to create new and innovative hybrid programs like video-gamer fitness, or workouts tailored to your occupations (eg teacher fitness!).

Here's a partial view of the site's layout



Where we aim to go
As we grow, we are looking to support a variety of fitness ventures, and also to host subsidiary sites to provide more diversity in the options for on-line training. We would like to make getting fit more accessible and user-friendly, appealing to a wider audience, and not only for persons who are fitness enthusiasts.

Fitness for Everyone!
Relentless Fitness Pursuits is standing ready to give fitness guidance and tangible goal direction to you, your friends, your family, your neighbours, your colleges, your hairdresser, your mail man, the librarian, that person in front of you in line at the bank, that guy drinking coffee... you get the picture.  We are looking to change your idea of getting fit from that unrealistic goal you've been pursuing for some time, to a clear cut path that you can actually hold in the palm of your hand. In weaving fitness into your life's journey, it becomes a part of it in itself.

Get Fit Any-time

When looking to integrate fitness into a variety of lifestyles, the first thing you notice is that most people simply do not have the time. With meetings, and traffic, and eating, there's never really time for getting fit. As such, we have just started a series 'Fitness Anytime' on Vine, in which we use fun six second videos to spotlight the idea that fitness can be done at any time.


Don't have that 1hr for the gym, #officefitness; too tired to go to the track to run, #bedroomworkout; stuck at the bank #bankfitness.


Your Fitness Partner

 about.me page

 Hi! I'm the manager of the Relentless Fitness Pursuits online training site. I'm also a daughter, a grand daughter, a niece, a friend, a partner, a fitness trainer, a nutritionist, an athlete, a hard worker, an entrepreneur, a dreamer, a believer, a stranger, a consumer, and also a lover of sweets.

For me, this campaign is important because it marks that point at the catalyst, from which ripples are made.   


Your Impact

Visualize... Your key in the ignition; your feet pressed on the starting blocks; waiting outside an interview room; 'Control, we have lift off in ...3...2...1. Right there! That's you're impact. That moment when everything changes.

This is a new business venture, the veritable definition of a start-up. Newly formed, fresh ideas, eager like an intern. And like that intern, though fresh and not endorsed, we are open, enthusiastic and and goal-oriented. Our site manager is an athlete at her core and with that, has engrained her foundational principles that you do not stop until you're done. We pursue our goals relentlessly. Never stopping, never ceasing.


What We Need & What You Get




Facing Challenges

With any new venture, there will always be seen and unforeseen risks and challenges. Mirrored in starting a new fitness program, you would feel the same unsure, hesitant, or even doubtful feelings. As such, the same strategies we would use personally, we will share to help you along your fitness journey. When facing a challenge remember that it's an opportunity in disguise. And if it's a hurdle that seems insurmountable, break it down, pick up those pieces and utilize them. 


I'm liking this idea...

Share! Share! Share! Thank you so much for your interest, We're so glad you stopped by. Please use the Indiegogo share tools and share this campaign with your friends :) You can also link our main website relentlessfitnesspursuits.com or follow us on Vine


Not your cup of tea

Now if we all liked or were interested in the same things, life would become rather boring. Considering that, this section is for you who may be unimpressed, uninterested or just indifferent. We challenge you to share this campaign in your social circles and bet you at least one of your connections would appreciate the share ;-)

Also, leave us a comment and let us know your thoughts on fitness.

Cheers!
story_txt:
About Us
Our aim is to be your outlet for fitness. Our foundational idea is that fitness can be done at any-time, and anywhere. Our plan is to make fitness more relatable and to guide persons on how fitness can fit into any lifestyle. 

Where we are now
The current site[ relentlessfitnesspursuits.trainerize.com] is the first tier, and features online training with options for building strength, losing weight and sculpting muscles. To this, Relentless Fitness Pursuits seeks to add more options; like sport specific fitness, pregnancy plans and injury rehabilitation training. We ultimately want to create new and innovative hybrid programs like video-gamer fitness, or workouts tailored to your occupations (eg teacher fitness!).

Here's a partial view of the site's layout





Where we aim to go

As we grow, we are looking to support a variety of fitness ventures, and also to host subsidiary sites to provide more diversity in the options for on-line training. We would like to make getting fit more accessible and user-friendly, appealing to a wider audience, and not only for persons who are fitness enthusiasts.

Fitness for Everyone!
Relentless Fitness Pursuits is standing ready to give fitness guidance and tangible goal direction to you, your friends, your family, your neighbours, your colleges, your hairdresser, your mail man, the librarian, that person in front of you in line at the bank, that guy drinking coffee... you get the picture.  We are looking to change your idea of getting fit from that unrealistic goal you've been pursuing for some time, to a clear cut path that you can actually hold in the palm of your hand. In weaving fitness into your life's journey, it becomes a part of it in itself.



Get Fit Any-time
When looking to integrate fitness into a variety of lifestyles, the first thing you notice is that most people simply do not have the time. With meetings, and traffic, and eating, there's never really time for getting fit. As such, we have just started a series 'Fitness Anytime' on Vine, in which we use fun six second videos to spotlight the idea that fitness can be done at any time.

Don't have that 1hr for the gym, #officefitness; too tired to go to the track to run, #bedroomworkout; stuck at the bank #bankfitness.


Your Fitness Partner

 about.me page
 Hi! I'm the manager of the Relentless Fitness Pursuits online training site. I'm also a daughter, a grand daughter, a niece, a friend, a partner, a fitness trainer, a nutritionist, an athlete, a hard worker, an entrepreneur, a dreamer, a believer, a stranger, a consumer, and also a lover of sweets.
For me, this campaign is important because it marks that point at the catalyst, from which ripples are made.   
 
Your Impact

Visualize... Your key in the ignition; your feet pressed on the starting blocks; waiting outside an interview room; 'Control, we have lift off in ...3...2...1. Right there! That's you're impact. That moment when everything changes.
This is a new business venture, the veritable definition of a start-up. Newly formed, fresh ideas, eager like an intern. And like that intern, though fresh and not endorsed, we are open, enthusiastic and and goal-oriented. Our site manager is an athlete at her core and with that, has engrained her foundational principles that you do not stop until you're done. We pursue our goals relentlessly. Never stopping, never ceasing.

What We Need & What You Get



Facing Challenges
 With any new venture, there will always be seen and unforeseen risks and challenges. Mirrored in starting a new fitness program, you would feel the same unsure, hesitant, or even doubtful feelings. As such, the same strategies we would use personally, we will share to help you along your fitness journey. When facing a challenge remember that it's an opportunity in disguise. And if it's a hurdle that seems insurmountable, break it down, pick up those pieces and utilize them. 

    I'm liking this idea...
Share! Share! Share! Thank you so much for your interest, We're so glad you stopped by. Please use the Indiegogo share tools and share this campaign with your friends :) You can also link our main website relentlessfitnesspursuits.com or follow us on Vine


Not your cup of tea Now if we all liked or were interested in the same things, life would become rather boring. Considering that, this section is for you who may be unimpressed, uninterested or just indifferent. We challenge you to share this campaign in your social circles and bet you at least one of your connections would appreciate the share ;-)
Also, leave us a comment and let us know your thoughts on fitness.
Cheers!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Steve, I'm a software engineer from the UK, and now live in sunny Malaysia with my wife and two cheeky monkeys (or daughters as they're otherwise known)

Dengue is quite an important issue here in Malaysia, over 100,000 cases in 2014 and 200 deaths, and increasingly in many more parts of the world. 

No matter how hard you try there is always a mosquito bite or two that get through the bug spray and the nets. I'm sure you can imagine the worry when that happens.

So I decided to do something about it. I have created a system that will highlight active dengue cases to the user 

and allow them to add points of interest, so that they can see if dengue cases are shown near schools, or work. It also lets you mark the places that you have a mosquito bite.

Not only does this system give people the information they need to protect themselves, but will also build up real world data to be able to predict mosquito and dengue outbreaks in the future, meaning mosquito eradication resources can be better targeted for the benefit of everyone.


What We Need & What You Get

The first version of the system has been developed, you can even download the app and take a look for yourself  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.accessdevicesasia.mosquitobite 

Now we need to start work on new features and really promoting the app to those that need it.

The money will be used to develop additional features, such as:

  • Real-time alerts when you enter areas with active dengue cases.
  • iPhone and Windows Phone versions of the app.
  • A free system for Health Officials to mark dengue cases.
Currently we have Malaysia and Singapore integrated, We want to expand that to the whole of South East Asia, India, Africa and South & North America.

With this funding we aim to add at least 3 additional countries to the service, and hopefully many more afterwards.


The Impact

There are four strains of the Dengue virus, they each have their own quirks, but one thing that happens is if you build up immunity to one, you become weaker against the other three, making a second infection significantly more dangerous than the first, and the most vulnerable are children.

The more people are aware of what is happening around them, the more care they will take. Cases tend to appear in clusters, as mosquitoes bite the infected and go on to infect others. This image shows there are actually 28 cases all in one small area, probably the same apartment block

If people had the information that number could have been significantly reduced.

With your donation we can encourage usage of the app, and lower the dengue infection rate

I've been developing software for the last 20 years, and this is the first time, I've worked on something a really believe in, and have put the time and money into researching and creating this system over the last 6 months, and I'm quite proud of it. It's not perfect, but it is providing useful information to those that need it.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is that the app doesn't get enough exposure, and gets lost amongst the hundreds of (scientifically proven not to work) mosquito repelling sound apps that fill the app stores.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to contribute financially, then please install the app, and spread the word.

Remember to use Indiegogo's share tools, and together

story:
The best news I have is that The Amethyst Centre will open on 1st September 2015! You can still contribute towards its success because our campaign has now gone InDemand. All the perks are still active. The timetable for opening is that the building works will be completed during August and I will get the keys to the buiklding on or around the 22nd. I will then spend the next ten days furnishing the place and we will open to the public on Bank Holiday Tuesday. Our launch will start on the 29th September, which is St Michael's Day, and we have a number of activities planned for that week. I will post updates when it is confirmed what we are offering and when. Meanwhile, if you are interested in how the Centre came about, please read on!

On New Year's Eve 2014, a friend asked me, what goal would you set for 2015 if you knew just saying it would make it happen? Straight away I said "I'd have my own therapy centre". And then I thought "Wherever did that come from?" But I couldn't get it out of my head. This is a dream I've had since before I became a Reiki master in 2007: I want a centre run on holistic, spiritual, organic and ethical principles that helps people achieve their full potential. And I want it in Coventry. A few days later I found suitable premises. So I now have a great place, located about a mile from the city centre on Ball Hill, which is a really busy shopping street.

As you can see from the photos, the building has been completely gutted. The landlord has been an absolute diamond and has put new and bigger windows in, made sure the roof is properly insulated and doesn't leak, installed a shower and a kitchen - both of which were on my specification - and has created the rooms. There is a large room at the front of the building, about 5 metres square. This will be my own room and also the room that will be let to therapists on a sessional basis, and also where training courses will take place that need a couch. Two treatment rooms at the back of the building are about 4 metres by 3 metres. These are suitable for couches or talk therapists. If therapists want to base themselves at the Centre on a residency basis, they will be able to make one of these rooms their own. Upstairs, where there were two rooms, there is now one large, light and airy room with a new velux window and plenty of storage. The landord will stop the refurb of the building at the point where it is up to modern standards but not personalised for my requirements: when I hand over my contribution, he will then instruct the builders to complete the building to my specification.

At every stage I've been amazed at the generosity of those around me - but not, unfortunately, at the readiness of the banks to help me. Having had 3 years of poor health and barely working, I don't have any capital and I don't have the accounts to get me a bank loan. Which is where you come in.


What We Need & What You Get

I need £5000 to help to equip the Centre.

I have already got some furniture of my own to go in there, which will part furnish one room. I've also applied for a Loan from the local Reinvestment Trust, who are set up to provide funding for businesses who can't normally access mainstream funding,  which will provide for the refurbishment of the building and some essential requirements such as licences and insurances, plus some basic furnishings for the Centre reception.

I'd very much like to put in a stairlift for both floors, which will possibly cost £2000.

I'd also like to purchase an electronic therapy couch, so that my own couch (which is now 8 years old) can become a spare and used for training.

A Dyson vacuum cleaner will be purchased - £300.

I have identified artworks by Coventry artists for the Centre, and I would like to be able to purchase these artworks myself. 4 different works have been earmarked, and they each cost £200 - £250.

Therapeutic things like alkalising and filtering water fountains, salt lamps, daylight lamps have been identified but don't form part of the loan funding, so these would come out of this bid.

If we don't get the entire £5,000, obviously choices will have to be made. The priority is, of course, the stair lift to enable those with mobility problems to access the Centre with the same ease as anyone else.

If we get more, we will be able to do more.  It is important to me that things are done properly, and the more money we get, the higher the standard of furnishings that can be provided.


So what is so different about The Amethyst Centre?

Quite simply, it will be unique in Coventry and Warwickshire. It will be the only centre run by a practising therapist, which will be fully staffed whenever there are therapists on site. This makes it a safe environment for therapists to practise from: it will also enable more people to get access to holistic therapies as there will be slots available for people who just want a quick dose of Reiki (for example) without having to book, and the staff will be able to handle enquiries promptly, and in a friendly manner. My vision is that it will be a place of refreshment for the body and soul and that means for those who work from there as well. And a further unique characteristic is the intention to create a community of therapists who work together and refer between each other. Think of it as a "holistic therapy ward" with different specialisms working together to help you become more healthy and improve your life.

I have been approached by a fair amount of training providers too, so we will be able to train people in subjects as diverse as Angelic Reiki, Intuitive Tarot, meditation and assertiveness. The education part of the centre may prove to be more important as time goes on, as healthcare in the UK becomes more chaotic and less capable, and as people take control of their own health and wellbeing.

The Impact of the Centre

There are other similar centres in the local area, but they just seem to be set up by business people to hire out rooms and they don't have the same level of support for the therapists that the Amethyst Centre is aiming to provide. For the last 10 years I have been involved in hiring venues, working out of hired rooms and centres, and I have built up a database of "what works" and "what doesn't". That is why it is important to me to have the centre fully staffed when therapists are working there: it means that enquirers are dealt with in a professional manner, and that therapists are not interrupted when working with clients - and that's important.

The rooms will be adequately soundproofed, so that sound leakage is minimised. After all, the last thing you want when you are receiving a Reiki healing is for the consultation in the next room to be audible: it's not confidential and can be disturbing for both therapist and client.

Proper therapy training rooms, outside of a college environment, are few and far between, and I have already had enquiries from agencies wishing to offer accredited training in ear candling, angelic Reiki, reflexology and sports massage among other things.

Groups such as Positive Living, Law of Attraction, A Course in Miracles, meditation, yoga, Tai Chi, are all things that the Centre has space for.

Obviously I can't do everything myself, although I'm quite aware that this project is my baby! So I will be recruiting people to help with the reception. I've already had an offer from a trainee nurse and Reiki practitioner to help out with the admin and systems. I'm also interested in recruiting apprentices. The one thing I will never ever do is use people on Government Workfare schemes. I detest these schemes and have campaigned against them for years. They go radically against my ethical stance, that "the labourer is worthy of their hire". So you can rest assured that you are supporting an organisation that is working to the highest ethical principles.

Personally, I want to build a business that will help the business community in Coventry, as well as helping improve the health of the city. I want a business that makes good use of my experience and expertise and that enables me to be a productive member of society while taking my disabilities into consideration (I have rheumatoid arthritis, among other things). And I want to prove to the doubters that it is possible to run a successful business with ethical principles, and alternative sources of funding.

Risks & Challenges

I know that businesses take time to get off the ground. My cash flow forecast has taken all that into account, and the cash flow will be positive by the end of September.

My existing business is Pandora's Box Healing, and as part of that I am a consultant for NYR Organic, Magnetix-wellness Jewellery, and I am also a wholesaler for Wikaniko. My plan is to use these businesses to support me until the Amethyst Centre is in a position for me to take money out of it. I am the sole director of the Amethyst Centre. I like being solely responsible!

My cash flow projections tell me the Centre will be self-funding at only 30% occupancy. This means there is a greater chance of success than if the Centre required more occupancy.

I have the help and support of several networking organisations in Coventry, and some of their members have indicated they will hire rooms from me.

I've had my own businesses now for over 20 years, one way or another. I've also taught Community Enterprise and Development for Warwick and Leicester Universities. That means I have a range of tools I can use to help me with the business - and a lot of contacts made over the years!

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you're a therapist yourself? Would you like to hire a room from me? Prices start from £10 per hour, £35 per day/£20 per session, or £130 if you'd like to become resident at the Centre and have an input into furnishing your room.  Or would you like to run a training course at the Centre? I would do that on a 30/70 split, where the Centre takes 30% of the course fees leaving you with the rest.

Would you like to help me staff the Centre? A few hours a week is all I can offer you at the moment, but it's nice to have people to help out!

story:
Meet the Xculpters, hair and beard sculptors.

Men and women have long endeavored to tame their hair.

In the beginning, combs were made from bone, horn, ivory, wood and tortoise shell, followed by brushes with bristles made from pony, marten, goat, wild boar, mongoose, calf ear and polecat hair.

With the arrival of electricity, more silent hair dryers emerged with increasingly powerful air flow function.

Every year, hundreds of new designs are launched, but the basic principle is always the same: hot air is blown on hair, which becomes tousled and tangled if we don't use a brush or comb in the other hand.

We have entered an era of progress and simplification. In our forever-changing world, SweetlisS SAS finally brings you intelligent hair dryers that offer the long-awaited combination of comb, brush and blow dryer.

We are proud to introduce our versatile Xculpter Xity & Wild with their patented diffuser that dries, smoothes and styles hair.

Xity & Wild are Xculpters for Beards, short Hair and long Hair


Xculpter for Beards : New tool for new hair growth

Recent fashion trends have brought men's facial hair back in style with short, long or coarse-haired beards.

Modern men are at a loss with their new hair growth given the lack of styling tools specifically intended to tame bushy beards.

Today, drying your beard hinges on acrobatic bravery, wielding a burning hot blow dryer in one hand and a brush or comb in the other.

We are pleased to introduce our fashion-inspired Xculpters, which combine the efficiency of a comb, a brush and hair dryer.


Fitted with a double comb and a clip brush attachment, Xculpter Wild dries, brushes, combs and “Xculpts” hair and beards.

The beard version comes with two clip brushes and a cool shot button that has fine temperature control.  One brush is asymmetrical for working close to the skin and the other comes with firm angled bristles for precision « Xculpting".


Xculpter for short hair : New tool for new styles

Fashion has left men body-built, shaved and well-dressed…. but until now they had no tools to dry and sculpt their hair.


Specially designed for men's styling, the xculpters dry, comb, brush and "Xculpt" in a single step.

Available in 2 models:

XCULPTER XITY : Professional, Ionic, Compact, 2000 W 


XCULPTER WILD : Mini, light, On-the-go, 1050 W 



Xculpter for long hair :  Specially designed to make styling easy

Ionic and boosted air flow function ensuring flawless results on all types of hair.

Fitted with a double comb and clip brush attachments, Xculpter Xity dries, brushes, combs and “Xculpts” demanding hair.

It doesn't just make life easier for professionals;it's a game changer for men and women who don't know the first thing about styling.


The Xculpter design was specially engineered to channel the blow dryer's air flow towards the comb and the brush, preventing an unruly "wild mane" look.

The double row comb, which is longer than the brush, enables deep-down combing action.


The Xculpters are available in two models :



Features

TECHNOLOGY : Mechanical innovation combining the action of a comb, brush and hair dryer, an international patent has been filed for Xculpters Xity & Wild.

ADVANTAGES : 

The very first hair dryer, brush and comb combination in hair styling history, for ultra-simple styling.

PRINCIPLE: Dry, smooth and style hair and beards with one single hand.


Xculpter Xity is Professional, Compact, Ionic, 2000 W.

Ionic and boosted air flow function ensuring flawless results on all types of hair.


Xculpter Wild is Small,On-the-go, lightweight, 1050 W.

Although its 1050 Watt motor makes it ideal for short hair, the xculpter Wild can be effectively used in rapid restyling mode on long hair.

Xculpter WILD is available in 2 Colors :


Perks :

FOUNDERS 

We want to tell you the story behind the xculpters.

Sweetliss SAS was founded by Elisabeth Camille and Jean Yves Tariot. 

Elisabeth used to be Hair salon manager and thought that hair tools were very complicated to use. While Jean Yves was an aeronautic engineer and worked on weapon and radar systems.

When these two love birds met, beauty won a crucial battle with their new XCULPTERS and SWEETLISS. 

Currently the Company  Sweetliss is based in France near Paris with a spanish assembly plant.

Last April 2015, in the presence of Google Europe's Vice-President, Sweetliss took home an Oscar given by the President of the Paris Chamber of Commerce.



USE OF FUNDS :

We offer efficient, easy-to-use and light weighed hair tools for all those who spend hours in the bathroom fighting with their outdated hair equipment. 

After 34 months of development, we succeeded to set up the industrial process for the first series of XCULPTERS for "european plug" backers, and we are about to launch them in november 2015. 

UK Backers are going to be the next one in beeing delivered in december 2015.

Building on this success, we now want to offer the xculpters to the U.S. backers, and we need funds to adapt the xculpters to the U.S. standards.  

We want to launch the development of different types of brushes with special bristles and specific implantation to enable various hairstyles.  

We also want to provide a seasonal catalog presenting various colors or even original paint designs for the diffusors so that xculpters can change styles every so often. 


These new updates would be applicable to the current models of Xculpters Xity & Wild.


Schedule



FAQ

1. What is the difference between the xculpters and others hairdryers with combs ?

. Special comb design :

The air side exits have been especially designed so that the hairdryer's air is blown in the same direction as the comb to avoid frizzy hair which is usually the case with other dryers with comb diffusers. 

. Special brush attachment : 

The combination of the brush clip with the comb is a worldwide innovation providing deep straightening of the hair and many other styling results.(undone looks)

.Flux of air and xculpter working in the styling direction :

The xculpter's diffuser works in the same direction than that of the air flux and brushing. In other words it is not perpendicular which is the case for other hair dryers.  The result is quite superior.

.This innovation is offered on two different and complementary blow dryers:

 A professional, compact, ionic 2000 W and a small, lightweight on-the-go hairdryer.

2. When will I receive the Xculpter : 

It depends on the current voltage of your country :

All "220/230V" Backers : November 2015

"UK plug" Backers : December 2015

"North American plug" Backers :  April 2016.

3. When will the new colors be available ?

In April 2016 for all the backers.

4.. Does Xculpter works on every type of hair ?

All types of hair should be dryed gently so as to avoid frizzy hair. XCULPTER is designed in such a way that the air flow goes in the same direction as the hairstyling and works on every type of hair.

5. How many clip brushes are there in each xculpter ?

The Xity includes one universal clip brush which can be used for all types of hair. The Wild includes 2 types of brush clips- one is universal and the other one allows a more detailed and perfect finish. 

6. Which model, size and color of my xculpter should I choose?

At this point in time, you can choose between the colors « Blue » or « Sun » for the xculpter Wild and « Sun » for the xculpter Xity . Once you are a client, we will send you a catalog of all the new colors and designs available for each new season. 

7. What if the Xculpter breaks down?

During the one year guarantee, you can send us the damaged Xculpter back and we will change it for another free of charge.


8. I forgot to add international shipping! What should I do?

Please contribute the shipping amount ($10) and select no perk. We will match your contributions.

9. I want to upgrade my perk

Please contribute the difference and select no perk. We will match up your contribution to the correct perk and will confirm after the campaign.

Please note if you add custom engraving to your TrackR bravo device, we cannot accept returns or exchanges.

10. Can I get a refund or cancel for an engraved order?

No because your device is unique to you and all engraved orders have been made. We stand by a policy if the device is non functional, we will replace the device.

Problem backing us?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.

Other Ways you can help:

Don't forget to like and follow us for the latest information on xculpters.

Website : www.xculpter.com/gb/

Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xculpter

Send us a tweet: @xculpter

Contact Jean Yves on the Twitter:@jytariot


Thank you!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!

If you have any questions be sure to contact us at contact@xculpter.com

PRESS KIT

For Press Inquiries contact : xculpter@xculpter.com
story_txt:
Meet the Xculpters, hair and beard sculptors.
Men and women have long endeavored to tame their hair.
In the beginning, combs were made from bone, horn, ivory, wood and tortoise shell, followed by brushes with bristles made from pony, marten, goat, wild boar, mongoose, calf ear and polecat hair.
With the arrival of electricity, more silent hair dryers emerged with increasingly powerful air flow function.

Every year, hundreds of new designs are launched, but the basic principle is always the same: hot air is blown on hair, which becomes tousled and tangled if we don't use a brush or comb in the other hand.

We have entered an era of progress and simplification. In our forever-changing world, SweetlisS SAS finally brings you intelligent hair dryers that offer the long-awaited combination of comb, brush and blow dryer.

We are proud to introduce our versatile Xculpter Xity & Wild with their patented diffuser that dries, smoothes and styles hair.
Xity & Wild are Xculpters for Beards, short Hair and long Hair




Xculpter for Beards : New tool for new hair growth


Recent fashion trends have brought men's facial hair back in style with short, long or coarse-haired beards.
Modern men are at a loss with their new hair growth given the lack of styling tools specifically intended to tame bushy beards.


Today, drying your beard hinges on acrobatic bravery, wielding a burning hot blow dryer in one hand and a brush or comb in the other.


We are pleased to introduce our fashion-inspired Xculpters, which combine the efficiency of a comb, a brush and hair dryer.

Fitted with a double comb and a clip brush attachment, Xculpter Wild dries, brushes, combs and “Xculpts” hair and beards.




The beard version comes with two clip brushes and a cool shot button that has fine temperature control.  One brush is asymmetrical for working close to the skin and the other comes with firm angled bristles for precision « Xculpting".


Xculpter for short hair : New tool for new styles
Fashion has left men body-built, shaved and well-dressed…. but until now they had no tools to dry and sculpt their hair.





Specially designed for men's styling, the xculpters dry, comb, brush and "Xculpt" in a single step.
Available in 2 models:
XCULPTER XITY : Professional, Ionic, Compact, 2000 W 

XCULPTER WILD : Mini, light, On-the-go, 1050 W

story:
About us

J.E.To.P. - Junior Enterprise Turin Polytechnic - is a Junior Enterprise, a non-profit and apolitical association run by students with the objective of creating a direct contact between university and the world of work.


JEToP's team, made up exclusively of students of the Polytechnic of Turin, has learned to take the best capabilities of each member in order to offer the best opportunities for everyone; these skills are then extended t o include exchanges of experience with other JEs and trainings followed by partner companies. Our main objective is to out our knowledge at the clients disposition in order to achieve concrete results.


What is WTT: Wearable Tech Torino?


WTT, Wearable Tech Torino, is the first and only exhibition fair in Europe dedicated exclusively to wearable technologies. The fair will be free entry and open to all audiences, from companies to consumers. Our main goal is to show the Italian and European public the yet unknown world of wearable devices and their potential. Also, the real peculiarity of the fair will be to give every visitor the possibility to personally try the devices exhibited at the fair, some of which will be among the most innovative ones. WTT will be attended by numerous companies, including large, medium and startup businesses. Conferences and workshops, in the same exposition area, will be the added values of the fair.


When?

20-21 November in Turin.


Where?

Around 10000 visitors are expected to attend the 2500 square meters of exhibition in Hall 5 of Lingotto Fiere. The public will be able to try and wear the devices being exhibited and to participate in conferences and debates held by leading figures in the industry.


Let's make it together

With your help, we will be able to decorate and fill the exhibition even more. Stands, interactive areas, the more the funding the more you will enjoy the experience! 

Our target is to provide a free event where the public is at the center of attention, being able to "Touch the future" and to be an active part of the fair.

That is why we believe that your donation is so important: together we will offer the possibility to companies, and start-ups, to be in the spotlight and to let people discover how useful wearable technology can be.


Risks & Challenges

As any brand-new campaign there are risks to take into account; investing on the future has never certainties, even though the expectations are extremely high.
We like to work professionally, so the event will take place anyway: of course, being students, the exhibition planning has been demanding by itself, but we managed to overcome the challenges by working hard to make it happen.

Spread the word

Let your friends know about our campaign, and invite them to support us and donate.

You can: 

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools;

  • Like our pages on social network, and share the campaign with the hashtag #WTTorino and visit the site www.wearabletechtorino.com

story:
Some Background

Since I studied at Cornell in 1990s, I enjoyed working in machine shops for optical and mechanical systems. Then I love to do hands-on works. I had done lots of works on vacuum systems for semiconductor processing and assembled quite some photonics devices/systems. Just some time ago, I was addicted to playing drones for photo and video shooting. 

However, drones are easily damaged when they hit something, forcing the fun of flight to be stopped because of the damage. Thus playing them could be very frustrating, regardless of the cost for repairs or complete destroy of the drones.


Our Idea 

To avoid the frustration, I come up this idea to protect them from being damaged even if they hit the ceiling, walls, or other things on their ways. With this anti-collision frame, drones have more freedom to fly. Even indoors of limited space, one can play them freely, without much worry about damage. My flying skill is also greatly improved because the protection from the anti-collision frame allows me to practice many more times without damaging the drones.


What We Need & What You Get 

My first set up for the drone protection is effective, but very preliminary. With your support, I plan to make further refined anti-collision frames. Also hope to make the frames have the following excellent characteristics:

1. Easily custom-design for various sizes of drones.

2. Could fit 4-, 6-, or 8-axis copters. 

3. Light-weight, strong, and flexible for absorbing shocks under collision.

4. Small package for convenient shipping and easy to put on to your drones. 

5. Give you the courage and freedom to fly drones everywhere, every site, or even indoors when the bad weather stops you flying outdoors or you want to shoot photos or videos of indoor activities from the air.

Your support will enable this technology to become a reality, so we can produce and deliver you the smart-protection device. In this way, we will certainly make drones very friendly to players, no more worry about collision, damage, or even destroy of the entire drones. People will enjoy a lot more in flying drones. 


Risks & Challenges

For the small-fund raising to build creative things with hardwares, the most challenge is the production. The raised fund may not be enough for the mold to fabricate the quantity from the pledged amount. To avoid the possible difficulty to deliver the pledged number of items, we have invented two different ways for the production. If the quantity is less than 10K, we will hand-make them, so the cost for the mold is not necessary. We have already surveyed the materials and steps that allow us to hand-make quickly and positively. Thus we will deliver you the device even if the pledged number is less than 10K.
If the pledged quantity is above 10K, the fund raised will be enough and allow us to mold-produce the large number. We have also designed the configuration and parts required to assemble the frame for the drones, which can be mold-produced. Then we will certainly be able to deliver you the device.

The Impact

Hopefully the pledged number is large, so we can go ahead to mold-produce the frame, making it a real business to benefit many people that are attracted by the drones, but afraid of the collision damages due to the unskillful flying control. As the barrier to play drones is lowered, using drones in many aspects may become part of our daily life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help:

  • Please help tell your friends this technology and share this Indiegogo link to them.
  • Also use the Indiegogo share tools!

In any case, highly appreciate your interest and help.

story:
About Me

My name is Clinay Cameron, and I’m a Strength Specialist, Athletic Coach, and Corporate Wellness professional in the Bay Area. I'm a former Division 1 athlete, and I obtained my bachelor’s degree in Sociology from UC Berkeley. I’m a huge advocate of informing, empowering, and providing opportunities for undeserved youth to be exposed to overall health and wellness. I aim to be placed in a position where I can go to other schools, teams, and youth sports clubs to offer services for free outside of California and the U.S.Save Campaign

At my current job I am most known for being "strong" (via the truck pull video) and coaching people from all age ranges and walks of life. Youth athletes inquire daily on how they can get support in coaching for sports and performance strength training  and I've worked with some athletes who understand the importance of building a foundation in strength to be a better athlete.

My passion stems from teaching and encouraging others not only how to build strength, but how to do so properly. Without realizing, I've gained a sense of respect and trust from students and colleagues I hardly ever engage with. I am approached daily on getting support on individual strength and fitness journeys.

My Why | Performer Goal

This campaign  is important to me because it is integral to expose youth to healthier practices so that they can feel secure and empowered while making important decisions for their personal health and well-being. Two big things I want to address when working with these kids are building internal awareness and confidence, and the other is overcoming obstacles through strength training and sports as an outlet. If I give them valuable information that they can bring back home to their families there is a high chance to make a change in their lives.

 

Why Is This Important?

There is a huge health epidemic regarding childhood obesity and other health related issues that can be addressed through discussing at least the basic needs for overall health and quality of life.

It’s simple, if we build and uplift youth from the inside out, we have a chance to change their lives for the better in the long haul. If I teach basic cues of internal and external awareness, this will then make the transition easier to coach basic strength and conditioning. Another big part of why I am an advocate for empowering youth and student athletes is because I was one of these inner city kids who had a huge opportunity, but at the time I didn't understand the significance and benefits of getting stronger as an aspiring professional athlete.

My interest was peaked to learn about strength training through my high school throws coach, but I unfortunately decided to stick with my last year of varsity basketball instead of getting proper strength training and coaching for my senior year of high school. Making this choice made it very difficult for me to transition into collegiate sports, and I didn't last long. Had I known that committing to strength training would propel me further as an athlete, I probably would have reconsidered. I aim to emphasize the importance of this, as it is integral for those who want to go beyond the collegiate and professional level.

The Goal is $7,000

I have no desire to become rich from this project, but I do want to be placed in a financial position to serve these communities without having to worry about taking care of my basic human needs to survive. Contributing to this project will be beneficial for youth, their families, coaches, and the likes. My only goal is to make an impact, and after the trip to Zimbabwe I want to continue serving communities who need resources like this as well for free. 

I’m asking for $4,400 for my first trip in July 2020, but I will need to secure funding and submit payments to the Lift4Life Nonprofit on or before April 15, 2020. The total costs for everything includes:

- Traveling fees, room and board, visas

- Trip contribution expenses

- Insurance, emergency funding

- Travel shots 

- Safari excursion costs

- The remaining balance of $2600 will be used for participant gifts, prizes, and coaching stipend for local coaching camps  

Additional proceedings that exceed the fundraising goal will be utilized as scholarship money, and community supplies and support for athletes and families.

Covering costs for Zimbabwe  will be the most expensive portion of the campaign, as this will be a foundation to start off the project and it will provide a safe space to start out on this journey of service.

** For inquiries regarding usage if goal is not met see risks and challenges below**

The Impact

Over the years, I've run into people that I coached when I was in high school and they are now adults. I recently ran into one on the best throwers in the state of California, and they said, "I'm so grateful to have had you as a coach and mentor in my life. Because of your support and presence, you're a big reason why I became an athlete at one of the best public universities in the world."

In that moment I became overwhelmed with joy because I had no idea at the time how much this meant to this individual, and I was genuinely proud to see that they were successful and happy with their lives. This reaffirmed yet again that my calling is to serve youth in in many ways, and this path is one of the most integral ones. The only way to scale on making a larger impact is through having more time for this to take place successfully and effectively.

Risks & Challenges

In the event that all funds aren’t secured, I will focus on continuing to build locally and nationally as a traveling coach. Serving youth and young team-oriented athletes is something that I'm truly passionate about, and if all I have to focus on is teaching them on how to lift properly, and put them in a position to be more competitive and confident in themselves overall that is success to me.  I'm more than willing to schedule ample time to make an impact on youth regardless  through free youth coaching and mentorship.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that everyone may not be able to contribute financially, so it would be very helpful for you to spread the word in regards to this project. Please like, share, post and tag me (@livingproofstrength) and TechFit Creative (@techfitcreative). You can also tag #lift4life, #livingproof, #socialentrepreneirship, #sportspsychology, and #youthathletics.

Lastly, in kind donations are also greatly appreciated, as youth who are looking to take strength training and strength sports and athletics will need gear and materials to make their athletic journeys more successful and injury free.

Thank you!!!
story_txt: About MeMy name is Clinay Cameron, and I’m a Strength Specialist, Athletic Coach, and Corporate Wellness professional in the Bay Area. I'm a former Division 1 athlete, and I obtained my bachelor’s degree in Sociology from UC Berkeley. I’m a huge advocate of informing, empowering, and providing opportunities for undeserved youth to be exposed to overall health and wellness. I aim to be placed in a position where I can go to other schools, teams, and youth sports clubs to offer services for free outside of California and the U.S.Save CampaignAt my current job I am most known for being "strong" (via the truck pull video) and coaching people from all age ranges and walks of life. Youth athletes inquire daily on how they can get support in coaching for sports and performance strength training  and I've worked with some athletes who understand the importance of building a foundation in strength to be a better athlete.My passion stems from teaching and encouraging others not only how to build strength, but how to do so properly. Without realizing, I've gained a sense of respect and trust from students and colleagues I hardly ever engage with. I am approached daily on getting support on individual strength and fitness journeys.My Why | Performer GoalThis campaign  is important to me because it is integral to expose youth to healthier practices so that they can feel secure and empowered while making important decisions for their personal health and well-being. Two big things I want to address when working with these kids are building internal awareness and confidence, and the other is overcoming obstacles through strength training and sports as an outlet. If I give them valuable information that they can bring back home to their families there is a high chance to make a change in their lives. Why Is This Important?There is a huge health epidemic regarding childhood obesity and other health related issues that can be addressed through discussing at least the basic needs for overall health and quality of life.It’s simple, if we build and uplift youth from the inside out, we have a chance to change their lives for the better in the long haul. If I teach basic cues of internal and external awareness, this will then make the transition easier to coach basic strength and conditioning. Another big part of why I am an advocate for empowering youth and student athletes is because I was one of these inner city kids who had a huge opportunity, but at the time I didn't understand the significance and benefits of getting stronger as an aspiring professional athlete.My interest was peaked to learn about strength training through my high school throws coach, but I unfortunately decided to stick with my last year of varsity basketball instead of getting proper strength training and coaching for my senior year of high school. Making this choice made it very difficult for me to transition into collegiate sports, and I didn't last long. Had I known that committing to strength training would propel me further as an athlete, I probably would have reconsidered. I aim to emphasize the importance of this, as it is integral for those who want to go beyond the collegiate and professional level.The Goal is $7,000I have no desire to become rich from this project, but I do want to be placed in a financial position to serve these communities without having to worry about taking care of my basic human needs to survive. Contributing to this project will be beneficial for youth, their families, coaches, and the likes. My only goal is to make an impact, and after the trip to Zimbabwe I want to continue serving communities who need resources like this as well for free. I’m asking for $4,400 for my first trip in July 2020, but I will need to secure funding and submit payments to the Lift4Life Nonprofit on or before April 15, 2020. The total costs for everything includes:- Traveling fees, room and board, visas- Trip contribution expenses- Insurance, emergency funding- Travel shots - Safari excursion costs- The remaining balance of $2600 will be used for participant gifts, prizes, and coaching stipend for local coaching camps  Additional proceedings that exceed the fundraising goal will be utilized as scholarship money, and community supplies and support for athletes and families.Covering costs for Zimbabwe  will be the most expensive portion of the campaign, as this will be a foundation to start off the project and it will provide a safe space to start out on this journey of service.** For inquiries regarding usage if goal is not met see risks and challenges below**The ImpactOver the years, I've run into people that I coached when I was in high school and they are now adults. I recently ran into one on the best throwers in the state of California, and they said, "I'm so grateful to have had you as a coach and mentor in my life. Because of your support and presence, you're a big reason why I became an athlete at one of the best public universities in the world."In that moment I became overwhelmed with joy because I had no idea at the time how much this meant to this individual, and I was genuinely proud to see that they were successful and happy with their lives. This reaffirmed yet again that my calling is to serve youth in in many ways, and this path is one of the most integral ones. The only way to scale on making a larger impact is through having more time for this to take place successfully and effectively.Risks & ChallengesIn the event that all funds aren’t secured, I will focus on continuing to build locally and nationally as a traveling coach. Serving youth and young team-oriented athletes is something that I'm truly passionate about, and if all I have to focus on is teaching them on how to lift properly, and put them in a position to be more competitive and confident in themselves overall that is success to me.  I'm more than willing to schedule ample time to make an impact on youth regardless  through free youth coaching and mentorship.Other Ways You Can HelpI understand that everyone may not be able to contribute financially, so it would be very helpful for you to spread the word in regards to this project. Please like, share, post and tag me (@livingproofstrength) and TechFit Creative (@techfitcreative). You can also tag #lift4life, #livingproof, #socialentrepreneirship, #sportspsychology, and #youthathletics.Lastly, in kind donations are also greatly appreciated, as youth who are looking to take strength training and strength sports and athletics will need gear and materials to make their athletic journeys more successful and injury free.Thank you!!!

TiteSkin is dedicated to promoting smart age defying skin care tools. With our patented advanced technology we make skin care easy and accessible for everyone.  The average cost of nonsurgical skin tightening is $2,059, according to 2018 statistics from the American Society of Plastic Surgeons.  Anyone can afford a Titelite for a fraction of this cost.  By backing us you will join our TiteFam and help us in our journey to provide..

Beauty for All!

 

 

 

 

 

 

SOCIAL MEDIA #TITELIFE

 

 

 

 

SCIENTIFIC STUDIES

 

 

 

Return policy:  Indiegogo is a platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy.  In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective. However, in the rare event you receive a defective item, please contact us:  support@titeskinco.com

Global Shipping. We are pleased to offer worldwide shipping. The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for our campaign. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.

story:
A Movement for All!

Recharge Move is a unique on-demand fitness and health video platform with new workouts added every week.

 

Regular exercise doesn't fix everything, but it certainly comes close. However, exercising regularly is a challenge for many of us. Recharge Move solves that problem. Let's move! 

Move Membership gives you access to:

  • Structured, tested, & effective 10-week Cycle programming 
    • Can be done anywhere, anytime
    • 4 days/week
    • Track your progress
    • Cinematic quality videos
    • Unique Test Week, Workouts, Re-test week structure
    • Various intensity days
      • Practice Day (PD)- Less intense
      • Competition Day (CD)- More intense
    • Revolutionary Bell System (more below)
  • Fun and challenging one-off workouts
    • Bodyweight
    • Hypertrophy (muscle gain)
    • Quick hits
    • Cardio/endurance
    • Strength
    • More to come. 
  • Health focused videos. 
    • Stress Management
    • Motivation strategies
    • Sleep hygiene 
    • Mobility training
    • More to come.

 

The Story.

Fitness with Clinical Precision. 

Our combined 20+ years of clinical experience came together in 2016 when we opened our brick and mortar facility called Recharge. Our goal was to combine the medical knowledge of physical therapists, with coaching expertise, and community feel.  

We were frustrated with constantly treating pain and seeing people return to baseline levels of normal.

We wanted to be less reactive, and entirely proactive in helping people live active, sustainably healthy lives. In large part, we've succeeded. We have a tremendous local community and we are incredibly proud to be their health epicenter.

Over the last couple years we began asking ourselves if we could take the critical pillars of Recharge and build a platform that could benefit others beyond our 4 walls. The answer is yes we can. The result is Recharge Move. 

We've realized that for people to successfully begin and sustain a fitness routine they need: 

1) structured, yet fun programming,

2) adjustability to unique needs or limitations,

3) ability to keep moving when aches/pain inevitability come up.

 

Recharge Move integrates all of these into a unique package that provides:

Find Your Movement Customizer

Determine your ideal hinge, push up, squat, and over head positions. 

 

Find Your Movement Introduction

 

HINGE

 

SQUAT

 

PUSH UP

 

OVER HEAD POSITION

 

COMPLETE PROGRAMS

Our 10 week programs (4x/week) consists of 3 sections:

  • test week (1st week) 
  • programming (8 weeks)
  • re-test week (1 week). 

 

Introduction to the DB Program 1:

 

A Movement For All Skill Levels!

Every MOVE workout has 3 exercise variations: Main, Lower Bell (easier), and Upper Bell (harder).

 

Easy to Follow Workouts with High Quality Videos

 

Campaign/Development progress map



Next Phase

We need your help to get Recharge Move through the finish line. The platform is mostly built. The first program is recorded and ready. One-off workouts are being recorded now. We need help with production (video editing, platform build out) and final development costs.

Once the platform launches, we will be releasing weekly workout videos.

Yes, new workouts every week.

Remember, There Is A Movement for All! Let's Find Yours. 


Your Recharge Move Team,

story:
Moxibustion (灸) is a traditional Chinese medicine therapy which consists of burning dried mugwort (moxa) on particular points on the body. It plays an important role in the traditional medical systems of China (including Tibet), HongKong Japan, Korea, Vietnam, and Mongolia.

 

 

In traditional Chinese medicine, moxibustion is used on people who have a cold or stagnant condition. The burning of moxa is believed to expel cold and warm the meridians, which leads to smoother flow of blood and qi.Put into plain language, the Moxibustion is able to alleviate and cure some symptom or disease like insomnia,spondylodynia,dysmenorrhea,backache,arthritis,宫寒,prostate related disease etc.

YOU WON'T REGRET TRYING OUT MOXIBUSTION

If you were suffering from the following scenarios, According to our App Big Data, which has more than 20 MILLIONS users , moxibustion is very effective to following disease an symptom.

 

PROBABLY THE MOST USER FRIENDLY 

Moxibustion used to be very complicated, it requires extra personnel to deploy the moxibustion. What’s more annoying is that you have to stay still while having this therapy. With our innovation, you can do the moxibustion by yourself at HOME even on the GO.

 

MORE THAN SMOKELESS

One of the reasons which keep moxibustion away from mass population is the heavy smoke from the traditional moxibustion. Jiudaifu i9 utilize the modern heating technology which produce no smoke and no fire at all.  

 

 

Well selected moxa essence, no artificial oil added.

Qi is one of the most important factors which produce the medical effect. In order to have the quality guaranteed, we have established a moxa plantation farm in central China where produces the best moxa in China. We make sure that our moxa essence are all well selected, and no artificial oil added.

 

 

SHARE

Everyone deserves the great benefit of moxibustion. However, due to the limited education and marketing, not too many people really knows about moxibustion,not to say understand the benefit for moxibustion. In order to generate more awareness,we want to start from innovation on moxibustion.

 

BETTER USER EXPERIENCE

Generally the moxibustion is a quite easy medical practice which only requires some basic guidance. However, the traditional moxibustion needs to burn moxa, the burning will produce quite a lot smoke and might cause potential firing. Besides the smoke , you also have to set up the moxibustion box and fix it . So the whole process and experience is quite annoying. And we want to simplify the experience,and make it smokeless.

 

TRADTION MEETS MODERN

The moxibustion has been practiced for more than 2000 years , which is proven to be quite effective by generations and generations. No major moxibustion innovation occurs, only until now the modern manufacturing and mobile Internet application.

 

MAKE IT PORTABLE

With years in depth research, we have the full capability to make moxibustion from a medical service into a portable device.  With our device you can do moxibustion at home, in your office,even you are on a tour.

 

MOXIBUSTION ON THE GO 

 

NO MORE SMOKE ,NO MORE  WIRE

Unlike the traditional moxibustion, our product is 100% smokeless and dust free.

SMART MOXIBUSTION

Jiudaifu i9 comes up with smartphone APP which can be downloaded on both AppStore and GooglePlay. 

With the App, you would be able to control the moxibustion device via your smartphone.
temperature and time can be setup via the APP at the same time.It will be super easy to control the temeperature and time range according to your personal perference and physical condition.It is safe and handy. For those who does not know how to find the acupuncture points,the APP also offers a feature to let you find the right point easily. 

 

 

 

Moxibustion is a tradition in China, however it is quite new concept in the west. We believe people who trust and like corwdfunding are those who are open minded and willing to embrace new ideas. This is the key factor we want to put our product on Indiegogo. In China, we also did a very successful crowdfunding, so we think why we don’t have another one for western market.

So please trust us and help us to spread the words to your be loved ones and beyond.

Thanks very much

 

79 USD

With only 79 USD, you will have Jiudaifu i9 smart moxibustion device with 2 heads and a well handmade leather bag, 60 moxa pads will be included as well. 

99 USD

With only 99 USD , you will have Jiudaifu i9 smart moxibustion device with 4 heads and a well handmade leather bag, 60 moxa pads will be included as well.

Jiudaifu was established in 2014 Shenzhen which is called the Silicon Valley in China. We started from developing an App ,which has more than 20 million users, called经络穴位图解 which helps people to find acupuncture points and provides easy medical solution for some most common symptom.

Now we have nearly 80 team members which are consisted of software developers, medical researchers, hardware engineers, and marketer.

Besides daily development and research work, our medical team are also open for inquiries from patients. We feel very proud that we helped a lot of people not only in China but also from many other countries like US, UK, Spain, Australia, and Mexico. 

You are welcome to ask us any question, we feel great about being helpful.

 

 

FAQ

story:
The Emmaus Clinic is meeting the urgent health care needs of the people of Bellevue Mountain, Haiti.   Located just an hour outside the capital of Port-au-Prince, we are providing thousands of people with services ranging from routine family medical care, to dental and ophthalmology services.  See the Emmaus Clinic website for case studies that illustrate how our contributors have made a lasting impact.

Contributions to the Emmaus Clinic are tax-deductible in accordance with US law.  Thank you for your generous support!

story:
Our Story

In 2012, we decided to take a leap of faith and create something we'd wanted for years -- a fun, clean dance workout with hip-hop music that edified my spirit.

We've got a rep

  • Named one of the "Top DVD Workouts of 2014" by the Chicago Sun-Times

  • As seen in SHAPE, Chicago Tribune, Workout Trends Magazine and CBN News

  • Numerous accolades in print, blogs and Amazon

 

Why we're doing this

We received amazing feedback from our first workout DVD series however we recognized that some of our supporters wanted a companion workout with the same inspirational hip-hop vibe but that included muscle toning, strength training and stretching. 

So... we came up with a new concept, GOSPILATES - a totally fun & family-friendly set of videos that combines elements of cardio, dance, strength training and Pilates - all choreographed to clean & contagious hip-hop beats! 

 

We've already started choreographing the workout and have some "rough cuts" of us practicing our choreography with minimal editing. 

We are using these videos to refine our moves, make changes where needed and be ready to rock and roll by the time we get to the final shoot.

If you make a donation, you can get a chance to actually see these rough cuts via streaming video and start working out with us as soon as January 2018!

 

 

The Goal & The Perks

We need $16,500 for the production, promotion and DVD manufacturing of our new workout program, GOSPILATES.

Depending on the amount of your donation,  you will get free videos, t-shirts, inclusion in our 21-day New Year's Fitness Challenge and/or the opportunity to bring one of our leaders to your community to host a live workout class!

If we don't reach our entire goal we will use the funds raised for promotion and offer our new workouts through on-demand video, either streaming or downloads.

 

The Impact

The strength of our program is our diversity.  Our youngest certified instructor to date is 18 and our oldest is 68. 

What our customers most love about us is that they can relate to us. We are not a "one size fits all" kinda group.  We are all shapes and sizes. We intentionally recruit various ages and fitness levels, and represent many ethnic and cultural backgrounds.

Our workouts inspire individuals, non-profits and local groups to offer family-friendly wellness events in their community.  We are committed to providing a fitness experience where everyone feels wanted, welcome and worthy.

Here's what one blogger had to say about us:

 

What is this money used for?

$16500 is a lot of money! Where's it going?

Our entire team consists of people with regular day jobs. We often travel to local communities across the U.S. and host major events at our own expense, because we love seeing lives transform through our fitness program.

And after almost 6 years of being in business with no major investors or distributor backing, we are still going strong — you ain't seen nothing yet!

Here's where the funds will go:

Travel. We literally have folks from all over the United States contributing to this project.  We need to cover plane tickets and meals.

Studio space. Although we have some amazing local studio partners, studio rental still isn't cheap. We need a minimum of 15 hours of studio time in order to prep for the final production.

Production. In order to bring you the fitness experience that we'll be proud to deliver, we need suitable video cameras, lighting and of course a production crew. 

Editing.  Post-production edits, closed captioning and motion graphics will be needed prior to final delivery of the files.

Website. Graphics, landing pages and other SEO goodies added to ShazzyFitness.com to reflect our new fitness program.

DVD Manufacturing. A portion of the proceeds will fund our initial order of DVDs.

Note: this fundraiser goal won't cover all of our expenses, but it will cover most of them.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is raising enough funds before our deadline.  We need to raise the funds before the end of January in order to get the DVDs into mass production by spring. 

We are still a very small team, depending mostly on volunteers who donate their time to Shazzy Fitness every single day. This is the biggest challenge we've ever taken on as an organization.

Other Ways You Can Help

We really hope you do contribute, but if not there's still ways to help us. Please share our cause with your family, friends, co-workers and community!

Facebook:  http://facebook.com/shazzyfitness

Instagram:  http://instragram.com/shazzyfitness

Twitter: http://twitter.com/shazzyfitness
story_txt:
Our StoryIn 2012, we decided to take a leap of faith and create something we'd wanted for years -- a fun, clean dance workout with hip-hop music that edified my spirit.We've got a rep
Named one of the "Top DVD Workouts of 2014" by the Chicago Sun-Times
As seen in SHAPE, Chicago Tribune, Workout Trends Magazine and CBN News
Numerous accolades in print, blogs and Amazon
 Why we're doing thisWe received amazing feedback from our first workout DVD series however we recognized that some of our supporters wanted a companion workout with the same inspirational hip-hop vibe but that included muscle toning, strength training and stretching. So... we came up with a new concept, GOSPILATES - a totally fun & family-friendly set of videos that combines elements of cardio, dance, strength training and Pilates - all choreographed to clean & contagious hip-hop beats!  We've already started choreographing the workout and have some "rough cuts" of us practicing our choreography with minimal editing. We are using these videos to refine our moves, make changes where needed and be ready to rock and roll by the time we get to the final shoot.If you make a donation, you can get a chance to actually see these rough cuts via streaming video and start working out with us as soon as January 2018!  The Goal & The PerksWe need $16,500 for the production, promotion and DVD manufacturing of our new workout program, GOSPILATES.Depending on the amount of your donation,  you will get free videos, t-shirts, inclusion in our 21-day New Year's Fitness Challenge and/or the opportunity to bring one of our leaders to your community to host a live workout class!If we don't reach our entire goal we will use the funds raised for promotion and offer our new workouts through on-demand video, either streaming or downloads. The ImpactThe strength of our program is our diversity.  Our youngest certified instructor to date is 18 and our oldest is 68. What our customers most love about us is that they can relate to us. We are not a "one size fits all" kinda group.  We are all shapes and sizes. We intentionally recruit various ages and fitness levels, and represent many ethnic and cultural backgrounds.Our workouts inspire individuals, non-profits and local groups to offer family-friendly wellness events in their community.  We are committed to providing a fitness experience where everyone feels wanted, welcome and worthy.Here's what one blogger had to say about us: What is this money used for?$16500 is a lot of money! Where's it going?Our entire team consists of people with regular day jobs. We often travel to local communities across the U.S. and host major events at our own expense, because we love seeing lives transform through our fitness program.And after almost 6 years of being in business with no major investors or distributor backing, we are still going strong — you ain't seen nothing yet!Here's where the funds will go:Travel. We literally have folks from all over the United States contributing to this project.  We need to cover plane tickets and meals.Studio space. Although we have some amazing local studio partners, studio rental still isn't cheap. We need a minimum of 15 hours of studio time in order to prep for the final production.Production. In order to bring you the fitness experience that we'll be proud to deliver, we need suitable video cameras, lighting and of course a production crew. Editing.  Post-production edits, closed captioning and motion graphics will be needed prior to final delivery of the files.Website. Graphics, landing pages and other SEO goodies added to ShazzyFitness.com to reflect our new fitness program.DVD Manufacturing. A portion of the proceeds will fund our initial order of DVDs.Note: this fundraiser goal won't cover all of our expenses, but it will cover most of them. Risks & ChallengesOur biggest challenge is raising enough funds before our deadline.  We need to raise the funds before the end of January in order to get the DVDs into mass production by spring. We are still a very small team, depending mostly on volunteers who donate their time to Shazzy Fitness every single day. This is the biggest challenge we've ever taken on as an organization.Other Ways You Can HelpWe really hope you do contribute, but if not there's still ways to help us.
